45002023	You are proud of the Law. Do you take honor away from God when you do not obey the Law?
45002024	The Holy Writings say, “God’s name is hated by the people who are not Jews because of you.” (Isaiah 52:5)
45002025	Going through the religious act of becoming a Jew is worth something if you obey the Law. If you do not obey the Law, it is worth nothing to you.
45002026	If a person who is not a Jew and has not gone through the act of becoming a Jew, obeys the Law, God will think of him as a Jew.
45002027	You Jews have the Law but do not obey it. You have gone through the religious act also. At the same time those who are not Jews obey the Law even if they have not gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew. In this way, these people show you are guilty.
45002028	A man is not a Jew just because he goes through the religious act of becoming a Jew.
45002029	The true Jew is one whose heart is right with God. The religious act of becoming a Jew must be done in the heart. That is the work of the Holy Spirit. The Law does not do that kind of work. The true Jew gets his thanks from God, not from men.
45003001	Do the Jews have anything that those who are not Jews do not have? What good does it do to go through the religious act of becoming a Jew?
45003002	Yes, the Jews have much more in every way. First of all, God gave the Jews His Law.
45003003	If some of them were not faithful, does it mean that God will not be faithful?
45003004	No, not at all! God is always true even if every man lies. The Holy Writings say, “Speak the truth and you will not be proven guilty.” (Psalm 51:4)
45003005	If our sins show how right God is, what can we say? Is it wrong for God to punish us for it? (I am speaking as men do.)
45003006	No, not at all! If it were wrong for God to punish us, how could He judge the world?
45003007	If my lies honor God by showing how true He is, why am I still being judged as a sinner?
45003008	Why not say, “Let us sin that good will come from it.” (Some people have said I talk like this!) They will be punished as they should be.
45003009	What about it then? Are we Jews better than the people who are not Jews? Not at all! I have already said that Jews and the people who are not Jews are all sinners.
45003010	The Holy Writings say, “There is not one person who is right with God. No, not even one!
45003011	There is not one who understands. There is not one who tries to find God.” (Psalm 14:2)
45003012	Everyone has turned away from God. They have all done wrong. Not one of them does what is good. No, not even one!
45003013	Their mouth is like an open grave. They tell lies with their tongues. (Psalm 5:9; 140:3) Whatever they say is like the poison of snakes.
45003014	Their mouths speak bad things against God. They say bad things about other people. (Psalm 10:7)
45003015	They are quick to hurt and kill people.
45003016	Wherever they go, they destroy and make people suffer.
45003017	They know nothing about peace. (Isaiah 59:7–8)
45003018	They do not honor God with love and fear.” (Psalm 36:1)
45003019	Now we know that the Law speaks to those who live under the Law. No one can say that he does not know what sin is. Yes, every person in the world stands guilty before God.
45003020	No person will be made right with God by doing what the Law says. The Law shows us how sinful we are.
45003021	But now God has made another way to make men right with Himself. It is not by the Law. The Law and the early preachers tell about it.
45003022	Men become right with God by putting their trust in Jesus Christ. God will accept men if they come this way. All men are the same to God.
45003023	For all men have sinned and have missed the shining-greatness of God.
45003024	Anyone can be made right with God by the free gift of His loving-favor. It is Jesus Christ Who bought them with His blood and made them free from their sins.
45003025	God gave Jesus Christ to the world. Men’s sins can be forgiven through the blood of Christ when they put their trust in Him. God gave His Son Jesus Christ to show how right He is. Before this, God did not look on the sins that were done.
45003026	But now God proves that He is right in saving men from sin. He shows that He is the One Who has no sin. God makes anyone right with Himself who puts his trust in Jesus.
45003027	What then do we have to be proud of? Nothing at all! Why? Is it because men obey the Law? No! It is because men put their trust in Christ.
45003028	This is what we have come to know. A man is made right with God by putting his trust in Christ. It is not by his doing what the Law says.
45003029	Is God the God of the Jews only? Is He not the God of the people who are not Jews also? He is for sure.
45003030	He is one God. He will make Jews and the people who are not Jews right with Himself if they put their trust in Christ.
45003031	Does this mean that we do away with the Law when we put our trust in Christ? No, not at all. It means we know the Law is important.
45004001	What about Abraham, our early father? What did he learn?
45004002	If Abraham was made right with God by what he did, he would have had something to be proud of. But he could not be proud before God.
45004003	The Holy Writings say, “Abraham put his trust in God and that made him right with God.” (Genesis 15:6)
45004004	If a man works, his pay is not a gift. It is something he has earned.
45004005	If a man has not worked to be saved, but has put his trust in God Who saves men from the punishment of their sins, that man is made right with God because of his trust in God.
45004006	David tells of this. He spoke of how happy the man is who puts his trust in God without working to be saved from the punishment of sin.
45004007	“Those people are happy whose sinful acts are forgiven and whose sins are covered.
45004008	Those people are happy whose sins the Lord will not remember.” (Psalm 32:1–2)
45004009	Is this happiness given to the Jews only? Or is it given also to the people who are not Jews? We say again, “Abraham put his trust in God and that made him right with God.” (Genesis 15:6)
45004010	When did this happen? Was it before or after Abraham went through the religious act of becoming a Jew? It was before.
45004011	He went through the religious act after he had put his trust in God. That religious act proved that his trust in God made him right with God even before he went through the religious act of becoming a Jew. In that way, it made him the early father of all those who believe. It showed that those who did not go through the religious act of becoming a Jew could be right with God.
45004012	He is also the early father of all those who have gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew. It is not because they went through the act. It is because they put their trust in God the same as Abraham did before he went through the religious act of becoming a Jew.
45004013	God promised to give the world to him and to all his family after him. He did not make this promise because Abraham obeyed the Law. He promised to give the world to Abraham because he put his trust in God. This made him right with God.
45004014	If those who obey the Law are to get the world, then a person putting his trust in God means nothing. God’s promise to Abraham would be worth nothing.
45004015	God’s anger comes on a man when he does not obey the Law. But if there were no Law, then no one could break it.
45004016	So God’s promise is given to us because we put our trust in Him. We can be sure of it. It is because of His loving-favor to us. It is for all the family of Abraham. It is for those who obey the Law. It is for those who put their trust in God as Abraham did. In this way, he is the father of all Christians.
45004017	The Holy Writings say, “I have made you a father of many nations.” This promise is good because of Who God is. He makes the dead live again. He speaks, and something is made out of nothing.
45004018	Abraham believed he would be the father of many nations. He had no reason to hope for this, but he had been told, “Your children will become many nations.” (Genesis 15:5)
45004019	Abraham was about one hundred years old. His body was about dead, but his faith in God was not weak when he thought of his body. His faith was not weak when he thought of his wife Sarah being past the age of having children.
45004020	Abraham did not doubt God’s promise. His faith in God was strong, and he gave thanks to God.
45004021	He was sure God was able to do what He had promised.
45004022	Abraham put his trust in God and was made right with Him.
45004023	The words, “He was made right with God,” were not for Abraham only.
45004024	They were for us also. God will make us right with Himself the same way He did Abraham, if we put our trust in God Who raised Jesus our Lord from the dead.
45004025	Jesus died for our sins. He was raised from the dead to make us right with God.
45005001	Now that we have been made right with God by putting our trust in Him, we have peace with Him. It is because of what our Lord Jesus Christ did for us.
45005002	By putting our trust in God, He has given us His loving-favor and has received us. We are happy for the hope we have of sharing the shining-greatness of God.
45005003	We are glad for our troubles also. We know that troubles help us learn not to give up.
45005004	When we have learned not to give up, it shows we have stood the test. When we have stood the test, it gives us hope.
45005005	Hope never makes us ashamed because the love of God has come into our hearts through the Holy Spirit Who was given to us.
45005006	We were weak and could not help ourselves. Then Christ came at the right time and gave His life for all sinners.
45005007	No one is willing to die for another person, but for a good man someone might be willing to die.
45005008	But God showed His love to us. While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
45005009	Now that we have been saved from the punishment of sin by the blood of Christ, He will save us from God’s anger also.
45005010	We hated God. But we were saved from the punishment of sin by the death of Christ. He has brought us back to God and we will be saved by His life.
45005011	Not only that, we give thanks to God through our Lord Jesus Christ. Through Him we have been brought back to God.
45005012	This is what happened: Sin came into the world by one man, Adam. Sin brought death with it. Death spread to all men because all have sinned.
45005013	Sin was in the world before the Law was given. But sin is not held against a person when there is no Law.
45005014	And yet death had power over men from the time of Adam until the time of Moses. Even the power of death was over those who had not sinned in the same way Adam sinned. Adam was like the One Who was to come.
45005015	God’s free gift is not like the sin of Adam. Many people died because of the sin of this one man, Adam. But the loving-favor of God came to many people also. This gift came also by one Man Jesus Christ, God’s Son.
45005016	The free gift of God is not like Adam’s sin. God told Adam he was guilty because of his sin and through this one came sin and guilt. But the free gift makes men right with God. Through One, Christ, men’s sins are forgiven.
45005017	The power of death was over all men because of the sin of one man, Adam. But many people will receive His loving-favor and the gift of being made right with God. They will have power in life by Jesus Christ.
45005018	Through Adam’s sin, death and hell came to all men. But another Man, Christ, by His right act makes men free and gives them life.
45005019	Adam did not obey God, and many people become sinners through him. Christ obeyed God and makes many people right with Himself.
45005020	Sin spread when the Law was given. But where sin spread, God’s loving-favor spread all the more.
45005021	Sin had power that ended in death. Now, God’s loving-favor has power to make men right with Himself. It gives life that lasts forever. Our Lord Jesus Christ did this for us.
45006001	What does this mean? Are we to keep on sinning so that God will give us more of His loving-favor?
45006002	No, not at all! We are dead to sin. How then can we keep on living in sin?
45006003	All of us were baptized to show we belong to Christ. We were baptized first of all to show His death.
45006004	We were buried in baptism as Christ was buried in death. As Christ was raised from the dead by the great power of God, so we will have new life also.
45006005	If we have become one with Christ in His death, we will be one with Him in being raised from the dead to new life.
45006006	We know that our old life, our old sinful self, was nailed to the cross with Christ. And so the power of sin that held us was destroyed. Sin is no longer our boss.
45006007	When a man is dead, he is free from the power of sin.
45006008	And if we have died with Christ, we believe we will live with Him also.
45006009	We know that Christ was raised from the dead. He will never die again. Death has no more power over Him.
45006010	He died once but now lives. He died to break the power of sin, and the life He now lives is for God.
45006011	You must do the same thing! Think of yourselves as dead to the power of sin. But now you have new life because of Jesus Christ our Lord. You are living this new life for God.
45006012	So do not let sin have power over your body here on earth. You must not obey the body and let it do what it wants to do.
45006013	Do not give any part of your body for sinful use. Instead, give yourself to God as a living person who has been raised from the dead. Give every part of your body to God to do what is right.
45006014	Sin must not have power over you. You are not living by the Law. You have life because of God’s loving-favor.
45006015	What are we to do then? Are we to sin because we have God’s loving-favor and are not living by the Law? No, not at all!
45006016	Do you not know that when you give yourself as a servant to be owned by someone, that one becomes your owner? If you give yourself to sin, the end is death. If you give yourself to God, the end is being right with Him.
45006017	At one time you were held by the power of sin. But now you obey with all your heart the teaching that was given to you. Thank God for this!
45006018	You were made free from the power of sin. Being right with God has power over you now.
45006019	I speak with words easy to understand because your human thinking is weak. At one time you gave yourselves over to the power of sin. You kept on sinning all the more. Now give yourselves over to being right with God. Set yourself apart for God-like living and to do His work.
45006020	When sin had power over your life, you were not right with God.
45006021	What good did you get from the things you are ashamed of now? Those things bring death.
45006022	But now you are free from the power of sin. You have become a servant for God. Your life is set apart for God-like living. The end is life that lasts forever.
45006023	You get what is coming to you when you sin. It is death! But God’s free gift is life that lasts forever. It is given to us by our Lord Jesus Christ.
45007001	Christian brothers, I am sure you understand what I am going to say. You know all about the Law. The Law has power over a man as long as he lives.
45007002	A married woman is joined by law to her husband as long as he lives. But if he dies, she is free from the law that joined her to him.
45007003	If she marries another man while her husband is still alive, she is sinning by not being faithful in marriage. If her husband dies, she is free from the law that joined her to him. After that she can marry someone else. She does not sin if she marries another man.
45007004	My Christian brothers, that is the way it is with you. You were under the power of the Law. But now you are dead to it because you are joined to another. You are joined to Christ Who was raised from the dead. This is so we may be what God wants us to be. Our lives are to give fruit for Him.
45007005	When we lived to please our bodies, those sinful desires were pulling at us all the time. We always wanted to do what the Law said not to do. Living that kind of life brings death,
45007006	but now we are free from the Law. We are dead to sin that once held us in its power. No longer do we follow the Law which is the old way. We now follow the new way, the way of the Spirit.
45007007	Then what are we saying? Is the Law sinful? No, not at all! But it was the Law that showed me what sin is. I did not know it was sin to follow wrong desires, but the Law said, “You must not follow wrong desires.”
45007008	The Law made me know how much I was sinning. It showed me how I had a desire for all kinds of things. For without the Law, sin is dead.
45007009	I was once alive. That was when I did not know what the Law said I had to do. Then I found that I had broken the Law. I knew I was a sinner. Death was mine because of the Law.
45007010	The Law was supposed to give me new life. Instead, it gave me death.
45007011	Sin found a way to trap me by working through the Law. Then sin killed me by using the Law.
45007012	The Law is holy. Each one of the Laws is holy and right and good.
45007013	Then does it mean that the Law, which is good, brought death to me? No, not at all! It was sin that did it. Sin brought death to me by the Law that is good. In that way, sin was shown to be what it is. So because of the Law, sin becomes much more sinful.
45007014	We know that the Law is right and good, but I am a person who does what is wrong and bad. I am not my own boss. Sin is my boss.
45007015	I do not understand myself. I want to do what is right but I do not do it. Instead, I do the very thing I hate.
45007016	When I do the thing I do not want to do, it shows me that the Law is right and good.
45007017	So I am not doing it. Sin living in me is doing it.
45007018	I know there is nothing good in me, that is, in my flesh. For I want to do good but I do not.
45007019	I do not do the good I want to do. Instead, I am always doing the sinful things I do not want to do.
45007020	If I am always doing the very thing I do not want to do, it means I am no longer the one who does it. It is sin that lives in me.
45007021	This has become my way of life: When I want to do what is right, I always do what is wrong.
45007022	My mind and heart agree with the Law of God.
45007023	But there is a different law at work deep inside of me that fights with my mind. This law of sin holds me in its power because sin is still in me.
45007024	There is no happiness in me! Who can set me free from my sinful old self?
45007025	God’s Law has power over my mind, but sin still has power over my sinful old self. I thank God I can be free through Jesus Christ our Lord!
45008001	Now, because of this, those who belong to Christ will not suffer the punishment of sin.
45008002	The power of the Holy Spirit has made me free from the power of sin and death. This power is mine because I belong to Christ Jesus.
45008003	The Law could not make me free from the power of sin and death. It was weak because it had to work with weak human beings. But God sent His own Son. He came to earth in a body of flesh which could be tempted to sin as we in our bodies can be. He gave Himself to take away sin. By doing that, He took away the power sin had over us.
45008004	In that way, Jesus did for us what the Law said had to be done. We do not do what our sinful old selves tell us to do anymore. Now we do what the Holy Spirit wants us to do.
45008005	Those who let their sinful old selves tell them what to do live under that power of their sinful old selves. But those who let the Holy Spirit tell them what to do are under His power.
45008006	If your sinful old self is the boss over your mind, it leads to death. But if the Holy Spirit is the boss over your mind, it leads to life and peace.
45008007	The mind that thinks only of ways to please the sinful old self is fighting against God. It is not able to obey God’s Laws. It never can.
45008008	Those who do what their sinful old selves want to do cannot please God.
45008009	But you are not doing what your sinful old selves want you to do. You are doing what the Holy Spirit tells you to do, if you have God’s Spirit living in you. No one belongs to Christ if he does not have Christ’s Spirit in him.
45008010	If Christ is in you, your spirit lives because you are right with God, and yet your body is dead because of sin.
45008011	The Holy Spirit raised Jesus from the dead. If the same Holy Spirit lives in you, He will give life to your bodies in the same way.
45008012	So then, Christian brothers, we are not to do what our sinful old selves want us to do.
45008013	If you do what your sinful old selves want you to do, you will die in sin. But if, through the power of the Holy Spirit, you destroy those actions to which the body can be led, you will have life.
45008014	All those who are led by the Holy Spirit are sons of God.
45008015	You should not act like people who are owned by someone. They are always afraid. Instead, the Holy Spirit makes us His sons, and we can call to Him, “My Father.”
45008016	For the Holy Spirit speaks to us and tells our spirit that we are children of God.
45008017	If we are children of God, we will receive everything He has promised us. We will share with Christ all the things God has given to Him. But we must share His suffering if we are to share His shining-greatness.
45008018	I am sure that our suffering now cannot be compared to the shining-greatness that He is going to give us.
45008019	Everything that has been made in the world is waiting for the day when God will make His sons known.
45008020	Everything that has been made in the world is weak. It is not that the world wanted it to be that way. God allowed it to be that way. Yet there is hope.
45008021	Everything that has been made in the world will be set free from the power that can destroy. These will become free just as the children of God become free.
45008022	We know that everything on the earth cries out with pain the same as a woman giving birth to a child.
45008023	We also cry inside ourselves, even we who have received the Holy Spirit. The Holy Spirit is the first of God’s gifts to us. We are waiting to become His complete sons when our bodies are made free.
45008024	We were saved with this hope ahead of us. Now hope means we are waiting for something we do not have. How can a man hope for something he already has?
45008025	But if we hope for something we do not yet see, we must learn how to wait for it.
45008026	In the same way, the Holy Spirit helps us where we are weak. We do not know how to pray or what we should pray for, but the Holy Spirit prays to God for us with sounds that cannot be put into words.
45008027	God knows the hearts of men. He knows what the Holy Spirit is thinking. The Holy Spirit prays for those who belong to Christ the way God wants Him to pray.
45008028	We know that God makes all things work together for the good of those who love Him and are chosen to be a part of His plan.
45008029	God knew from the beginning who would put their trust in Him. So He chose them and made them to be like His Son. Christ was first and all those who belong to God are His brothers.
45008030	He called to Himself also those He chose. Those He called, He made right with Himself. Then He shared His shining-greatness with those He made right with Himself.
45008031	What can we say about all these things? Since God is for us, who can be against us?
45008032	God did not keep His own Son for Himself but gave Him for us all. Then with His Son, will He not give us all things?
45008033	Who can say anything against the people God has chosen? It is God Who says they are right with Himself.
45008034	Who then can say we are guilty? It was Christ Jesus Who died. He was raised from the dead. He is on the right side of God praying to Him for us.
45008035	Who can keep us away from the love of Christ? Can trouble or problems? Can suffering wrong from others or having no food? Can it be because of no clothes or because of danger or war?
45008036	The Holy Writings say, “Because of belonging to Jesus, we are in danger of being killed all day long. We are thought of as sheep that are ready to be killed.” (Psalm 44:22)
45008037	But we have power over all these things through Jesus Who loves us so much.
45008038	For I know that nothing can keep us from the love of God. Death cannot! Life cannot! Angels cannot! Leaders cannot! Any other power cannot! Hard things now or in the future cannot!
45008039	The world above or the world below cannot! Any other living thing cannot keep us away from the love of God which is ours through Christ Jesus our Lord.
45009001	I am telling the truth because I belong to Christ. The Holy Spirit tells my heart that I am not lying.
45009002	I have much sorrow. The pain in my heart never leaves.
45009003	I could even wish that I might be kept from being with Christ if that would help my people to be saved from the punishment of sin. They are of my own flesh and blood.
45009004	They are Jews and are the people God chose for Himself. He shared His shining-greatness with them and gave them His Law and a way to worship. They have His promises.
45009005	The early preachers came from this family. Christ Himself was born of flesh from this family and He is over all things. May God be honored and thanked forever. Let it be so.
45009006	I am not saying that God did not keep His promises. Not all the Jews are people God chose for Himself.
45009007	Not all of Abraham’s family are children of God. God told Abraham, “Only the family of Isaac will be called your family.”(Genesis 21:9–12)
45009008	This means that children born to Abraham are not all children of God. Only those that are born because of God’s promise to Abraham are His children.
45009009	This was the promise God made: “About this time next year I will come, and Sarah will have a son.” (Genesis 18:10)
45009010	Not only this, but there was Rebecca also. Rebecca gave birth to two sons at the same time. Both of them were sons of Isaac.
45009011	Even before the two sons were born, we see God’s plan of choosing. God could choose whom He wanted. It could not be changed because of anything the older son tried to do about it. It was before either one had done anything good or bad.
45009012	Rebecca was told, “The older son will work for the younger son.”
45009013	The Holy Writings say, “I loved Jacob, but hated Esau.” (Malachi 1:2)
45009014	What about it then? Can we say that God is not fair? No, not at all!
45009015	God said to Moses, “I will have loving-kindness and loving-pity for anyone I want to.” (Exodus 33:19)
45009016	These good things from God are not given to someone because he wants them or works to get them. They are given because of His loving-kindness.
45009017	The Holy Writings say to Pharaoh, “I made you leader for this reason: I used you to show My power. I used you to make My name known over all the world.” (Exodus 9:16)
45009018	So God has loving-kindness for those He wants to. He makes some have hard hearts if He wants to.
45009019	But you will ask me, “Why does God blame men for what they do? Who can go against what God wants?”
45009020	Who are you to talk back to God? A pot being made from clay does not talk to the man making it and say, “Why did you make me like this?”
45009021	The man making the pots has the right to use the clay as he wants to. He can make two pots from the same piece of clay. One can have an important use. The other one can be of little use.
45009022	It may be that God wants to show His power and His anger against sin. He waits a long time on some men who are ready to be destroyed.
45009023	God also wanted to show His shining-greatness to those He has given His loving-kindness. He made them ready for His shining-greatness from the beginning.
45009024	We are the ones He chose. He did not only choose Jews. He also chose some from among the people who are not Jews.
45009025	In the Book of Hosea He says, “Those who are not My people, I will call, ‘My people.’Those who are not loved, I will call, ‘My loved ones.’” (Hosea 2:23)
45009026	“And where it said, ‘You are not my people,’ they will be called sons of the living God.” (Hosea 1:10)
45009027	Isaiah says this about the Jews, “Even if there are as many Jews as the sand by the sea, only a few of them will be saved from the punishment of sin.
45009028	For the Lord will do on earth what He says in His Word. He will work fast when He says what will happen here.” (Isaiah 10:22–23)
45009029	Isaiah said also, “If God had not left some of the Jews, we would have all been destroyed like the people who lived in the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah.” (Isaiah 1:9)
45009030	What are we to say about these things? The people who are not Jews were not made right with God by the Law. They were made right with God because they put their trust in Him.
45009031	The Jews tried to be right with God by obeying the Law, but they did not become right with God.
45009032	Why? Because they did not put their trust in God. They tried to be right with God by working for it. They tripped over the most important Stone (Christ).
45009033	The Holy Writings say, “See! I put in Jerusalem a Stone that people will trip over. It is a Rock that will make them fall. But the person who puts his trust in the Rock (Christ) will not be put to shame.” (Isaiah 28:16)
45010001	Christian brothers, the desire of my heart and my prayer to God is that the Jews might be saved from the punishment of sin.
45010002	I know about them. They have a strong desire for God, but they do not know what they should about Him.
45010003	They have not known how God makes men right with Himself. Instead, they have tried to make their own way. They have not become right with God because they have not done what God said to do.
45010004	For Christ has put an end to the Law, so everyone who has put his trust in Christ is made right with God.
45010005	Moses writes that the man who obeys the Law has to live by it.
45010006	But when a man puts his trust in Christ, he is made right with God. You do not need to ask yourself, “Who will go up to heaven to bring Christ down?”
45010007	And you do not need to ask, “Who will go below and bring Christ up from the dead?”
45010008	This is what it says, “The Good News is near you. It is in your mouth and in your heart.” (Deuteronomy 30:14) This Good News tells about putting your trust in Christ. This is what we preach to you.
45010009	If you say with your mouth that Jesus is Lord, and believe in your heart that God raised Him from the dead, you will be saved from the punishment of sin.
45010010	When we believe in our hearts, we are made right with God. We tell with our mouth how we were saved from the punishment of sin.
45010011	The Holy Writings say, “No one who puts his trust in Christ will ever be put to shame.” (Isaiah 28:16)
45010012	There is no difference between the Jews and the people who are not Jews. They are all the same to the Lord. And He is Lord over all of them. He gives of His greatness to all who call on Him for help.
45010013	For everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved from the punishment of sin.
45010014	But how can they call on Him if they have not put their trust in Him? And how can they put their trust in Him if they have not heard of Him? And how can they hear of Him unless someone tells them?
45010015	And how can someone tell them if he is not sent? The Holy Writings say, “The feet of those who bring the Good News are beautiful.” (Isaiah 52:7)
45010016	But they have not all listened to the Good News. Isaiah says, “Lord, who believed what we told them?” (Isaiah 53:1)
45010017	So then, faith comes to us by hearing the Good News. And the Good News comes by someone preaching it.
45010018	And so I ask, “Did they not hear?” For sure they did. The Holy Writings say, “Their voice was heard over all the earth. The Good News was told to the ends of the earth.” (Psalm 19:4)
45010019	Again I ask, “Did the Jews not understand?” First of all, Moses says, “I will make you jealous of those who are not a nation. I will make you angry with a foolish nation of people who do not understand.” (Deuteronomy 32:21)
45010020	Isaiah says even stronger words, “I have been found by men who did not look for Me. I have shown Myself to those who were not asking for Me.” (Isaiah 65:1)
45010021	This is what God says about the Jews, “All day long I held out my hand to a people who would not obey Me and who worked against Me.” (Isaiah 65:2)
45011001	I ask then, “Has God put His people, the Jews, aside?” No, not at all! I myself am a Jew. Abraham was my early father. I am from the family group of Benjamin.
45011002	God has not put His people aside. He chose them from the beginning. Do you know what the Holy Writings say about Elijah? Do you know what Elijah said to God against the Jews?
45011003	He said, “Lord, they have killed Your early preachers. They have destroyed the places where You are worshiped. I am the only one left. They are trying to kill me.”
45011004	But what did God say to him? God said, “I still have 7,000 men. None of them have worshiped the false god Baal.”
45011005	It is the same now. A few of the Jews are being chosen because of God’s loving-favor.
45011006	If they are saved from the punishment of sin because of God’s loving-favor, it is nothing men have done to earn it. If men had earned it, then His loving-favor would not be a free gift.
45011007	This is the way it was. Many Jews did not get what they were looking for. Only those God chose received it. The hearts of the others were made hard. They could not understand it.
45011008	The Holy Writings say this about them, “God gave them hearts and minds that want to sleep. He gave them eyes that could not see. To this very day He gave them ears that could not hear.” (Isaiah 29:10)
45011009	David said, “Let their table of food become a trap to hold them. Let it be a hole into which they fall and will suffer.
45011010	Let their eyes be closed so they cannot see. Keep their backs from being straight always because of their troubles.” (Psalm 69:23)
45011011	I ask then, “Did the Jews fall so they would be lost forever?” No, not at all! It means the people who are not Jews are able to be saved from the punishment of sin because the Jews sinned by not putting their trust in Christ. This made the Jews jealous of those who are not Jews.
45011012	The world received good things from God because of the sin of the Jews. Because the Jews did not receive God’s free gift, the people who are not Jews received good things from Him. Think how much more the world will receive when the Jews finish God’s plan by putting their trust in Christ!
45011013	I am speaking to you people who are not Jews. As long as I am a missionary to you, I want you to know how important my job is.
45011014	I do this so it will make my own people, the Jews, jealous. Then it may be that some will be saved from the punishment of sin.
45011015	Because the Jews have been put aside, many other people in the world have been saved from the punishment of sin. Think what it will be like when they are also gathered in. It will be like the dead coming back to life!
45011016	If the first loaf is holy, all the bread is holy. If the root is holy, all the branches are holy.
45011017	But some of the branches (who are the Jews) were broken off. You who are not Jews were put in the place where the branches had been broken off. Now you are sharing the rich root of the olive tree.
45011018	Do not be proud. Do not think you are better than the branches that were broken off. If you are proud, remember that you do not hold the root. It is the root that holds you.
45011019	You may say, “Branches were broken off to make room for me.”
45011020	It is true. They were broken off because they did not put their trust in Christ. And you are there only because of your faith. Do not be proud. Instead, be afraid.
45011021	God did not keep the first branches (who are the Jews) on the tree. Then watch, or He will not keep you on the tree.
45011022	We see how kind God is. It shows how hard He is also. He is hard on those who fall away. But He is kind to you if you keep on trusting Him. If you do not, He will cut you off.
45011023	If the Jews would put their trust in Christ, God would put them back into the tree. He has power to do that.
45011024	You people who are not Jews were cut off from a wild olive tree. Instead of being there, you were put into a garden olive tree which is not the right place for you to grow. It would be easy for God to put the Jews back onto their own olive tree because they are the branches that belong there.
45011025	Christian brothers, I want you to understand this truth which is no longer a secret. It will keep you from thinking you are so wise. Some Jews have become hard until the right amount of people who are not Jews come to God.
45011026	Then all the Jews will be saved, as the Holy Writings say, “The One Who saves from the punishment of sin will come out of Jerusalem. He will turn the Jews from doing sinful things.”(Isaiah 59:20-21)
45011027	“And this is My promise to them when I take away their sins.” (Isaiah 27:9)
45011028	The Jews are fighting against the Good News. Because they hate the Good News, it has helped you who are not Jews. But God still loves the Jews because He has chosen them and because of His promise to their early fathers.
45011029	God does not change His mind when He chooses men and gives them His gifts.
45011030	At one time you did not obey God. But when the Jews did not receive God’s gift, you did. It was because they did not obey.
45011031	The Jews will not obey now. God’s loving-kindness to you will some day turn them to Him. Then the Jews may have His loving-kindness also.
45011032	God has said that all men have broken His Law. But He will show loving-kindness on all of them.
45011033	God’s riches are so great! The things He knows and His wisdom are so deep! No one can understand His thoughts. No one can understand His ways.
45011034	The Holy Writings say, “Who knows the mind of the Lord? Who is able to tell Him what to do?” (Isaiah 40:13-14)
45011035	“Who has given first to God, that God should pay him back?” (Job 35:7; 41:11)
45011036	Everything comes from Him. His power keeps all things together. All things are made for Him. May He be honored forever. Let it be so.
45012001	Christian brothers, I ask you from my heart to give your bodies to God because of His loving-kindness to us. Let your bodies be a living and holy gift given to God. He is pleased with this kind of gift. This is the true worship that you should give Him.
45012002	Do not act like the sinful people of the world. Let God change your life. First of all, let Him give you a new mind. Then you will know what God wants you to do. And the things you do will be good and pleasing and perfect.
45012003	God has given me His loving-favor. This helps me write these things to you. I ask each one of you not to think more of himself than he should think. Instead, think in the right way toward yourself by the faith God has given you.
45012004	Our bodies are made up of many parts. None of these parts have the same use.
45012005	There are many people who belong to Christ. And yet, we are one body which is Christ’s. We are all different but we depend on each other.
45012006	We all have different gifts that God has given to us by His loving-favor. We are to use them. If someone has the gift of preaching the Good News, he should preach. He should use the faith God has given him.
45012007	If someone has the gift of helping others, then he should help. If someone has the gift of teaching, he should teach.
45012008	If someone has the gift of speaking words of comfort and help, he should speak. If someone has the gift of sharing what he has, he should give from a willing heart. If someone has the gift of leading other people, he should lead them. If someone has the gift of showing kindness to others, he should be happy as he does it.
45012009	Be sure your love is true love. Hate what is sinful. Hold on to whatever is good.
45012010	Love each other as Christian brothers. Show respect for each other.
45012011	Do not be lazy but always work hard. Work for the Lord with a heart full of love for Him.
45012012	Be happy in your hope. Do not give up when trouble comes. Do not let anything stop you from praying.
45012013	Share what you have with Christian brothers who are in need. Give meals and a place to stay to those who need it.
45012014	Pray and give thanks for those who make trouble for you. Yes, pray for them instead of talking against them.
45012015	Be happy with those who are happy. Be sad with those who are sad.
45012016	Live in peace with each other. Do not act or think with pride. Be happy to be with poor people. Keep yourself from thinking you are so wise.
45012017	When someone does something bad to you, do not pay him back with something bad. Try to do what all men know is right and good.
45012018	As much as you can, live in peace with all men.
45012019	Christian brothers, never pay back someone for the bad he has done to you. Let the anger of God take care of the other person. The Holy Writings say, “I will pay back to them what they should get, says the Lord.” (Deuteronomy 32:35)
45012020	“If the one who hates you is hungry, feed him. If he is thirsty, give him water. If you do that, you will be making him more ashamed of himself.” (Proverbs 25:21–22)
45012021	Do not let sin have power over you. Let good have power over sin!
45013001	Every person must obey the leaders of the land. There is no power given but from God, and all leaders are allowed by God.
45013002	The person who does not obey the leaders of the land is working against what God has done. Anyone who does that will be punished.
45013003	Those who do right do not have to be afraid of the leaders. Those who do wrong are afraid of them. Do you want to be free from fear of them? Then do what is right. You will be respected instead.
45013004	Leaders are God’s servants to help you. If you do wrong, you should be afraid. They have the power to punish you. They work for God. They do what God wants done to those who do wrong.
45013005	You must obey the leaders of the land, not only to keep from God’s anger, but so your own heart will have peace.
45013006	It is right for you to pay taxes because the leaders of the land are servants for God who care for these things.
45013007	Pay taxes to whom taxes are to be paid. Be afraid of those you should fear. Respect those you should respect.
45013008	Do not owe anyone anything, but love each other. Whoever loves his neighbor has done what the Law says to do.
45013009	The Law says, “You must not do any sex sin. You must not kill another person. You must not steal. You must not tell a lie about another person. You must not want something someone else has.” The Law also says that these and many other Laws are brought together in one Law, “You must love your neighbor as yourself.”
45013010	Anyone who loves his neighbor will do no wrong to him. You keep the Law with love.
45013011	There is another reason for doing what is right. You know what time it is. It is time for you to wake up from your sleep. The time when we will be taken up to be with Christ is not as far off as when we first put our trust in Him.
45013012	Night is almost gone. Day is almost here. We must stop doing the sinful things that are done in the dark. We must put on all the things God gives us to fight with for the day.
45013013	We must act all the time as if it were day. Keep away from wild parties and do not be drunk. Keep yourself free from sex sins and bad actions. Do not fight or be jealous.
45013014	Let every part of you belong to the Lord Jesus Christ. Do not allow your weak thoughts to lead you into sinful actions.
45014001	If there is someone whose faith is weak, be kind and receive him. Do not argue about what he thinks.
45014002	One man believes he may eat everything. Another man with weak faith eats only vegetables.
45014003	The man who eats everything should not think he is better than the one who eats only vegetables. The man who eats only vegetables should not say the other man is wrong, because God has received him.
45014004	Who are you to tell another person’s servant if he is right or wrong? It is to his owner that he does good or bad. The Lord is able to help him.
45014005	One man thinks one day is more important than another. Another man thinks every day is the same. Every man must be sure in his own mind.
45014006	The man who worships on a special day does it to honor the Lord. The man who eats meat does it to honor the Lord. He gives thanks to God for what he eats. The other man does not eat meat. In this way, he honors the Lord. He gives thanks to God also.
45014007	No one lives for himself alone. No one dies for himself alone.
45014008	If we live, it is for the Lord. If we die, it is for the Lord. If we live or die, we belong to the Lord.
45014009	Christ died and lived again. This is why He is the Lord of the living and of the dead.
45014010	Why do you try to say your Christian brother is right or wrong? Why do you hate your Christian brother? We will all stand before God to be judged by Him.
45014011	The Holy Writings say, “As I live, says the Lord, every knee will bow before Me. And every tongue will say that I am God.”
45014012	Everyone of us will give an answer to God about himself.
45014013	So you should stop saying that you think other people are wrong. Instead, decide to live so that your Christian brother will not have a reason to trip or fall into sin because of you.
45014014	Christ has made me know that everything in itself is clean. But if a person thinks something is not clean, then to him it is not clean.
45014015	If your Christian brother is hurt because of some foods you eat, then you are no longer living by love. Do not destroy the man for whom Christ died by the food you eat.
45014016	Do not let what is good for you be talked about as bad.
45014017	For the holy nation of God is not food and drink. It is being right with God. It is peace and joy given by the Holy Spirit.
45014018	If you follow Christ in these things, God will be happy with you. Men will think well of you also.
45014019	Work for the things that make peace and help each other become stronger Christians.
45014020	Do not destroy what God has done just because of some food. All food is good to eat. But it is wrong to eat anything that will make someone fall into sin.
45014021	Do not eat meat or drink wine or do anything else if it would make your Christian brother fall into sin.
45014022	Keep the faith you have between yourself and God. A man is happy if he knows he is doing right.
45014023	But if he has doubts about the food he eats, God says he is guilty when he eats it. It is because he is eating without faith. Anything that is not done in faith is sin.
45015001	We who have strong faith should help those who are weak. We should not live to please ourselves.
45015002	Each of us should live to please his neighbor. This will help him grow in faith.
45015003	Even Christ did not please Himself. The Holy Writings say, “The sharp words spoken against you fell on Me.” (Psalm 69: 9)
45015004	Everything that was written in the Holy Writings long ago was written to teach us. By not giving up, God’s Word gives us strength and hope.
45015005	Now the God Who helps you not to give up and gives you strength will help you think so you can please each other as Christ Jesus did.
45015006	Then all of you together can thank the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
45015007	Receive each other as Christ received you. This will honor God.
45015008	Christ came to help the Jews. This proved that God had told the truth to their early fathers. This proved that God would do what He promised.
45015009	This was done so the people who are not Jews can thank God for His loving-kindness. The Holy Writings say, “This is why I will give thanks to you among the people who are not Jews. I will sing to Your name.” (Psalm 18:49)
45015010	It says also, “You who are not Jews, be happy with His people, the Jews.” (Deuteronomy 32:43)
45015011	And, “Honor and give thanks to the Lord, you who are not Jews. Let everyone honor Him.” (Psalm 117:1)
45015012	And Isaiah says, “There will be One from the family of Jesse Who will be a leader over the people who are not Jews. Their hope will be in Him.” (Isaiah 11:10)
45015013	Our hope comes from God. May He fill you with joy and peace because of your trust in Him. May your hope grow stronger by the power of the Holy Spirit.
45015014	I am sure you are wise in all things and full of much good. You are able to help and teach each other.
45015015	I have written to you with strong words about some things. I have written so you would remember. God helped me write like this.
45015016	I am able to write these things because God made me a missionary to the people who are not Jews. I work as a servant of Jesus Christ. I preach the Good News of God so the people who are not Jews may be as a gift to God. The Holy Spirit will set them apart so God will be pleased with them.
45015017	I have reason to be proud of my work for God. It is because I belong to Christ Jesus.
45015018	I can only speak of what Christ has done through me. I have helped the people who are not Jews to obey Him. I have done it by words and by living with them.
45015019	God showed them His power through me. The Holy Spirit did powerful works through me in front of them. From Jerusalem to the country of Illyricum I have preached the Good News of Christ.
45015020	It is my desire to preach the Good News where it has never been preached. I want to preach only where Christ is not known.
45015021	The Holy Writings say, “Those who have never known about Him will see. And those who have never heard about Him will understand.” (Isaiah 52:15)
45015022	This is why I have been kept many times from coming to you.
45015023	But now I am finished with my work here. I have been wanting to come and visit you for many years.
45015024	I hope I can now. I am making plans to go to the country of Spain. On my way there I will stop and visit you. After I have had the joy of visiting you for awhile, you can help me on my way again.
45015025	But now I am going to Jerusalem to hand the Christians the gift of money.
45015026	The churches in the countries of Macedonia and Greece have decided to give money to help some of the poor Christians in Jerusalem.
45015027	They wanted to do it. They should help them in this way because they owe much to the Christians in Jerusalem. The Jews shared the Good News with the people who are not Jews. For this reason, they should share what they can with the Jews.
45015028	I will hand this gift of money to them. Then I will stop to see you on my way to the country of Spain.
45015029	I know that when I come to you, Christ will give me much good to share with you.
45015030	I ask you from my heart, Christian brothers, to pray much for me. I ask this in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
45015031	Pray that God will keep me safe from the people in the country of Judea who are not Christians. Pray also that the work I am to do for the Christians in Jerusalem will help them.
45015032	Then I will be coming to you if God wants me to come. I will be full of joy, and together we can have some rest.
45015033	May our God Who gives us peace, be with you all. Let it be so.
45016001	I want to let you know about our Christian sister Phoebe. She is a helper in the church in the city of Cenchrea.
45016002	The Christians should receive her as a sister who belongs to the Lord. Help her any way you can. She has helped many people and has helped me also.
45016003	Greet Priscilla and Aquila. They worked with me for Christ.
45016004	They almost died for me. I am thankful for them. All the churches that were started among the people who are not Jews are thankful for them also.
45016005	Greet the church that worships in their house. Greet Epaenetus, my much-loved friend. He was the first Christian in the countries of Asia.
45016006	Greet Mary. She worked hard for you.
45016007	Greet Andronicus and Junias. They are from my family and were in prison with me. They put their trust in Christ before I did. They have been respected missionaries.
45016008	Greet Ampliatus. He is a much-loved Christian brother.
45016009	Greet Urbanus. He worked with us for Christ. Greet Stachys, my much-loved friend.
45016010	Greet Apelles. He proved he was faithful to Christ. Greet all the family of Aristobulus.
45016011	Greet Herodian. He is one of my family. Greet the Christians in the family of Narcissus.
45016012	Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa and Persis. They are all much-loved workmen for the Lord.
45016013	Greet Rufus and his mother. She was like a mother to me. Rufus is a good Christian.
45016014	Greet Asyncritus and Phlegon and Hermes and Patrobas and Hermas and all the Christians with them.
45016015	Greet Philologus and Julia and Nereus and his sister and Olympas and all the Christians with them.
45016016	Greet each other with a kiss of holy love. All the churches here greet you.
45016017	I ask you, Christian brothers, watch out for those who make trouble and start fights. Keep your eye on those who work against the teaching you received. Keep away from them.
45016018	Men like that are not working for our Lord Jesus Christ. They are chained to their own desires. With soft words they say things people want to hear. People are fooled by them.
45016019	Everyone knows you have obeyed the teaching you received. I am happy with you because of this. But I want you to be wise about good things and pure about sinful things.
45016020	God, Who is our peace, will soon crush Satan under your feet. May the loving-favor of our Lord Jesus be yours.
45016021	Timothy, my helper, greets you. Lucius and Jason and Sosipater from my family say hello also.
45016022	I, Tertius, who am writing this letter for Paul, greet you as a Christian brother.
45016023	Gaius is the man taking care of me. The church meets here in his house. He greets you. Erastus, the man who takes care of the money for the city, greets you and Quartus does also. He is a Christian brother.
45016024	May you have loving-favor from our Lord Jesus Christ. Let it be so.
45016025	We give honor to God. He is able to make you strong as I preach from the Holy Writings about Jesus Christ. It was a secret hidden from the beginning of the world.
45016026	But now it is for us to know. The early preachers wrote about it. God says it is to be preached to all the people of the world so men can put their trust in God and obey Him.
45016027	May God, Who only is wise, be honored forever through our Lord Jesus Christ. Let it be so.
46001001	This letter is from Paul. I have been chosen by God to be a missionary of Jesus Christ. Sosthenes, a Christian brother, writes also.
46001002	I write to God’s church in the city of Corinth. I write to those who belong to Christ Jesus and to those who are set apart by Him and made holy. I write to all the Christians everywhere who call on the name of Jesus Christ. He is our Lord and their Lord also.
46001003	May you have loving-favor and peace from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
46001004	I am thankful to God all the time for you. I am thankful for the loving-favor God has given to you because you belong to Christ Jesus.
46001005	He has made your lives rich in every way. Now you have power to speak for Him. He gave you good understanding.
46001006	This shows that what I told you about Christ and what He could do for you has been done in your lives.
46001007	You have the gifts of the Holy Spirit that you need while you wait for the Lord Jesus Christ to come again.
46001008	Christ will keep you strong until He comes again. No blame will be held against you.
46001009	God is faithful. He chose you to be joined together with His Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.
46001010	Christian brothers, I ask you with all my heart in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ to agree among yourselves. Do not be divided into little groups. Think and act as if you all had the same mind.
46001011	My Christian brothers, I have heard from some of Chloe’s family that you are arguing among yourselves.
46001012	I hear that some of you are saying, “I am a follower of Paul,” and “I am a follower of Apollos,” and “I am a follower of Peter,” and “I am a follower of Christ.”
46001013	Has Christ been divided? Was Paul put on a cross to die for your sins? Were you baptized in the name of Paul?
46001014	I am thankful to God that I baptized Crispus and Gaius only.
46001015	No one can say that you were baptized in the name of Paul.
46001016	I remember I did baptize the family of Stephanas, but I do not remember baptizing any others.
46001017	Christ did not send me to baptize. He sent me to preach the Good News. I did not use big sounding words when I preached. If I had, the power of the cross of Christ would be taken away.
46001018	Preaching about the cross sounds foolish to those who are dying in sin. But it is the power of God to those of us who are being saved from the punishment of sin.
46001019	The Holy Writings say, “I will destroy the wisdom of the wise people. I will put aside the learning of those who think they know a lot.” (Isaiah 29:14)
46001020	Where is the man who is wise? Where is the man who thinks he knows a lot? Where is the man who thinks he has all the answers? God has made the wisdom of this world look foolish.
46001021	In His wisdom, He did not allow man to come to know Him through the wisdom of this world. It pleased God to save men from the punishment of their sins through preaching the Good News. This preaching sounds foolish.
46001022	The Jews are looking for something special to see. The Greek people are looking for the answer in wisdom.
46001023	But we preach that Christ died on a cross to save them from their sins. These words are hard for the Jews to listen to. The Greek people think it is foolish.
46001024	Christ is the power and wisdom of God to those who are chosen to be saved from the punishment of sin for both Jews and Greeks.
46001025	God’s plan looked foolish to men, but it is wiser than the best plans of men. God’s plan which may look weak is stronger than the strongest plans of men.
46001026	Christian brothers, think who you were when the Lord called you. Not many of you were wise or powerful or born into the family of leaders of a country.
46001027	But God has chosen what the world calls foolish to shame the wise. He has chosen what the world calls weak to shame what is strong.
46001028	God has chosen what is weak and foolish of the world, what is hated and not known, to destroy the things the world trusts in.
46001029	In that way, no man can be proud as he stands before God.
46001030	God Himself made the way so you can have new life through Christ Jesus. God gave us Christ to be our wisdom. Christ made us right with God and set us apart for God and made us holy. Christ bought us with His blood and made us free from our sins.
46001031	It is as the Holy Writings say, “If anyone is going to be proud of anything, he should be proud of the Lord.”
46002001	Christian brothers, when I came to you, I did not preach the secrets of God with big sounding words or make it sound as if I were so wise.
46002002	I made up my mind that while I was with you I would speak of nothing except Jesus Christ and of His death on the cross.
46002003	When I was with you, I was weak. I was afraid and I shook.
46002004	What I had to say when I preached was not in big sounding words of man’s wisdom. But it was given in the power of the Holy Spirit.
46002005	In this way, you do not have faith in Christ because of the wisdom of men. You have faith in Christ because of the power of God.
46002006	We speak wisdom to full-grown Christians. This wisdom is not from this world or from the leaders of today. They die and their wisdom dies with them.
46002007	What we preach is God’s wisdom. It was a secret until now. God planned for us to have this honor before the world began.
46002008	None of the world leaders understood this wisdom. If they had, they would not have put Christ up on a cross to die. He is the Lord of shining-greatness.
46002009	The Holy Writings say, “No eye has ever seen or no ear has ever heard or no mind has ever thought of the wonderful things God has made ready for those who love Him.” (Isaiah 64:4; 65:17)
46002010	God has shown these things to us through His Holy Spirit. It is the Holy Spirit Who looks into all things, even the secrets of God, and shows them to us.
46002011	Who can know the things about a man, except a man’s own spirit that is in him? It is the same with God. Who can understand Him except the Holy Spirit?
46002012	We have not received the spirit of the world. God has given us His Holy Spirit that we may know about the things given to us by Him.
46002013	We speak about these things also. We do not use words of man’s wisdom. We use words given to us by the Holy Spirit. We use these words to tell what the Holy Spirit wants to say to those who put their trust in Him.
46002014	But the person who is not a Christian does not understand these words from the Holy Spirit. He thinks they are foolish. He cannot understand them because he does not have the Holy Spirit to help him understand.
46002015	The full-grown Christian understands all things, and yet he is not understood.
46002016	For who has the thoughts of the Lord? Who can tell Him what to do? But we have the thoughts of Christ.
46003001	Christian brothers, I could not speak to you as to full-grown Christians. I spoke to you as men who have not obeyed the things you have been taught. I spoke to you as if you were baby Christians.
46003002	My teaching was as if I were giving you milk to drink. I could not give you meat because you were not ready for it. Even yet you are not able to have anything but milk.
46003003	You still live as men who are not Christians. When you are jealous and fight with each other, you are still living in sin and acting like sinful men in the world.
46003004	When one says, “I am a follower of Paul,” and another says, “I am a follower of Apollos,” does not this sound like the talk of baby Christians?
46003005	Who is Apollos? Who is Paul? We are only servants owned by God. He gave us gifts to preach His Word. And because of that, you put your trust in Christ.
46003006	I planted the seed. Apollos watered it, but it was God Who kept it growing.
46003007	This shows that the one who plants or the one who waters is not the important one. God is the important One. He makes it grow.
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters are alike. Each one will receive his own reward.
46003009	For we work together with God. You are God’s field. You are God’s building also.
46003010	Through God’s loving-favor to me, I laid the stones on which the building was to be built. I did it like one who knew what he was doing. Now another person is building on it. Each person who builds must be careful how he builds on it.
46003011	Jesus Christ is the Stone on which other stones for the building must be laid. It can be only Christ.
46003012	Now if a man builds on the Stone with gold or silver or beautiful stones, or if he builds with wood or grass or straw,
46003013	each man’s work will become known. There will be a day when it will be tested by fire. The fire will show what kind of work it is.
46003014	If a man builds on work that lasts, he will receive his reward.
46003015	If his work is burned up, he will lose it. Yet he himself will be saved as if he were going through a fire.
46003016	Do you not know that you are a house of God and that the Holy Spirit lives in you?
46003017	If any man destroys the house of God, God will destroy him. God’s house is holy. You are the place where He lives.
46003018	Do not fool yourself. If anyone thinks he knows a lot about the things of this world, he had better become a fool. Then he may become wise.
46003019	The wisdom of this world is foolish to God. The Holy Writings say, “He is the One Who gets them in a trap when they use their own wisdom.” (Job 5:13)
46003020	They also say, “The Lord knows how the wise man thinks. His thinking is worth nothing.” (Psalm 94:11)
46003021	As a Christian, do not be proud of men and of what they can do. All things belong to you.
46003022	Paul and Apollos and Peter belong to you. The world and life and death belong to you. Things now and things to come belong to you.
46003023	You belong to Christ, and Christ belongs to God.
46004001	Think of us as servants who are owned by Christ. It is our job to share the secrets of God.
46004002	A servant must be faithful to his owner. This is expected of him.
46004003	It is not the most important thing to me what you or any other people think of me. Even what I think of myself does not mean much.
46004004	As for me, my heart tells me I am not guilty of anything. But that does not prove I am free from guilt. It is the Lord Who looks into my life and says what is wrong.
46004005	Do not be quick to say who is right or wrong. Wait until the Lord comes. He will bring into the light the things that are hidden in men’s hearts. He will show why men have done these things. Every man will receive from God the thanks he should have.
46004006	Christian brothers, I have used Apollos and myself to show you what I am talking about. This is to help you so you will not think more of men than what God’s Word will allow. Never think more of one of God’s servants than another.
46004007	Who made you better than your brother? Or what do you have that has not been given to you? If God has given you everything, why do you have pride? Why do you act as if He did not give it to you?
46004008	You are full. You are rich. You live like kings and we do not. I wish you were kings and we could be leaders with you.
46004009	I think that God has made a show of us missionaries. We are the last and the least among men. We are like men waiting to be put to death. The whole world, men and angels alike, are watching us.
46004010	We are thought of as fools because of Christ. But you are thought of as wise Christians! We are weak. You are strong. People respect you. They have no respect for us.
46004011	To this hour we are hungry and thirsty, and our clothes are worn out. People hurt us. We have no homes.
46004012	We work with our hands to make a living. We speak kind words to those who speak against us. When people hurt us, we say nothing.
46004013	When people say bad things about us, we answer with kind words. People think of us as dirt that is worth nothing and as the worst thing on earth to this day.
46004014	I do not write these things to shame you. I am doing this to help you know what you should do. You are my much-loved children.
46004015	You may have 10,000 Christian teachers. But remember, I am the only father you have. You became Christians when I preached the Good News to you.
46004016	So I ask you with all my heart to follow the way I live.
46004017	For this reason I have sent Timothy to you. He is my much-loved child and a faithful Christian. He will tell you how I act as a Christian. This is the kind of life I teach in the churches wherever I go.
46004018	Some of you are full of pride. You think that I am not coming to visit you.
46004019	If the Lord wants me to, I will come soon. I will find out when I come if these proud people have God’s power, or if they just use a lot of big words.
46004020	The holy nation of God is not made up of words. It is made up of power.
46004021	What do you want? Do you want me to come with a stick to whip you? Or do you want me to come with love and a gentle spirit?
46005001	Someone has told me about a sex sin among you. It is so bad that even the people who do not know God would not do it. I have been told that one of the men is living with his father’s wife as if she were his wife.
46005002	Instead of being sorry, you are proud of yourselves. The man who is living like that should be sent away from you.
46005003	I am far from you. Even if I am not there, my spirit is with you. I have already said that the man is guilty of this sin. I am saying this as if I were there with you.
46005004	Call a meeting of the church. I will be with you in spirit. In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, and by His power,
46005005	hand this person over to the devil. His body is to be destroyed so his spirit may be saved on the day the Lord comes again.
46005006	It is not good for you to be proud of the way things are going in your church. You know a little yeast makes the whole loaf of bread rise.
46005007	Clean out the old yeast. Then you will be new bread with none of the old yeast in you. The Jews killed lambs when they left Egypt. Christ is our lamb. He has already been killed as a gift on the altar to God for us.
46005008	Bread with yeast in it is like being full of sin and hate. Let us eat this supper together with bread that has no yeast in it. This bread is pure and true.
46005009	I told you in my letter not to keep on being with people who do any kind of sex sins.
46005010	I was not talking about people doing sex sins who are bad people of this world. I was not talking about people of this world who always want to get more or those who get things in a wrong way or those who worship false gods. To get away from people like that you would have to leave this world!
46005011	What I wrote was that you should not keep on being with a person who calls himself a Christian if he does any kind of sex sins. You should not even eat with a person who says he is a Christian but always wants to get more of everything or uses bad language or who gets drunk or gets things in a wrong way.
46005012	It is not for me to judge those outside the church. You are to judge those who belong to the church.
46005013	God will judge those outside the church. So you must put that sinful person out of your church.
46006001	Why do you go to court when you have something against another Christian? You are asking people who are not Christians to judge who is guilty. You should go to those who belong to Christ and ask them.
46006002	Did you not know that those who belong to Christ will someday judge this world? If you judge the people of the world as guilty, are you not able to do this in small things?
46006003	Did you not know that we are to judge angels? So you should be able to take care of your problem here in this world without any trouble.
46006004	When you have things to decide about this life, why do you go to men in courts who are not even Christians?
46006005	You should be ashamed! Is it true that there is not one person wise enough in your church to decide who is right when people argue?
46006006	Instead, one Christian takes another Christian to court. And that court is made up of people who are not Christians!
46006007	This shows you are wrong when you have to go to court against each other. Would it not be better to let someone do something against you that is wrong? Would it not be better to let them rob you?
46006008	Instead, you rob and do wrong to other Christians.
46006009	Do you not know that sinful men will have no place in the holy nation of God? Do not be fooled. A person who does sex sins, or who worships false gods, or who is not faithful in marriage, or men who act like women, or people who do sex sins with their own sex, will have no place in the holy nation of God.
46006010	Also those who steal, or those who always want to get more of everything, or who get drunk, or who say bad things about others, or take things that are not theirs, will have no place in the holy nation of God.
46006011	Some of you were like that. But now your sins are washed away. You were set apart for God-like living to do His work. You were made right with God through our Lord Jesus Christ by the Spirit of our God.
46006012	I am allowed to do all things, but not everything is good for me to do! Even if I am free to do all things, I will not do them if I think it would be hard for me to stop when I know I should.
46006013	Food was meant for the stomach. The stomach needs food, but God will bring to an end both food and the stomach. The body was not meant for sex sins. It was meant to work for the Lord. The Lord is for our body.
46006014	God raised the Lord from death. He will raise us from death by His power also.
46006015	Do you not know that your bodies are a part of Christ Himself? Am I to take a part of Christ and make it a part of a woman who sells the use of her body? No! Never!
46006016	Do you not know that a man who joins himself to a woman who sells the use of her body becomes a part of her? The Holy Writings say, “The two will become one.”
46006017	But if you join yourself to the Lord, you are one with Him in spirit.
46006018	Have nothing to do with sex sins! Any other sin that a man does, does not hurt his own body. But the man who does a sex sin sins against his own body.
46006019	Do you not know that your body is a house of God where the Holy Spirit lives? God gave you His Holy Spirit. Now you belong to God. You do not belong to yourselves.
46006020	God bought you with a great price. So honor God with your body. You belong to Him.
46007001	You asked me some questions in your letter. This is my answer. It is good if a man does not get married.
46007002	But because of being tempted to sex sins, each man should get married and have his own wife. Each woman should get married and have her own husband.
46007003	The husband should please his wife as a husband. The wife should please her husband as a wife.
46007004	The wife is not the boss of her own body. It belongs to the husband. And in the same way, the husband is not the boss of his own body. It belongs to the wife.
46007005	Do not keep from each other that which belongs to each other in marriage unless you agree for awhile so you can use your time to pray. Then come together again or the devil will tempt you to do that which you know you should not do.
46007006	This is what I think. I am not saying you must do it.
46007007	I wish everyone were as I am, but each has his own gift from God. One has one gift. Another has another gift.
46007008	This is what I say to those who are not married and to women whose husbands have died. It is good if you do not get married. I am not married.
46007009	But if you are not able to keep from doing that which you know is wrong, get married. It is better to get married than to have such strong sex desires.
46007010	I have this to say to those who are married. These words are from the Lord. A wife should not leave her husband,
46007011	but if she does leave him, she should not get married to another man. It would be better for her to go back to her husband. The husband should not divorce his wife.
46007012	I have this to say. These words are not from the Lord. If a Christian husband has a wife who is not a Christian, and she wants to live with him, he must not divorce her.
46007013	If a Christian wife has a husband who is not a Christian, and he wants to live with her, she must not divorce him.
46007014	The husband who is not a Christian is set apart from the sin of the world because of his Christian wife. The wife who is not a Christian is set apart from the sin of the world because of her Christian husband. In this way, the lives of the children are not unclean because of sin, they are clean.
46007015	If the one who is not a Christian wants to leave, let that one go. The Christian husband or wife should not try to make the other one stay. God wants you to live in peace.
46007016	Christian wife, how do you know you will not help your husband to become a Christian? Or Christian husband, how do you know you will not help your wife to become a Christian?
46007017	Everyone should live the life the Lord gave to him. He should live as he was when he became a Christian. This is what I teach in all the churches.
46007018	If a man became a Christian after he had gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew, he should do nothing about it. If a man became a Christian before, he should not go through the religious act of becoming a Jew.
46007019	If it is done or not done, it means nothing. What is important is to obey God’s Word.
46007020	Everyone should stay the same way he was when he became a Christian.
46007021	Were you a servant who was owned by someone when you became a Christian? Do not worry about it. But if you are able to become free, do that.
46007022	A servant who is owned by someone and who has become a Christian is the Lord’s free man. A free man who has become a Christian is a servant owned by Christ.
46007023	He paid a great price for you when He bought you. Do not let yourselves become servants owned by men.
46007024	Christian brothers, each one should stay as he was when he became a Christian.
46007025	I have no word from the Lord about women or men who have never been married. I will tell you what I think. You can trust me because the Lord has given me His loving-kindness.
46007026	I think, because of the troubles that are coming, it is a good thing for a person not to get married.
46007027	Are you married to a wife? Do not try to get a divorce. If you are not married, do not look for a wife.
46007028	If you do get married, you have not sinned. If a woman who is not married gets married, it is no sin. But being married will add problems. I would like to have you free from such problems.
46007029	I mean this, Christian brothers. The time is short. A married man should use his time as if he did not have a wife.
46007030	Those who have sorrow should keep on working as if they had no sorrow. Those who have joy should keep on working as if there was no time for joy. Those who buy should have no time to get joy from what they have.
46007031	While you live in this world, live as if the world has no hold on you. The way of this world will soon be gone.
46007032	I want you to be free from the cares of this world. The man who is not married can spend his time working for the Lord and pleasing Him.
46007033	The man who is married cares for the things of the world. He wants to please his wife.
46007034	Married women and women who have never been married are different. The woman who has never been married can spend her time working for the Lord. She wants to please the Lord with her body and spirit. The woman who is married cares for the things of the world. She wants to please her husband.
46007035	I am saying these things to help you. I am not trying to keep you from getting married. I want you to do what is best. You should work for Him without other things taking your time.
46007036	If a man and woman expect to get married, and he thinks his desires to marry her are getting too strong, and she is getting older, they should get married. It is no sin.
46007037	But if a man has the power to keep from getting married and knows in his mind that he should not, he is wise if he does not get married.
46007038	The man who gets married does well, but the man who does not get married does better.
46007039	A wife is not free as long as her husband lives. If her husband dies, she is free to marry anyone she wants, if he is a Christian.
46007040	I think she will be much more happy if she does not get married again. This is what I think. I believe it is what the Holy Spirit is saying.
46008001	I want to write about food that has been given as a gift in worship to a false god. We all know something about it. Knowing about it makes one feel important. But love makes one strong.
46008002	The person who thinks he knows all the answers still has a lot to learn.
46008003	But if he loves God, he is known by God also.
