46008004	What about food that has been given as a gift to a false god in worship? Is it right? We know that a false god is not a god at all. There is only one God! There is no other.
46008005	Men have thought there are many such gods and lords in the sky and on the earth.
46008006	But we know there is only one God. He is the Father. All things are from Him. He made us for Himself. There is one Lord. He is Jesus Christ. He made all things. He keeps us alive.
46008007	Not all men know this. They have given food as a gift in worship to a god as if the god were alive. Some men have done this all their lives. If they eat such food, their hearts tell them it is wrong.
46008008	Food will not bring us near to God. We are no worse if we do not eat it, or we are no better if we eat it.
46008009	Since you are free to do as you please, be careful that this does not hurt a weak Christian.
46008010	A Christian who is weak may see you eat food in a place where it has been given as a gift to false gods in worship. Since he sees you eat it, he will eat it also.
46008011	You may make the weak Christian fall into sin by what you have done. Remember, he is a Christian brother for whom Christ died.
46008012	When you sin against a weak Christian by making him do what is wrong, you sin against Christ.
46008013	So then, if eating meat makes my Christian brother trip and fall, I will never eat it again. I do not want to make my Christian brother sin.
46009001	Am I not a missionary? Am I not Free? Have I not seen Jesus our Lord? Are you not Christians because of the work I have done for the Lord?
46009002	Other people may not think of me as a missionary, but you do. It proves I am a missionary because you are Christians now.
46009003	When people ask questions about me, I say this:
46009004	Do we not have the right to have food and drink when we are working for the Lord?
46009005	Do we not have the right to take a Christian wife along with us? The other missionaries do. The Lord’s brothers do and Peter does.
46009006	Are Barnabas and I the only ones who should keep working for a living so we can preach?
46009007	Have you ever heard of a soldier who goes to war and pays for what he needs himself? Have you ever heard of a man planting a field of grapes and not eating some of the fruit? Have you ever heard of a farmer who feeds cattle and does not drink some of the milk?
46009008	These things are not just what men think are right to do. God’s Law speaks about this.
46009009	God gave Moses the Law. It says, “When the cow is made to walk on the grain to break it open, do not stop it from eating some.” (Deuteronomy 25:4) Does God care about the cow?
46009010	Did not God speak about this because of us. For sure, this was written for us. The man who gets the fields ready and the man who gathers in the grain should expect some of the grain.
46009011	We have planted God’s Word among you. Is it too much to expect you to give us what we need to live each day?
46009012	If other people have the right to expect this from you, do we not have more right? But we have not asked this of you. We have suffered many things. We did this so the Good News of Christ would not be held back.
46009013	You must know that those who work in the house of God get their food there. Those who work at the altar in the house of God get a part of the food that is given there.
46009014	The Lord has said also that those who preach the Good News should get their living from those who hear it.
46009015	I have not used any of these things. I am not writing now to get anything. I would rather die than lose the joy of preaching to you without you paying me.
46009016	I cannot be proud because I preach the Good News. I have been told to do it. It would be bad for me if I do not preach the Good News.
46009017	If I do this because I want to, I will get my reward. If I do not want to do it, I am still expected to do it.
46009018	Then what is my reward? It is when I preach the Good News without you paying me. I do not ask you to pay me as I could.
46009019	No man has any hold on me, but I have made myself a workman owned by all. I do this so I might lead more people to Christ.
46009020	I became as a Jew to the Jews so I might lead them to Christ. There are some who live by obeying the Jewish Law. I became as one who lives by obeying the Jewish Law so I might lead them to Christ.
46009021	There are some who live by not obeying the Jewish law. I became as one who lives by not obeying the Jewish law so I might lead them to Christ. This does not mean that I do not obey God’s Law. I obey the teachings of Christ.
46009022	Some are weak. I have become weak so I might lead them to Christ. I have become like every person so in every way I might lead some to Christ.
46009023	Everything I do, I do to get the Good News to men. I want to have a part in this work.
46009024	You know that only one person gets a crown for being in a race even if many people run. You must run so you will win the crown.
46009025	Everyone who runs in a race does many things so his body will be strong. He does it to get a crown that will soon be worth nothing, but we work for a crown that will last forever.
46009026	In the same way, I run straight for the place at the end of the race. I fight to win. I do not beat the air.
46009027	I keep working over my body. I make it obey me. I do this because I am afraid that after I have preached the Good News to others, I myself might be put aside.
46010001	Christian brothers, I want you to know what happened to our early fathers. They all walked from the country of Egypt under the cloud that showed them the way, and they all passed through the waters of the Red Sea.
46010002	They were all baptized as they followed Moses in the cloud and in the sea.
46010003	All of them ate the same holy food.
46010004	They all drank the same holy drink. They drank from a holy Rock that went along with them. That holy Rock was Christ.
46010005	Even then most of them did not please God. He destroyed them in the desert.
46010006	These things show us something. They teach us not to want things that are bad for us like those people did.
46010007	We must not worship false gods as some of them did. The Holy Writings tell us, “The people sat down to eat and drink. Then they got up to play.” (Exodus 32:6)
46010008	We must not do sex sins as some of them did. In one day 23,000 died.
46010009	We must not test the Lord as some of them did. They were destroyed by snakes.
46010010	We must not complain against God as some of them did. That is why they were destroyed.
46010011	All these things happened to show us something. They were written to teach us that the end of the world is near.
46010012	So watch yourself! The person who thinks he can stand against sin had better watch that he does not fall into sin.
46010013	You have never been tempted to sin in any different way than other people. God is faithful. He will not allow you to be tempted more than you can take. But when you are tempted, He will make a way for you to keep from falling into sin.
46010014	My dear friends, keep away from the worship of false gods.
46010015	I am speaking to you who are able to understand. See if what I am saying is true.
46010016	When we give thanks for the fruit of the vine at the Lord’s supper, are we not sharing in the blood of Christ? The bread we eat at the Lord’s supper, are we not sharing in the body of Christ?
46010017	There is one bread, and many of us Christians make up the body of Christ. All of us eat from that bread.
46010018	Look at the Jews. They ate the animals that were brought to God as gifts in worship and put on the altar. Did this not show they were sharing with God?
46010019	What do I mean? Am I saying that a false god or the food brought to it in worship is worth anything?
46010020	No, not at all! I am saying that the people who do not know God bring gifts of animals in worship. But they have given them to demons, not to God. You do not want to have any share with demons.
46010021	You cannot drink from the cup of the Lord and from the cup of demons. You cannot eat at the Lord’s table and at the demon’s table.
46010022	Are we trying to make the Lord jealous? Do we think we are stronger than the Lord?
46010023	We are allowed to do anything, but not everything is good for us to do. We are allowed to do anything, but not all things help us grow strong as Christians.
46010024	Do not work only for your own good. Think of what you can do for others.
46010025	Eat any meat that is sold in the stores. Ask no questions about it. Then your heart will not say it is wrong.
46010026	The Holy Writings say, “The earth and everything in it belongs to the Lord.” (Psalm 24:1)
46010027	If a person who is not a Christian wants you to eat with him, and you want to go, eat anything that is on the table. Ask no questions about the food. Then your heart will not say it is wrong.
46010028	But if someone says, “This meat has been given as a gift to false gods in worship,” do not eat it. In that way, it will not hurt the faith of the one who told you and his heart will have peace.
46010029	How the other person feels is important. We are not free to do things that will hurt another person.
46010030	If I can give thanks to God for my food, why should anyone say that I am wrong about eating food I can give thanks for?
46010031	So if you eat or drink or whatever you do, do everything to honor God.
46010032	Do nothing that would make trouble for a Greek or for a Jew or for the church of God.
46010033	I want to please everyone in all that I do. I am not thinking of myself. I want to do what is best for them so they may be saved from the punishment of sin.
46011001	Follow my way of thinking as I follow Christ.
46011002	I think you have done well because you always remember me and have followed the things I taught you.
46011003	I want you to know that Christ is the head of every man. The husband is the head of his wife. God is the head of Christ.
46011004	If any man prays or preaches with his head covered, he does not give honor to Christ.
46011005	Every woman who prays or preaches without her head covered does not respect her head. It is the same as if she had her hair cut off.
46011006	If a woman does not cover her head, she might as well cut off her hair also. If a woman is ashamed to have her hair cut off, she should cover her head.
46011007	Man is made like God and His shining-greatness. For this reason a man should not have his head covered when he prays or preaches, but the woman respects the man.
46011008	Man was not made from woman. Woman was made from man,
46011009	and man was not made for woman. Woman was made for man.
46011010	For this reason a woman should have a covering on her head. This shows she respects man. This is for the angels to see also.
46011011	In God’s plan women need men and men need women.
46011012	Woman was made from man, but man is born of woman. God made all things.
46011013	Think this over yourselves. Does it look right for a woman to pray with no covering on her head?
46011014	Have we not already learned that it is a shame for a man to have long hair?
46011015	But a woman can be proud to have long hair. Her hair is given to her for a covering.
46011016	If anyone wants to argue about this, my answer is that this is what we teach, and all the churches agree with me.
46011017	While writing about these things, let me tell you what I think. Nothing good is coming from your meeting together.
46011018	First of all, I hear that when you meet together in the church you are divided into groups and you argue. I almost believe this is true.
46011019	For there must be different groups among you. In that way, those who are right will be seen from those who are wrong.
46011020	When you gather together for your meetings, it is not to eat the Lord’s supper.
46011021	Each one is in a hurry to eat his own food first. He does not wait for others. In this way, one does not get enough food and drink. Others get too much and get drunk.
46011022	You have your own homes to eat and drink in. Or do you hate the church of God and shame those who are poor? What am I to say to you? Am I to say you are right? No! I cannot say you are right in this.
46011023	I have given you the teaching I received from the Lord. The night Jesus was handed over to the soldiers, He took bread.
46011024	When He had given thanks, He broke it and said, “Take this bread and eat it. This is My body which is broken for you. Do this to remember Me.”
46011025	In the same way after supper, He took the cup. He said, “This cup is the New Way of Worship made between God and you by My blood. Whenever you drink it, do it to remember Me.”
46011026	Every time you eat this bread and drink from this cup you are telling of the Lord’s death until He comes again.
46011027	Anyone who eats the bread or drinks from the cup, if his spirit is not right with the Lord, will be guilty of sinning against the body and the blood of the Lord.
46011028	This is why a man should look into his own heart and life before eating the bread and drinking from the cup.
46011029	Anyone who eats the bread and drinks from the cup, if his spirit is not right with the Lord, will be guilty as he eats and drinks. He does not understand the meaning of the Lord’s body.
46011030	This is why some of you are sick and weak, and some have died.
46011031	But if we would look into our own lives and see if we are guilty, then God would not have to say we are guilty.
46011032	When we are guilty, we are punished by the Lord so we will not be told we are guilty with the rest of the world.
46011033	Christian brothers, when you come together to eat, wait for each other.
46011034	If anyone is hungry, he should eat at home. Then he will not be guilty as you meet together. I will talk about the other things when I come.
46012001	Christian brothers, I want you to know about the gifts of the Holy Spirit. You need to understand the truth about this.
46012002	You know that before you were Christians you were led to worship false gods. None of these gods could speak.
46012003	So I tell you that no one speaking by the help of the Holy Spirit can say that he hates Jesus. No one can say, “Jesus is Lord,” except by the help of the Holy Spirit.
46012004	There are different kinds of gifts. But it is the same Holy Spirit Who gives them.
46012005	There are different kinds of work to be done for Him. But the work is for the same Lord.
46012006	There are different ways of doing His work. But it is the same God who uses all these ways in all people.
46012007	The Holy Spirit works in each person in one way or another for the good of all.
46012008	One person is given the gift of teaching words of wisdom. Another person is given the gift of teaching what he has learned and knows. These gifts are by the same Holy Spirit.
46012009	One person receives the gift of faith. Another person receives the gifts of healing. These gifts are given by the same Holy Spirit.
46012010	One person is given the gift of doing powerful works. Another person is given the gift of speaking God’s Word. Another person is given the gift of telling the difference between the Holy Spirit and false spirits. Another person is given the gift of speaking in special sounds. Another person is given the gift of telling what these special sounds mean.
46012011	But it is the same Holy Spirit, the Spirit of God, Who does all these things. He gives to each person as He wants to give.
46012012	Our own body has many parts. When all these many parts are put together, they are only one body. The body of Christ is like this.
46012013	It is the same way with us. Jews or those who are not Jews, men who are owned by someone or men who are free to do what they want to do, have all been baptized into the one body by the same Holy Spirit. We have all received the one Spirit.
46012014	The body is not one part, but many parts.
46012015	If the foot should say, “I am not a part of the body because I am not a hand,” that would not stop it from being a part of the body.
46012016	If the ear should say, “I am not a part of the body because I am not an eye,” that would not stop it from being a part of the body.
46012017	If the whole body were an eye how would it hear? If the whole body were an ear, how would it smell?
46012018	But God has put all the parts into the body just as He wants to have them.
46012019	If all the parts were the same, it could not be a body.
46012020	But now there are many parts, but one body.
46012021	The eye cannot say to the hand, “I do not need you.” Or the head cannot say to the feet, “I do not need you.”
46012022	Some of the parts we think are weak and not important are very important.
46012023	We take good care of and cover with clothes the parts of the body that look less important. The parts which do not look beautiful have an important work to do.
46012024	The parts that can be seen do not need as much care. God has made the body so more care is given to the parts that need it most.
46012025	This is so the body will not be divided into parts. All the parts care for each other.
46012026	If one part of the body suffers, all the other parts suffer with it. If one part is given special care, the other parts are happy.
46012027	You are all a part of the body of Christ.
46012028	God has chosen different ones in the church to do His work. First, there are missionaries. Second, there are preachers or those who speak for God. And third, there are teachers. He has also chosen those who do powerful works and those who have the gifts of healing. And He has chosen those who help others who are in need and those who are able to lead others in work and those who speak in special sounds.
46012029	Are they all missionaries? No. Are they all preachers or those who speak for God? No. Do they all do powerful works? No.
46012030	Do they all have the gifts of healing? No. Do they all speak in special sounds? No. Are they all able to tell what the special sounds mean? No.
46012031	But from your heart you should want the best gifts. Now I will show you even a better way.
46013001	I may be able to speak the languages of men and even of angels, but if I do not have love, it will sound like noisy brass.
46013002	If I have the gift of speaking God’s Word and if I understand all secrets, but do not have love, I am nothing. If I know all things and if I have the gift of faith so I can move mountains, but do not have love, I am nothing.
46013003	If I give everything I have to feed poor people and if I give my body to be burned, but do not have love, it will not help me.
46013004	Love does not give up. Love is kind. Love is not jealous. Love does not put itself up as being important. Love has no pride.
46013005	Love does not do the wrong thing. Love never thinks of itself. Love does not get angry. Love does not remember the suffering that comes from being hurt by someone.
46013006	Love is not happy with sin. Love is happy with the truth.
46013007	Love takes everything that comes without giving up. Love believes all things. Love hopes for all things. Love keeps on in all things.
46013008	Love never comes to an end. The gift of speaking God’s Word will come to an end. The gift of speaking in special sounds will be stopped. The gift of understanding will come to an end.
46013009	For we only know a part now, and we speak only a part.
46013010	When everything is perfect, then we will not need these gifts that are not perfect.
46013011	When I was a child, I spoke like a child. I thought like a child. I understood like a child. Now I am a man. I do not act like a child anymore.
46013012	Now that which we see is as if we were looking in a broken mirror. But then we will see everything. Now I know only a part. But then I will know everything in a perfect way. That is how God knows me right now.
46013013	And now we have these three: faith and hope and love, but the greatest of these is love.
46014001	You should want to have this love. You should want the gifts of the Holy Spirit and most of all to be able to speak God’s Word.
46014002	The man who speaks in special sounds speaks to God. He is not speaking to men. No one understands. He is speaking secret things through the power of the Holy Spirit.
46014003	The man who speaks God’s Word speaks to men. It helps them to learn and understand. It gives them comfort.
46014004	The man who speaks in special sounds receives strength. The man who speaks God’s Word gives strength to the church.
46014005	I wish all of you spoke in special sounds. But more than that, I wish all of you spoke God’s Word. The one who speaks God’s Word has a more important gift than the one who speaks in special sounds. But if he can tell what he is speaking, the church will be helped.
46014006	Christian brothers, if I come to you speaking in special sounds, what good is it to you? But if I tell you something God has shown me or something I have learned or what God’s Word says will happen in the future or teach you God’s Word, it will be for your good.
46014007	There are things on which people play music. If strange sounds are made on these, how will others know which one is played?
46014008	If a horn does not make a good sound, how will men know they are to get ready to fight?
46014009	It is the same if you speak to a person in special sounds. How will he know what you say? Your sounds will be lost in the air.
46014010	There are many languages in the world. All of them have meaning to the people who understand them.
46014011	But if I do not understand the language someone uses to speak to me, the man who speaks is a stranger to me. I am a stranger to him.
46014012	Since you want gifts from the Holy Spirit, ask for those that will build up the whole church.
46014013	So the man who speaks in special sounds should pray for the gift to be able to tell what they mean.
46014014	If I pray in special sounds, my spirit is doing the praying. My mind does not understand.
46014015	What should I do? I will pray with my spirit and I will pray with my mind also. I will sing with my spirit and I will sing with my mind also.
46014016	If you honor and give thanks to God with your spirit in sounds nobody understands, how can others honor and give thanks also if they do not know what you are saying?
46014017	You are honoring and giving thanks to God, but it is not helping other people.
46014018	I thank God that I speak in special sounds more than all of you.
46014019	But in a meeting of the church, it is better if I say five words that others can understand and be helped by than 10,000 words in special sounds.
46014020	Christian brothers, do not be like children in your thinking. Be full-grown, but be like children in not knowing how to sin.
46014021	God says in the Holy Writings, “I will speak to My people. I will speak through men from other lands in other languages. Even then My people will not listen to Me.” (Isaiah 28: 11–12)
46014022	So then speaking in special sounds is for those who do not believe. It is not for those who believe. But speaking God’s Word is for those who believe. It is not for those who do not believe.
46014023	If some people who are not Christians come to your church meeting while all the people are speaking in special sounds, they will think you are crazy.
46014024	But if a man who is not a Christian comes to your church meeting while you are all speaking God’s Word, he will understand that he is a sinner by what he hears. He will know he is guilty.
46014025	The secrets of his heart will be brought into the open. He will get on his knees and worship God. He will say, “For sure, God is here with you!”
46014026	What am I saying, Christian brothers? When you meet together for worship, some of you have a song to sing. Some of you want to teach and some have special words from God. Some of you speak in special sounds and some of you tell what they mean. Everything should be done to help those who are meeting together to grow strong as Christians.
46014027	No more than two or three people should speak in special sounds. Only one should speak at a time. Someone must tell the meaning of the special sounds.
46014028	If no one is there who can tell the meaning of the special sounds, he should not speak in the church. He should speak only to himself and to God.
46014029	Two or three should speak God’s Word. The other people should listen and decide if they are speaking right.
46014030	If someone sitting in the meeting gets some special word from God, the one who is speaking should stop.
46014031	All of you can speak God’s Word, but only one person at a time. In that way, all of you can learn and be helped.
46014032	Men who speak God’s Word are able to stop when they should.
46014033	God does not want everyone speaking at the same time in church meetings. He wants peace. All the churches of God’s people worship this way.
46014034	Women should not be allowed to speak in church meetings. They are to obey this teaching. The Law says this also.
46014035	If they want to find out about something, they should ask their husbands at home. It is a shame for a woman to speak in a church meeting.
46014036	Did the Word of God come from you Christians in the city of Corinth? Or are you the only people who received it?
46014037	Some of you may think you have the gift of speaking God’s Word or some other gift from the Holy Spirit. If you do, you should know that what I am writing to you is what God has told us we must obey.
46014038	If any man does not listen to this, have nothing to do with him.
46014039	So then, my Christian brothers, you should want to speak God’s Word. Do not stop anyone from speaking in special sounds.
46014040	All things should be done in the right way, one after the other.
46015001	Christian brothers, I want to tell the Good News to you again. It is the same as I preached to you before. You received it and your faith has been made strong by it.
46015002	This is what I preached to you. You are saved from the punishment of sin by the Good News if you keep hold of it, unless your faith was worth nothing.
46015003	First of all, I taught you what I had received. It was this: Christ died for our sins as the Holy Writings said He would. (53:5–12)
46015004	Christ was buried. He was raised from the dead three days later as the Holy Writings said He would. (Psalm 16:9–10)
46015005	Christ was seen by Peter. After that, the twelve followers saw Him.
46015006	After that, more than 500 of His followers saw Him at one time. Most of them are still here, but some have died.
46015007	After that, James saw Christ. Then all the missionaries saw Him.
46015008	Last of all, Christ showed Himself to me as if I had been born too late.
46015009	For I am the least important of all the missionaries. I should not be called a missionary because I made it so hard for God’s church.
46015010	I am different now. It is all because of what God did for me by His loving-favor. His loving-favor was not wasted. I worked harder than all the other missionaries. But it was not I who worked. It was God’s loving-favor working through me.
46015011	It makes no difference how you heard the Good News. It could have been through the other mission aries or through me. The important thing is this: We preached the Good News to you and you believed it.
46015012	We preached to you that Christ has been raised from the dead. But some of you say that people are not raised from the dead. Why do you say this?
46015013	If the dead are not raised, then Christ was not raised from the dead.
46015014	If Christ was not raised from the dead, then what we preach to you is worth nothing. Your faith in Christ is worth nothing.
46015015	That makes us all liars because we said that God raised Christ from the dead. But God did not raise Christ from the dead if the dead do not come to life again.
46015016	If the dead are not raised, then not even Christ was raised from the dead.
46015017	If Christ was not raised from the dead, your faith is worth nothing and you are still living in your sins.
46015018	Then the Christians who have already died are lost in sin.
46015019	If we have hope in Christ in this life only, we are more sad than anyone else.
46015020	But it is true! Christ has been raised from the dead! He was the first One to be raised from the dead and all those who are in graves will follow.
46015021	Death came because of a man, Adam. Being raised from the dead also came because of a Man, Christ.
46015022	All men will die as Adam died. But all those who belong to Christ will be raised to new life.
46015023	This is the way it is: Christ was raised from the dead first. Then all those who belong to Christ will be raised from the dead when He comes again.
46015024	Next, at the end of the world, Christ will give His holy nation over to God the Father. Christ will have destroyed every nation and power.
46015025	Christ must be King until He has destroyed all those who hate Him and work against Him.
46015026	The last thing that will be destroyed is death.
46015027	The Holy Writings say that God has put all things under Christ’s feet except Himself.
46015028	When Christ is over all things, He will put Himself under God Who put all things under Christ. And God will be over all things.
46015029	What good will it do people if they are baptized for the dead? If the dead are not raised, why are people baptized for them?
46015030	Why are we also in danger every hour?
46015031	I say this, Christian brothers, I have joy in what Jesus Christ our Lord has done for you. That is why I face death every day.
46015032	As men look at it, what good has it done for me in the city of Ephesus to fight with men who act like wild animals? If the dead are not raised, we might as well be like those who say, “Let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we die.”
46015033	Do not let anyone fool you. Bad people can make those who want to live good become bad.
46015034	Keep your minds awake! Stop sinning. Some do not know God at all. I say this to your shame.
46015035	Someone will say, “How are the dead raised? What kind of bodies will they have?”
46015036	What a foolish question! When you plant a seed, it must die before it starts new life.
46015037	When you put it in the earth, you are not planting the body which it will become. You put in only a seed.
46015038	It is God Who gives it a body just as He wants it to have. Each kind of seed becomes a different kind of body.
46015039	All flesh is not the same. Men have one kind of flesh. Animals have another kind. Fish have another kind, and birds have another kind.
46015040	There are bodies in the heavens. There are bodies on earth. Their greatness is not the same.
46015041	The sun has its greatness. The moon has its greatness. Stars have their greatness. One star is different from another star in greatness.
46015042	It is the same with people who are raised from the dead. The body will turn back to dust when it is put in a grave. When the body is raised from the grave, it will never die.
46015043	It has no greatness when it is put in a grave, but it is raised with shining-greatness. It is weak when it is put in a grave, but it is raised with power.
46015044	It is a human body when it dies, but it is a God-like body when it is raised from the dead. There are human bodies and there are God-like bodies.
46015045	The Holy Writings say, “The first man, Adam, became a living soul.” But the last Adam (Christ) is a life-giving Spirit.
46015046	We have these human bodies first. Then we are given God-like bodies that are ready for heaven.
46015047	Adam was the first man. He was made from the dust of the earth. Christ was the second man. He came down from heaven.
46015048	All men of the earth are made like Adam. But those who belong to Christ will have a body like the body of Christ Who came from heaven.
46015049	Now, our bodies are like Adam’s body. But in heaven, our bodies will be like the body of Christ.
46015050	Christian brothers, our bodies which are made of flesh and blood will not go into the holy nation of God. That which dies can have no part in that which will never die.
46015051	For sure, I am telling you a secret. We will not all die, but we will all be changed.
46015052	In a very short time, no longer than it takes for the eye to close and open, the Christians who have died will be raised. It will happen when the last horn sounds. The dead will be raised never to die again. Then the rest of us who are alive will be changed.
46015053	Our human bodies made from dust must be changed into a body that cannot be destroyed. Our human bodies that can die must be changed into bodies that will never die.
46015054	When this that can be destroyed has been changed into that which cannot be destroyed, and when this that does die has been changed into that which cannot die, then it will happen as the Holy Writings said it would happen. They said, “Death has no more power over life.” (Isaiah 25:8)
46015055	O death, where is your power? O death, where are your pains?
46015056	The pain in death is sin. Sin has power over those under the Law.
46015057	But God is the One Who gives us power over sin through Jesus Christ our Lord. We give thanks to Him for this.
46015058	So then, Christian brothers, because of all this, be strong. Do not allow anyone to change your mind. Always do your work well for the Lord. You know that whatever you do for Him will not be wasted.
46016001	I want to tell you what to do about the money you are gathering for the Christians. Do the same as I told the churches in the country of Galatia to do.
46016002	On the first day of every week each of you should put aside some of your money. Give a certain part of what you have earned. Keep it there because I do not want money gathered when I come.
46016003	When I get there, I will give letters to the men you want to send. They will take your gift to Jerusalem.
46016004	If I can go, they can go with me.
46016005	I want to visit you after I have gone through the country of Macedonia for I am going through there.
46016006	I may be staying with you and even spend the winter with you. Then you can send me on my way to the next place.
46016007	I do not want to stop now. I want to spend some time with you when I can stay longer, if that is what the Lord wants.
46016008	I will stay in the city of Ephesus until the special day to remember how the Holy Spirit came on the church.
46016009	A wide door has been opened to me here to preach the Good News. But there are many who work against me.
46016010	If Timothy comes, receive him and help him so he will not be afraid. He is working for the Lord as I am.
46016011	Everyone should respect him. Send him on his way to me in peace. I expect to see him and some of the other Christians soon.
46016012	I wanted brother Apollos to go with the other Christians to visit you. But he is not sure he should go now. He will come when he can.
46016013	Watch and keep awake! Stand true to the Lord. Keep on acting like men and be strong.
46016014	Everything you do should be done in love.
46016015	You know that the families of Stephanas were the first Christians in the country of Greece. They are working for the Lord in helping His people.
46016016	I ask you to listen to leaders like these and work with them as well as others like them.
46016017	I am happy that Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus came here. They have helped me and you would have also if you had been here.
46016018	They have made me happy. They would have made you happy also. Show them you are thankful for their help.
46016019	The churches in the countries of Asia greet you. Aquila and Priscilla and the Christians who meet in their house greet you with Christian love.
46016020	All the Christians here greet you. Greet each other with a kiss of holy love.
46016021	I, Paul, am writing the last part of this letter with my own hand.
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord, let him be kept from being with Christ. The Lord is coming soon!
46016023	May you have the loving-favor of our Lord Jesus.
46016024	I love you all through Christ Jesus. Let it be so.
47001001	This letter is from Paul. I have been chosen by God to be a missionary for Jesus Christ. Timothy is here with me and is writing to you also. We are writing to God’s church in the city of Corinth and to all of God’s people in the country of Greece.
47001002	May you have loving-favor and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
47001003	We give thanks to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ. He is our Father Who shows us loving-kindness and our God Who gives us comfort.
47001004	He gives us comfort in all our troubles. Then we can comfort other people who have the same troubles. We give the same kind of comfort God gives us.
47001005	As we have suffered much for Christ and have shared in His pain, we also share His great comfort.
47001006	But if we are in trouble, it is for your good. And it is so you will be saved from the punishment of sin. If God comforts us, it is for your good also. You too will be given strength not to give up when you have the same kind of trouble we have.
47001007	Our hope for you is the same all the time. We know you are sharing our troubles. And so you will share the comfort we receive.
47001008	We want you to know, Christian brothers, of the trouble we had in the countries of Asia. The load was so heavy we did not have the strength to keep going. At times we did not think we could live.
47001009	We thought we would die. This happened so we would not put our trust in ourselves, but in God Who raises the dead.
47001010	Yes, God kept us from what looked like sure death and He is keeping us. As we trust Him, He will keep us in the future.
47001011	You also help us by praying for us. Many people thank God for His favor to us. This is an answer to the prayers of many people.
47001012	I am happy to say this. Whatever we did in this world, and for sure when we were with you, we were honest and had pure desires. We did not trust in human wisdom. Our power came from God’s loving-favor.
47001013	We write to you only what we know you can understand. I hope you will understand everything.
47001014	When the Lord Jesus comes again, you can be as proud of us as we will be proud of you. Right now you do not understand us real well.
47001015	It was because of this, I wanted to visit you first. In that way, you would be helped two times.
47001016	I wanted to stop to visit you on my way to the country of Macedonia. I would stop again as I came from there. Then you could help me on my way to the country of Judea.
47001017	Yes, I changed my mind. Does that show that I change my mind a lot? Do I plan things as people of the world who say yes when they mean no? You know I am not like that!
47001018	As God is true, my yes means yes. I am not the kind of person who says one thing and means another.
47001019	Timothy and Silvanus and I have preached to you about Jesus Christ, the Son of God. In Him there is no yes and no. In Him is yes.
47001020	Jesus says yes to all of God’s many promises. It is through Jesus that we say, “Let it be so,” when we give thanks to God.
47001021	God is the One Who makes our faith and your faith strong in Christ. He has set us apart for Himself.
47001022	He has put His mark on us to show we belong to Him. His Spirit is in our hearts to prove this.
47001023	I call on God to look into my heart. The reason I did not come to the city of Corinth was because I did not want my strong words to hurt you.
47001024	We are not the boss of your faith but we are working with you to make you happy. Your faith is strong.
47002001	As I thought about it, I decided I would not come to you again. It would only make you sad.
47002002	If I make you sad, who is going to make me happy? How can you make me happy if I make you sad?
47002003	That is why I wrote that letter to you. I did not want to visit you and be made sad by the ones who should be making me happy. I am sure when I am happy, you are happy also.
47002004	I wrote you with a troubled heart. Tears were coming from my eyes. I did not want to make you sad. I wanted you to know how much I loved you.
47002005	If someone among you has brought sorrow, he has not made me as sad as he has all of you. I say this so I may not make it hard for you.
47002006	Most of you have punished him. That is enough for such a person.
47002007	Now you should forgive him and comfort him. If you do not, he will be so sad that he will want to give up.
47002008	I ask you to show him you do love him.
47002009	This is why I wrote to you. I wanted to test you to see if you were willing to obey in all things.
47002010	If you forgive a man, I forgive him also. If I have forgiven anything, I have done it because of you. Christ sees me as I forgive.
47002011	We forgive so that Satan will not win. We know how he works!
47002012	When I arrived in the city of Troas, the Lord opened the door for me to preach the Good News of Christ.
47002013	I was worried because I could not find our brother Titus. After saying good-bye, I went on my way to the country of Macedonia.
47002014	We thank God for the power Christ has given us. He leads us and makes us win in everything. He speaks through us wherever we go. The Good News is like a sweet smell to those who hear it.
47002015	We are a sweet smell of Christ that reaches up to God. It reaches out to those who are being saved from the punishment of sin and to those who are still lost in sin.
47002016	It is the smell of death to those who are lost in sin. It is the smell of life to those who are being saved from the punishment of sin. Who is able for such a work?
47002017	We are not like others. They preach God’s Word to make money. We are men of truth and have been sent by God. We speak God’s Word with Christ’s power. All the time God sees us.
47003001	Are we making it sound as if we think we are so important? Other people write letters about themselves. Do we need to write such a letter to you?
47003002	You are our letter. You are written in our hearts. You are known and read by all men.
47003003	You are as a letter from Christ written by us. You are not written as other letters are written with ink, or on pieces of stone. You are written in human hearts by the Spirit of the living God.
47003004	We can say these things because of our faith in God through Christ.
47003005	We know we are not able in ourselves to do any of this work. God makes us able to do these things.
47003006	God is the One Who made us preachers of a New Way of Worship. This New Way of Worship is not of the Law. It is of the Holy Spirit. The Law brings death, but the Holy Spirit gives life.
47003007	The Law of Moses was written on stone and it brought death. But God’s shining-greatness was seen when it was given. When Moses took it to the Jews, they could not look at his face because of the bright light. But that bright light in his face began to pass away.
47003008	The new way of life through the Holy Spirit comes with much more shining-greatness.
47003009	If the Law of Moses, that leads to death, came in shining-greatness, how much greater and brighter is the light that makes us right with God?
47003010	The Law of Moses came with shining-greatness long ago. But that light is no longer bright. The shining-greatness of the New Way of Worship that brings us life is so much brighter.
47003011	The shining light that came with the Law of Moses soon passed away. But the new way of life is much brighter. It will never pass away.
47003012	We speak without fear because our trust is in Christ.
47003013	We are not like Moses. He put a covering over his face so the Jews would not see that the bright light was passing away.
47003014	Their minds were not able to understand. Even to this day when the Law is read, there is a covering over their minds. They do not see that Christ is the only One Who can take the covering away.
47003015	Yes, to this day, there is a covering over their hearts whenever the Law of Moses is read.
47003016	But whenever a man turns to the Lord, the covering is taken away.
47003017	The heart is free where the Spirit of the Lord is. The Lord is the Spirit.
47003018	All of us, with no covering on our faces, show the shining-greatness of the Lord as in a mirror. All the time we are being changed to look like Him, with more and more of His shining-greatness. This change is from the Lord Who is the Spirit.
47004001	Through God’s loving-kindness, He has given us this job to do. So we do not give up.
47004002	We have put away all things that are done in secret and in shame. We do not play with the Word of God or use it in a false way. Because we are telling the truth, we want men’s hearts to listen to us. God knows our desires.
47004003	If the Good News we preach is hidden, it is hidden to those who are lost in sin.
47004004	The eyes of those who do not believe are made blind by Satan who is the god of this world. He does not want the light of the Good News to shine in their hearts. This Good News shines as the shining-greatness of Christ. Christ is as God is.
47004005	We do not preach about ourselves. We preach Christ Jesus the Lord. We are your servants because of Jesus.
47004006	It was God Who said, “The light will shine in darkness.” (Genesis 1:3) He is the One Who made His light shine in our hearts. This brings us the light of knowing God’s shining-greatness which is seen in Christ’s face.
47004007	We have this light from God in our human bodies. This shows that the power is from God. It is not from ourselves.
47004008	We are pressed on every side, but we still have room to move. We are often in much trouble, but we never give up.
47004009	People make it hard for us, but we are not left alone. We are knocked down, but we are not destroyed.
47004010	We carry marks on our bodies that show the death of Jesus. This is how Jesus makes His life seen in our bodies.
47004011	Every day of our life we face death because of Jesus. In this way, His life is seen in our bodies.
47004012	Death is working in us because we work for the Lord, but His life is working in you.
47004013	The Holy Writings say, “I believed, so I spoke.” (Psalm 116:10) We have the same kind of faith as David had. We also believe, so we speak.
47004014	We know that God raised the Lord Jesus from the dead. He will raise us up also. God will take us to Himself and He will take you.
47004015	These things happened for your good. As more people receive God’s favor, they will give thanks for the shining-greatness of God.
47004016	This is the reason we do not give up. Our human body is wearing out. But our spirits are getting stronger every day.
47004017	The little troubles we suffer now for a short time are making us ready for the great things God is going to give us forever.
47004018	We do not look at the things that can be seen. We look at the things that cannot be seen. The things that can be seen will come to an end. But the things that cannot be seen will last forever.
47005001	Our body is like a house we live in here on earth. When it is destroyed, we know that God has another body for us in heaven. The new one will not be made by human hands as a house is made. This body will last forever.
47005002	Right now we cry inside ourselves because we wish we could have our new body which we will have in heaven.
47005003	We will not be without a body. We will live in a new body.
47005004	While we are in this body, we cry inside ourselves because things are hard for us. It is not that we want to die. Instead, we want to live in our new bodies. We want this dying body to be changed into a living body that lasts forever.
47005005	It is God Who has made us ready for this change. He has given us His Spirit to show us what He has for us.
47005006	We are sure of this. We know that while we are at home in this body we are not with the Lord.
47005007	Our life is lived by faith. We do not live by what we see in front of us.
47005008	We are sure we will be glad to be free of these bodies. It will be good to be at home with the Lord.
47005009	So if we stay here on earth or go home to Him, we always want to please Him.
47005010	For all of us must stand before Christ when He says who is guilty or not guilty. Each one will receive pay for what he has done. He will be paid for the good or the bad done while he lived in this body.
47005011	Because of this, we know the fear of God. So we try to get men to put their trust in Christ. God knows us. I hope that your hearts know me well also.
47005012	We do not want to sound as if we think we are so important. Instead, we are making it easy for you to be proud of us. In that way, you will be able to tell them about us. They always talk about the way people look, but do not care about their hearts.
47005013	Are we crazy to talk like this? It is all because of what God has done. If we are using our minds well, it is for you.
47005014	For the love of Christ puts us into action. We are sure that Christ died for everyone. So, because of that, everyone has a part in His death.
47005015	Christ died for everyone so that they would live for Him. They should not live to please themselves but for Christ Who died on a cross and was raised from the dead for them.
47005016	So from now on, we do not think about what people are like by looking at them. We even thought about Christ that way one time. But we do not think of Him that way anymore.
47005017	For if a man belongs to Christ, he is a new person. The old life is gone. New life has begun.
47005018	All this comes from God. He is the One Who brought us to Himself when we hated Him. He did this through Christ. Then He gave us the work of bringing others to Him.
47005019	God was in Christ. He was working through Christ to bring the whole world back to Himself. God no longer held men’s sins against them. And He gave us the work of telling and showing men this.
47005020	We are Christ’s missionaries. God is speaking to you through us. We are speaking for Christ and we ask you from our hearts to turn from your sins and come to God.
47005021	Christ never sinned but God put our sin on Him. Then we are made right with God because of what Christ has done for us.
47006001	We are working together with God. We ask you from our hearts not to receive God’s loving-favor and then waste it.
47006002	The Holy Writings say, “I heard you at the right time. I helped you on that day to be saved from the punishment of sin. Now is the right time! See! Now is the day to be saved.” (Isaiah 49:8)
47006003	We do not want to put anything in the way that would keep people from God. We do not want to be blamed.
47006004	Everything we do shows we are God’s servants. We have had to wait and suffer. We have needed things. We have been in many hard places and have had many troubles.
47006005	We have been beaten. We have been put in prison. We have been in fights. We have worked hard. We have stayed awake watching. We have gone without food.
47006006	We have been pure. We have known what to do. We have suffered long. We have been kind. The Holy Spirit has worked in us. We have had true love.
47006007	We have spoken the truth. We have God’s power. We have the sword of being right with God in the right hand and in the left hand.
47006008	Some men respect us and some do not. Some men speak bad against us and some thank us. They say we lie, but we speak the truth.
47006009	Some men act as if they do not know us. And yet we are known by everyone. They act as if we were dead, but we are alive. They try to hurt and destroy us, but they are not able to kill us.
47006010	We are full of sorrow and yet we are always happy. We are poor and yet we make many people rich. We have nothing and yet we have everything.
47006011	We have spoken to you who are in the city of Corinth with plain words. Our hearts are wide open.
47006012	Our hearts are not closed to you. But you have closed your hearts to us.
47006013	I am speaking to you now as if you were my own children. Open your hearts wide to us! That will pay us back for what we have done for you.
47006014	Do not be joined together with those who do not belong to Christ. How can that which is good get along with that which is bad? How can light be in the same place with darkness?
47006015	How can Christ get along with the devil? How can one who has put his trust in Christ get along with one who has not put his trust in Christ?
47006016	How can the house of God get along with false gods? We are the house of the living God. God has said, 'I will live in them and will walk among them. I will be their God and they will be My people.” (Leviticus 26:12)
47006017	The Lord has said, 'So come out from among them. Do not be joined to them. Touch nothing that is sinful. And I will receive you.
47006018	I will be a Father to you. You will be My sons and daughters, says the All-powerful God.”
47007001	Since we have these great promises, dear friends, let us turn away from every sin of the body or of the spirit. Let us honor God with love and fear by giving ourselves to Him in every way.
47007002	Receive us into your hearts. We have done no wrong to anyone. We have not led anyone in the wrong way. We have not used anyone for our good.
47007003	I do not say this to tell you that you are wrong. As I have said before, you have a place in our hearts and always will. If we live or die, we will be together.
47007004	I trust you and am proud of you. You give me much comfort and joy even when I suffer.
47007005	When we arrived in the country of Macedonia, we had no rest. We had all kinds of trouble. There was fighting all around us. Our hearts were afraid.
47007006	But God gives comfort to those whose hearts are heavy. He gave us comfort when Titus came.
47007007	Not only did his coming comfort us, but the comfort you had given him made me happy also. He told us how much you wanted to see us. He said that you were sad because of my trouble and that you wanted to help me. This made me happy.
47007008	I am not sorry now if my letter made you sad. I know it made you sad, but it was only for awhile.
47007009	I am happy now. It is not because you were hurt by my letter, but because it turned you from sin to God. God used it and you were not hurt by what we did.
47007010	The sorrow that God uses makes people sorry for their sin and leads them to turn from sin so they can be saved from the punishment of sin. We should be happy for that kind of sorrow, but the sorrow of this world brings death.
47007011	See how this sorrow God allowed you to have has worked in you. You had a desire to be free of that sin I wrote about. You were angry about it. You were afraid. You wanted to do something about it. In every way you did what you could to make it right.
47007012	I sent this. It was not written only because of the man who did the wrong or because of the one who suffered.
47007013	All this has given us comfort. More than this, we are happy for the joy Titus has. His spirit has been made stronger by all of you.
47007014	I told him how proud I was of you. You did not make me ashamed. What we said to Titus proved to be true.
47007015	He loves you all the more. He remembers how all of you were ready to obey and how you respected him.
47007016	I am happy that I can have complete trust in you.
47008001	Christian brothers, we want you to know how the loving-favor of God has been shown in the churches in the country of Macedonia.
47008002	They have been put to the test by much trouble, but they have much joy. They have given much even though they were very poor.
47008003	They gave as much as they could because they wanted to.
47008004	They asked from their hearts if they could help the Christians in Jerusalem.
47008005	It was more than we expected. They gave themselves to the Lord first. Then they gave themselves to us to be used as the Lord wanted.
47008006	We asked Titus to keep on helping you finish this act of love. He was the one to begin this.
47008007	You are rich in everything. You have faith. You can preach. You have much learning. You have a strong desire to help. And you have love for us. Now do what you should about giving also.
47008008	I am not saying that you must do this, but I have told you how others have helped. This is a way to prove how true your love is.
47008009	You know of the loving-favor shown by our Lord Jesus Christ. He was rich, but He became poor for your good. In that way, because He became poor, you might become rich.
47008010	This is what I think. You had better finish what you started a year ago. You were the first to want to give a gift of money.
47008011	Now do it with the same strong desires you had when you started.
47008012	If a man is ready and willing to give, he should give of what he has, not of what he does not have.
47008013	This does not mean that others do not have to give and you have to give much. You should share alike.
47008014	You have more than you need now. When you have need, then they can help you. You should share alike.
47008015	The Holy Writings say, “The man who gathered much did not have too much. The man who did not gather much had enough.” (Exodus 16:18)
47008016	I thank God that He gave Titus the same desire to help you.
47008017	He was glad when we asked him to help you. He decided himself to go to you.
47008018	We are sending the Christian brother along. He is respected in the churches for his preaching.
47008019	Not only that, but he has been asked by the churches to travel with me to Jerusalem. He will help in giving them the gift. The Lord will be honored by it because it shows how we want to help each other.
47008020	We want everyone to trust us with the way we take this large gift of money to them.
47008021	We want to do the right thing. We want God and men to know we are honest.
47008022	We are sending another Christian brother with them. We have tested him many times. His faith has proven to be true. He wants very much to help because he trusts you.
47008023	Titus works with me to help you. The other two Christian brothers have been sent by the churches. Their lives honor Christ.
47008024	Show these men you love them and let the churches see your love. Show them the reason I am proud of you.
47009001	I do not need to write to you about helping those who belong to Christ.
47009002	I know you want to do it. I have told the people in the country of Macedonia that you were ready to send money last year. Your desire has started most of them to give.
47009003	I am sending these Christian brothers so the words I said about you will prove to be true and you will be ready to help.
47009004	What if some of the people of Macedonia came with me and found you were not ready to send your gift of money? We would all be ashamed since we have talked of you so much.
47009005	That is why I asked these men to go ahead of me. They can see that the gift you promised is ready. In that way, it will be a true gift and not something you were made to do.
47009006	Remember, the man who plants only a few seeds will not have much grain to gather. The man who plants many seeds will have much grain to gather.
47009007	Each man should give as he has decided in his heart. He should not give, wishing he could keep it. Or he should not give if he feels he has to give. God loves a man who gives because he wants to give.
47009008	God can give you all you need. He will give you more than enough. You will have everything you need for yourselves. And you will have enough left over to give when there is a need.
47009009	The Holy Writings say, “He has given much to the poor. His right-standing with God lasts forever.” (Psalm 112:9)
47009010	It is God Who gives seed to the man to plant. He also gives the bread to eat. Then we know He will give you more seed to plant and make it grow so you will have more to give away.
47009011	God will give you enough so you can always give to others. Then many will give thanks to God for sending gifts through us.
47009012	This gift you give not only helps Christians who are in need, but it also helps them give thanks to God.
47009013	You are proving by this act of love what you are. They will give thanks to God for your gift to them and to others. This proves you obey the Good News of Christ.
47009014	They will pray for you with great love because God has given you His loving-favor.
47009015	Thank God for His great Gift.
47010001	I, Paul, ask you this myself. I do it through Christ Who is so gentle and kind. Some people say that I am gentle and quiet when I am with you, but that I have no fear and that my language is strong when I am away from you.
47010002	Do not make me speak strong words to you when I come. Some people think we want the things of the world because of what we do and say. I have decided to talk to these people if I have to.
47010003	It is true, we live in a body of flesh. But we do not fight like people of the world.
47010004	We do not use those things to fight with that the world uses. We use the things God gives to fight with and they have power. Those things God gives to fight with destroy the strong-places of the devil.
47010005	We break down every thought and proud thing that puts itself up against the wisdom of God. We take hold of every thought and make it obey Christ.
47010006	We are ready to punish those who will not obey as soon as you obey in everything.
47010007	You are seeing things only as men see them. If anyone feels sure he belongs to Christ, he should remember that we belong to Christ also.
47010008	I am not ashamed if I say this of myself. The Lord gave me the right and the power to help you become stronger, not to break you down.
47010009	I do not want you to think I am trying to make you afraid with my letters.
47010010	They say, “His letters are strong and they make us think. When he is here with us, he is weak and he is hard to listen to.”
47010011	What we say in our letters we will do when we get there. They should understand this.
47010012	We do not compare ourselves with those who think they are good. They compare themselves with themselves. They decide what they think is good or bad and compare themselves with those ideas. They are foolish.
47010013	But we will not talk with pride more than God allows us to. We will follow the plan of the work He has given us to do and you are a part of that work.
47010014	We did not go farther than we were supposed to go when we came to you. But we did come to you with the Good News of Christ.
47010015	We take no pride in the work others have done there. But we hope your faith will keep growing because of help from others. Then we will grow because of you.
47010016	We hope to preach the Good News in the countries on the other side of you. Then we would take no pride in work done by another person in another country.
47010017	If anyone wants to be proud, he should be proud of what the Lord has done.
47010018	It is not what a man thinks and says of himself that is important. It is what God thinks of him.
47011001	I wish you would listen to a little foolish talk from me. Now listen.
47011002	I am jealous for you with a God-like jealousy. I have given you, as a woman who has never had a man, to one Husband, Who is Christ.
47011003	Eve was fooled by the snake in the garden of Eden. In the same way, I am afraid that you will be fooled and led away from your pure love for Christ.
47011004	You listen when someone comes and preaches a different Jesus than the One we preached. You believe what you hear about a different spirit and different good news than that which we preached.
47011005	I do not think I am less than those special missionaries who are coming to you.
47011006	Even if it is hard for me to speak, I know what I am talking about. You know this by now.
47011007	Did I do wrong? I did not ask you for anything when I preached the Good News to you. I made myself poor so you would be made rich.
47011008	I did take money from other churches. I used it while I worked with you so you would not have to pay me.
47011009	Some of the time I had no money when I was with you. But I did not ask you for money. The Christians from the country of Macedonia brought me what I needed. I did not ask you and I will not ask you for anything.
47011010	As sure as the truth of Christ is in me, I will not stop telling those in the country of Greece that I am proud of this.
47011011	Does it mean I do not love you? God knows I do.
47011012	What I am doing now, I will keep on doing. I will do it to stop those who say they work as we do.
47011013	Those men are false missionaries. They lie about their work. But they make themselves look like true missionaries of Christ.
47011014	It is no surprise! The devil makes himself look like an angel of light.
47011015	And so it is no surprise if his servants also make themselves look like preachers of the Good News. They and their work will come to the same end.
47011016	Let me say it again. Do not think of me as a fool. But if you do, then let this foolish man speak a little about himself.
47011017	The Lord has not told me to talk about myself. I am foolish when I do talk about myself like this.
47011018	Since the other men tell you all about themselves, I will talk about myself also.
47011019	You are so wise! You put up with fools!
47011020	You listen to anyone who tells you what to do or makes money off of you or sets a trap for you. You will listen to anyone who makes himself bigger than you or hits you in the face.
47011021	I am ashamed to say that I am weak! But I do not do as they do. Whatever they say about themselves, I can say about myself also. (I know what I am saying sounds foolish.)
47011022	Are they Jews? So am I. Are they from the family of Israel? So am I. Are they from the family of Abraham? So am I.
47011023	Do they work for Christ? I have worked for Him much more than they have. (I speak as if I am crazy.) I have done much more work. I have been in prison more times. I cannot remember how many times I have been whipped. Many times I have been in danger of death.
47011024	Five different times the Jews whipped me across my back thirty-nine times.
47011025	Three times they beat me with sticks. One time they threw stones at me. Three times I was on ships that were wrecked. I spent a day and a night in the water.
47011026	I have made many hard trips. I have been in danger from high water on rivers. I have been in danger from robbers. I have been in danger from the Jews. I have been in danger from people who do not know God. I have been in danger in cities and in the desert. I have been in danger on the sea. I have been in danger among people who say they belong to Christ but do not.
47011027	I have worked hard and have been tired and have had pain. I have gone many times without sleep. I have been hungry and thirsty. I have gone without food and clothes. I have been out in the cold.
47011028	More than all these things that have happened to my body, the care of all the churches is heavy on me.
47011029	When someone is weak, I feel weak also. When someone is led into sin, I have a strong desire to help him.
47011030	If I must talk about myself, I will do it about the things that show how weak I am.
47011031	The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ is to be honored and thanked forever. He knows I am telling the truth.
47011032	In the city of Damascus the leader of the people under King Aretas put soldiers at the gates to take me.
47011033	But I was let down in a basket through a window in the wall and I got away.
47012001	I have to talk about myself, even if it does no good. But I will keep on telling about some things I saw in a special dream and that which the Lord has shown me.
47012002	I know a man who belongs to Christ. Fourteen years ago he was taken up to the highest heaven. (I do not know if his body was taken up or just his spirit. Only God knows.)
47012003	I say it again, I know this man was taken up. But I do not know if his body or just his spirit was taken up. Only God knows.
47012004	When he was in the highest heaven, he heard things that cannot be told with words. No man is allowed to tell them.
47012005	I will be proud about this man, but I will not be proud about myself except to say things which show how weak I am.
47012006	Even if I talk about myself, I would not be a fool because it is the truth. But I will say no more because I want no one to think better of me than he does when he sees or hears me.
47012007	The things God showed me were so great. But to keep me from being too full of pride because of seeing these things, I have been given trouble in my body. It was sent from Satan to hurt me. It keeps me from being proud.
47012008	I asked the Lord three times to take it away from me.
47012009	He answered me, “I am all you need. I give you My loving-favor. My power works best in weak people.” I am happy to be weak and have troubles so I can have Christ’s power in me.
47012010	I receive joy when I am weak. I receive joy when people talk against me and make it hard for me and try to hurt me and make trouble for me. I receive joy when all these things come to me because of Christ. For when I am weak, then I am strong.
47012011	I have been making a fool of myself talking like this. But you made me do it. You should be telling what I have done. Even if I am nothing at all, I am not less important than those false missionaries of yours.
47012012	When I was with you, I proved to you that I was a true missionary. I did powerful works and there were special things to see. These things were done in the strength and power from God.
47012013	What makes you feel less important than the other churches? Is it because I did not let you give me food and clothing? Forgive me for this wrong!
47012014	This is the third time I am ready to come to you. I want nothing from you. I want you, not your money. You are my children. Children should not have to help care for their parents. Parents should help their children.
47012015	I am glad to give anything I have, even myself, to help you. When I love you more, it looks as if you love me less.
47012016	It is true that I was not a heavy load to you. But some say I set a trap for you.
47012017	How could I have done that? Did I get anything from you through the men I sent to you?
47012018	I asked Titus and the other Christian brother to visit you. Did Titus get anything from you? Did we not do things that showed we had the same desires and followed the same plan?
47012019	It may look to you as if we had been trying to make everything look right for ourselves all this time. God knows and so does Christ that all this is done to help you.
47012020	I am afraid that when I visit you I will not find you as I would like you to be. And you will not find me as you would like me to be. I am afraid I will find you fighting and jealous and angry and arguing and talking about each other and thinking of yourselves as being too important and making trouble.
47012021	I am afraid when I get there God will take all the pride away from me that I had for you. I will not be happy about many who have lived in sin and done sex sins and have had a desire for such things and have not been sorry for their sins and turned from them.
47013001	This is my third visit to you. The Holy Writings tell us that when people think someone has done wrong, it must be proven by two or three people who saw the wrong being done.
47013002	During my second visit I talked to you who have been sinning and to all the others. While I am away, I tell you this again. The next time I come I will be hard on those who sin.
47013003	Since you want to know, I will prove to you that Christ speaks through me. Christ is not weak when He works in your hearts. He uses His power in you.
47013004	Christ’s weak human body died on a cross. It is by God’s power that Christ lives today. We are weak. We are as He was. But we will be alive with Christ through the power God has for us.
47013005	Put yourselves through a test. See if you belong to Christ. Then you will know you belong to Christ, unless you do not pass the test.
47013006	I trust you see that we belong to Him and have passed the test.
47013007	We pray to God that you do no wrong. We do not pray this to show that our teaching is so great, but that you will keep on doing what is right, even if it looks as if we have done much wrong.
47013008	We cannot work against the truth of God. We only work for it.
47013009	We are glad when we are weak and you are strong. We pray that you will become strong Christians.
47013010	This is why I am writing these things while I am away from you. Then when I get there, I will not have to use strong words or punish you to show you that the Lord gives me this power. This power is to be used to make you stronger Christians, not to make you weak by hurting your faith.
47013011	Last of all, Christian brothers, goodbye. Do that which makes you complete. Be comforted. Work to get along with others. Live in peace. The God of love and peace will be with you.
47013012	Greet each other with a kiss of holy love.
47013013	All those here who belong to Christ greet you.
47013014	May you have loving-favor from our Lord Jesus Christ. May you have the love of God. May you be joined together by the Holy Spirit.
48001001	This letter is from Paul. I am a missionary sent by Jesus Christ and God the Father Who raised Jesus from the dead. I am not sent by men or by any one man.
48001002	All the Christians join me in writing to you who are in the churches in the country of Galatia.
48001003	May you have loving-favor and peace from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
48001004	He gave Himself to die for our sins. He did this so we could be saved from this sinful world. This is what God wanted Him to do.
48001005	May He have all the honor forever. Let it be so.
48001006	I am surprised you are leaving Christ so soon. You were chosen through His loving-favor. But now you are turning and listening to another kind of good news.
48001007	No! There is not another kind of good news. There are some who would like to lead you in the wrong way. They want to change the Good News about Christ.
48001008	Even if we or an angel from heaven should preach another kind of good news to you that is not the one we preached, let him be cursed.
48001009	As we said before, I will say it again. If any man is preaching another good news to you which is not the one you have received, let him be cursed.
48001010	Do you think I am trying to get the favor of men, or of God? If I were still trying to please men, I would not be a servant owned by Christ.
48001011	Christian brothers, I want you to know the Good News I preached to you was not made by man.
48001012	I did not receive it from man. No one taught it to me. I received it from Jesus Christ as He showed it to me.
48001013	You have heard of my old life when I followed the Jewish religion. I made it as hard as I could for the Christians and did everything I could to destroy the Christian church.
48001014	I had learned more about the Jewish religion than many of the Jews my age. I had a much stronger desire than they to follow the ways of our early fathers.
48001015	But God chose me before I was born. By His loving-favor He called me to work for Him.
48001016	His Son was to be seen in me. He did this so I could preach about Christ to the people who are not Jews. When this happened, I did not talk to men.
48001017	I did not even go to Jerusalem to talk to those who were missionaries before me. Instead, I went to the country of Arabia. Later I returned to the city of Damascus.
48001018	Three years later I went to Jerusalem to meet Peter. I stayed with him fifteen days.
48001019	I did not see any of the other missionaries except James, the Lord’s brother.
48001020	I am writing the truth. God knows I am not lying.
48001021	I went from Jerusalem to the countries of Syria and Cilicia.
48001022	None of the Christians in the churches in the country of Judea had ever seen me.
48001023	The only thing they heard was, “The one who tried to destroy the Christian church is now preaching the Good News!”
48001024	And they gave thanks to God because of me.
48002001	Fourteen years later I went again to Jerusalem. This time I took Barnabas. Titus went with us also.
48002002	God showed me in a special way I should go. I spoke to them about the Good News that I preach among the people who are not Jews. First of all, I talked alone to the important church leaders. I wanted them to know what I was preaching. I did not want that which I was doing or would be doing to be wasted.
48002003	Titus was with me. Even being a Greek, he did not have to go through the religious act of becoming a Jew.
48002004	Some men who called themselves Christians asked about this. They got in our meeting without being asked. They came there to find out how free we are who belong to Christ. They tried to get us to be chained to the Law.
48002005	But we did not listen to them or do what they wanted us to do so the truth of the Good News might be yours.
48002006	Those who seemed to be important church leaders did not help me. They did not teach me anything new. What they were, I do not care. God looks on us all as being the same.
48002007	Anyway, they saw how I had been given the work of preaching the Good News to the people who are not Jews, as Peter had been given the work of preaching the Good News to the Jews.
48002008	For God helped Peter work with the Jews. He also helped me work with those who are not Jews.
48002009	James and Peter and John were thought of as being the head church leaders. They could see that God’s loving-favor had been given to me. Barnabas and I were joined together with them by shaking hands. Then we were sent off to work with the people who are not Jews. They were to work with the Jews.
48002010	They asked us to do only one thing. We were to remember to help poor people. I think this is important also.
48002011	But when Peter came to Antioch, I had to stand up against him because he was guilty.
48002012	Peter had been eating with the people who are not Jews. But after some men came who had been with James, he kept away from them. He was afraid of those who believe in the religious act of becoming a Jew.
48002013	Then the rest of the Jews followed him because they were afraid to do what they knew they should do. Even Barnabas was fooled by those who pretended to be someone they were not.
48002014	When I saw they were not honest about the truth of the Good News, I spoke to Peter in front of them all. I said, “If you are a Jew, but live like the people who are not Jews, why do you make the people who are not Jews live like the Jews?”
48002015	You and I were born Jews. We were not sinners from among the people who are not Jews.
48002016	Even so, we know we cannot become right with God by obeying the Law. A man is made right with God by putting his trust in Jesus Christ. For that reason, we have put our trust in Jesus Christ also. We have been made right with God because of our faith in Christ and not by obeying the Law. No man can be made right with God by obeying the Law.
48002017	As we try to become right with God by what Christ has done for us, what if we find we are sinners also? Does that mean Christ makes us sinners? No! Never!
48002018	But if I work toward being made right with God by keeping the Law, then I make myself a sinner.
48002019	The Law has no power over me. I am dead to the Law. Now I can live for God.
48002020	I have been put up on the cross to die with Christ. I no longer live. Christ lives in me. The life I now live in this body, I live by putting my trust in the Son of God. He was the One Who loved me and gave Himself for me.
48002021	I say that we are not to put aside the loving-favor of God. If we could be made right with God by keeping the Law, then Christ died for nothing.
