48003001	You foolish Galatians! What strange powers are trying to lead you from the way of faith in Christ? We made it plain for you to see that Jesus Christ was put on a cross to die.
48003002	There is one thing I want to know. Did you receive the Holy Spirit by keeping the Law? Or did you receive Him by hearing about Christ?
48003003	How foolish can you be? You started the Christian life by the Holy Spirit. Do you think you are going to become better Christians by your old way of worship?
48003004	You suffered so much because of the Good News you received. Was this all of no use?
48003005	He gave you the Holy Spirit and did powerful works among you. Does He do it because you do what the Law says or because you hear and believe the truth?
48003006	It was the same with Abraham. He put his trust in God. This made Abraham right with God.
48003007	Be sure to remember that all men who put their trust in God are the sons of Abraham.
48003008	The Holy Writings said long ago that God would save the people who are not Jews from the punishment of sin also. Before this time the Holy Writings gave the Good News to Abraham in these words, “All nations will be happy because of you.” (Genesis 12:3)
48003009	So then, all those who have faith will be happy, along with Abraham who had faith.
48003010	All those who expect the Law to save them from the punishment of sin will be punished. Because it is written, “Everyone who does not keep on doing all the things written in the Book of the Law will be punished.” (Deuteronomy 27:26)
48003011	No one is made right with God by doing what the Law says. For, “The man right with God will live by faith.” (Habakkuk 2:4)
48003012	The Law does not use faith. It says, “You must obey all the Law or you will die.” (Leviticus 18:5)
48003013	Christ bought us with His blood and made us free from the Law. In that way, the Law could not punish us. Christ did this by carrying the load and by being punished instead of us. It is written, “Anyone who hangs on a cross is hated and punished.” (Deuteronomy 21:23)
48003014	Because of the price Christ Jesus paid, the good things that came to Abraham might come to the people who are not Jews. And by putting our trust in Christ, we receive the Holy Spirit He has promised.
48003015	Christian brothers, let me show you what this means. If two men agree to something and sign their names on a paper promising to stay true to what they agree, it cannot be changed.
48003016	Now the promise was made to Abraham and to his son. He does not say, “And to sons,” speaking of many. But instead, “And to your Son,” which means Christ.
48003017	This is what I am saying: The Law which came 430 years later could not change the promise. The promise had already been made by God. The Law could not put that promise aside.
48003018	If it had been possible to be saved from the punishment of sin by obeying the Law, the promise God gave Abraham would be worth nothing. But since it is not possible to be saved by obeying the Law, the promise God gave Abraham is worth everything.
48003019	Then why do we have the Law? It was given because of sin. It was to be used until Christ came. The promise had been made looking toward Christ. The Law was given by angels through Moses who stood between God and man.
48003020	But when the promise was given to Abraham, God gave it without anyone standing between them.
48003021	Is the Law against the promise of God? No! Never! If it had been possible to be saved from the punishment of sin by obeying the Law, then being right with God would have come by obeying the Law.
48003022	But the Holy Writings say that all men are guilty of sin. Then that which was promised might be given to those who put their trust in Christ. It will be because their faith is in Him.
48003023	Before it was possible to be saved from the punishment of sin by putting our trust in Christ, we were held under the Law. It was as if we were being kept in prison. We were kept this way until Christ came.
48003024	The Law was used to lead us to Christ. It was our teacher, and so we were made right with God by putting our trust in Christ.
48003025	Now that our faith is in Christ, we do not need the Law to lead us.
48003026	You are now children of God because you have put your trust in Christ Jesus.
48003027	All of you who have been baptized to show you belong to Christ have become like Christ.
48003028	God does not see you as a Jew or as a Greek. He does not see you as a servant or as a person free to work. He does not see you as a man or as a woman. You are all one in Christ.
48003029	If you belong to Christ, then you have become the true children of Abraham. What God promised to him is now yours.
48004001	Let me say this another way. A young child who will get all the riches of his family is not different from a servant who is owned by the family. And yet the young child owns everything.
48004002	While he is young, he is cared for by men his father trusts. These men tell the child what he can and cannot do. The child cannot do what he wants to do until he has become a certain age.
48004003	We were as children also held by the Law. We obeyed the Law in our religious worship.
48004004	But at the right time, God sent His Son. A woman gave birth to Him under the Law.
48004005	This all happened so He could buy with His blood and make free all those who were held by the Law. Then we might become the sons of God.
48004006	Because you are the sons of God, He has sent the Spirit of His Son into our hearts. The Spirit cries, “Father!”
48004007	So now you are no longer a servant who is owned by someone. You are a son. If you are a son, then you will receive what God has promised through Christ.
48004008	During the time when you did not know God, you worshiped false gods.
48004009	But now that you know God, or should I say that you are known by God, why do you turn back again to the weak old Law? Why do you want to do those religious acts of worship that will keep you from being free? Why do you want to be held under the power of the Law again?
48004010	You do special things on certain days and months and years and times of the year.
48004011	I am afraid my work with you was wasted.
48004012	I ask you, Christian brothers, stay free from the Law as I am. Even if I am a Jew, I became free from the Law, just as you who are not Jews. You did no wrong to me.
48004013	You know I preached the Good News to you the first time because of my sickness.
48004014	Even though I was hard to look at because of my sickness, you did not turn away from me. You took me in as an angel from God. You took me in as you would have taken in Christ Jesus Himself.
48004015	What has become of the happiness you once had? You would have taken out your own eyes if you could have and given them to me.
48004016	Do you hate me because I have told you the truth?
48004017	Those false teachers are trying to turn your eyes toward them. They do not want you to follow my teaching. What they are doing is not good.
48004018	It is good when people help you if they do not hope to get something from it. They should help you all the time, not only when I am with you.
48004019	My children, I am suffering birth pain for you again. I will suffer until Christ’s life is in your life.
48004020	I wish I could be with you now. I wish I could speak to you in a more gentle voice, but I am troubled about you.
48004021	Listen! If you want to be under the Law, why do you not listen to what it says?
48004022	The Holy Writings say that Abraham had two sons. One was born from a woman servant (Hagar) who was owned by someone. She had to do what she was told. The other son was born from a woman (Sarah) who was free to work and live as she desired. (Genesis 16:15; 21:2–9)
48004023	The son born from the woman servant who was owned by someone was like any other birth. The son born from the free woman was different. That son had been promised by God.
48004024	Think of it like this: These two women show God’s two ways of working with His people. The children born from Hagar are under the Law given on Mount Sinai. They will be servants who are owned by someone and will always be told what to do!
48004025	Hagar is known as Mount Sinai in the country of Arabia. She is as Jerusalem is today, because she and her children are not free to do what they want to do.
48004026	But the Jerusalem of heaven is the free woman, and she is our mother.
48004027	The Holy Writings say, “Woman, be happy, you who have had no children. Cry for joy, you who have never had the pains of having a child, for you will have many children. Yes, you will have more children than the one who has a husband.” (Isaiah 54: 1)
48004028	Christian brothers, we are like Isaac. We are the children God promised.
48004029	At that time the son born as other children are born made it hard for the son born by the Holy Spirit. It is the same way now.
48004030	But what do the Holy Writings say? They say, “Put the woman servant who is owned by someone and her son out of your home. The son of that woman servant will never get any of the riches of the family. It will all be given to the son of the free woman.” (Genesis 21:10)
48004031	Christian brothers, we are not children of the woman servant who was owned by someone (Hagar). We are children of the free woman (Sarah).
48005001	Christ made us free. Stay that way. Do not get chained all over again in the Law and its kind of religious worship.
48005002	Listen to me! I, Paul, tell you that if you have the religious act of becoming a Jew done on you, Christ will be of no use to you at all.
48005003	I say it again. Every man who has the religious act of becoming a Jew done on him must obey every Law.
48005004	If you expect to be made right with God by obeying the Law, then you have turned away from Christ and His loving-favor.
48005005	We are waiting for the hope of being made right with God. This will come through the Holy Spirit and by faith.
48005006	If we belong to Jesus Christ, it means nothing to have or not to have gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew. But faith working through love is important.
48005007	You were doing well. Who stopped you from obeying the truth?
48005008	Whatever he used did not come from the One Who chose you to have life.
48005009	It only takes a little yeast to make the whole loaf of bread rise.
48005010	I feel I can trust you because of what the Lord has done in your life. I believe you will not follow another way. Whoever is trying to lead you in the wrong way will suffer for it.
48005011	Christian brothers, if I would still preach that people must go through the religious act of becoming a Jew to be a Christian, I would not be suffering from those who are making it hard for me. If I preached like that, the Jews would have no reason to be against the cross of Christ.
48005012	I wish those who are so willing to cut your bodies would complete the job by cutting themselves off from you.
48005013	Christian brother, you were chosen to be free. Be careful that you do not please your old selves by sinning because you are free. Live this free life by loving and helping others.
48005014	You obey the whole Law when you do this one thing, “Love your neighbor as you love yourself.” (Leviticus 19:18)
48005015	But if you hurt and make it hard for each other, watch out or you may be destroyed by each other.
48005016	I say this to you: Let the Holy Spirit lead you in each step. Then you will not please your sinful old selves.
48005017	The things our old selves want to do are against what the Holy Spirit wants. The Holy Spirit does not agree with what our sinful old selves want. These two are against each other. So you cannot do what you want to do.
48005018	If you let the Holy Spirit lead you, the Law no longer has power over you.
48005019	The things your sinful old self wants to do are: sex sins, sinful desires, wild living,
48005020	worshiping false gods, witchcraft, hating, fighting, being jealous, being angry, arguing, dividing into little groups and thinking the other groups are wrong, false teaching,
48005021	wanting something someone else has, killing other people, using strong drink, wild parties, and all things like these. I told you before and I am telling you again that those who do these things will have no place in the holy nation of God.
48005022	But the fruit that comes from having the Holy Spirit in our lives is: love, joy, peace, not giving up, being kind, being good, having faith,
48005023	being gentle, and being the boss over our own desires. The Law is not against these things.
48005024	Those of us who belong to Christ have nailed our sinful old selves on His cross. Our sinful desires are now dead.
48005025	If the Holy Spirit is living in us, let us be led by Him in all things.
48005026	Let us not become proud in ways in which we should not. We must not make hard feelings among ourselves as Christians or make anyone jealous.
48006001	Christian brothers, if a person is found doing some sin, you who are stronger Christians should lead that one back into the right way. Do not be proud as you do it. Watch yourself, because you may be tempted also.
48006002	Help each other in troubles and problems. This is the kind of law Christ asks us to obey.
48006003	If anyone thinks he is important when he is nothing, he is fooling himself.
48006004	Everyone should look at himself and see how he does his own work. Then he can be happy in what he has done. He should not compare himself with his neighbor.
48006005	Everyone must do his own work.
48006006	He who is taught God’s Word should share the good things he has with his teacher.
48006007	Do not be fooled. You cannot fool God. A man will get back whatever he plants!
48006008	If a man does things to please his sinful old self, his soul will be lost. If a man does things to please the Holy Spirit, he will have life that lasts forever.
48006009	Do not let yourselves get tired of doing good. If we do not give up, we will get what is coming to us at the right time.
48006010	Because of this, we should do good to everyone. For sure, we should do good to those who belong to Christ.
48006011	See what big letters I make when I write to you with my own hand.
48006012	Those men who say you must go through the religious act of becoming a Jew are doing it because they want to make a good show in front of the world. They do this so they will not have to suffer because of following the way of the cross of Christ.
48006013	Those who have gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew do not even keep the Law themselves. But they want you to go through that religious act so they can be proud that you are their followers.
48006014	I do not want to be proud of anything except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ. Because of the cross, the ways of this world are dead to me, and I am dead to them.
48006015	If a person does or does not go through the religious act of becoming a Jew, it is worth nothing. The important thing is to become a new person.
48006016	Those who follow this way will have God’s peace and loving-kindness. They are the people of God.
48006017	Let no one make trouble for me from now on. For I have on my body the whip marks of one who has been a servant owned by Jesus.
48006018	Christian brothers, may the loving-favor of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Let it be so.
49001001	This letter is from Paul. I am a missionary for Jesus Christ. God wanted me to work for Him. This letter is to those who belong to Christ in the city of Ephesus and to you who are faithful followers of Christ Jesus.
49001002	May you have loving-favor and peace from God our Father and from our Lord Jesus Christ.
49001003	Let us honor and thank the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ. He has already given us a taste of what heaven is like.
49001004	Even before the world was made, God chose us for Himself because of His love. He planned that we should be holy and without blame as He sees us.
49001005	God already planned to have us as His own children. This was done by Jesus Christ. In His plan God wanted this done.
49001006	We thank God for His loving-favor to us. He gave this loving-favor to us through His much-loved Son.
49001007	Because of the blood of Christ, we are bought and made free from the punishment of sin. And because of His blood, our sins are forgiven. His loving-favor to us is so rich.
49001008	He was so willing to give all of this to us. He did this with wisdom and understanding.
49001009	God told us the secret of what He wanted to do. It is this: In loving thought He planned long ago to send Christ into the world.
49001010	The plan was for Christ to gather us all together at the right time. If we are in heaven or still on earth, He will bring us together and will be head over all.
49001011	We were already chosen to be God’s own children by Christ. This was done just like the plan He had.
49001012	We who were the first to put our trust in Christ should thank Him for His greatness.
49001013	The truth is the Good News. When you heard the truth, you put your trust in Christ. Then God marked you by giving you His Holy Spirit as a promise.
49001014	The Holy Spirit was given to us as a promise that we will receive everything God has for us. God’s Spirit will be with us until God finishes His work of making us complete. God does this to show His shining-greatness.
49001015	I have heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all Christians.
49001016	Since then, I always give thanks for you and pray for you.
49001017	I pray that the great God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ may give you the wisdom of His Spirit. Then you will be able to understand the secrets about Him as you know Him better.
49001018	I pray that your hearts will be able to understand. I pray that you will know about the hope given by God’s call. I pray that you will see how great the things are that He has promised to those who belong to Him.
49001019	I pray that you will know how great His power is for those who have put their trust in Him.
49001020	It is the same power that raised Christ from the dead. This same power put Christ at God’s right side in heaven.
49001021	This place was given to Christ. It is much greater than any king or leader can have. No one else can have this place of honor and power. No one in this world or in the world to come can have such honor and power.
49001022	God has put all things under Christ’s power and has made Him to be the head leader over all things of the church.
49001023	The church is the body of Christ. It is filled by Him Who fills all things everywhere with Himself.
49002001	At one time you were dead because of your sins.
49002002	You followed the sinful ways of the world and obeyed the leader of the power of darkness. He is the devil who is now working in the people who do not obey God.
49002003	At one time all of us lived to please our old selves. We gave in to what our bodies and minds wanted. We were sinful from birth like all other people and would suffer from the anger of God.
49002004	But God had so much loving-kindness. He loved us with such a great love.
49002005	Even when we were dead because of our sins, He made us alive by what Christ did for us. You have been saved from the punishment of sin by His loving-favor.
49002006	God raised us up from death when He raised up Christ Jesus. He has given us a place with Christ in the heavens.
49002007	He did this to show us through all the time to come the great riches of His loving-favor. He has shown us His kindness through Christ Jesus.
49002008	For by His loving-favor you have been saved from the punishment of sin through faith. It is not by anything you have done. It is a gift of God.
49002009	It is not given to you because you worked for it. If you could work for it, you would be proud.
49002010	We are His work. He has made us to belong to Christ Jesus so we can work for Him. He planned that we should do this.
49002011	Do not forget that at one time you did not know God. The Jews, who had gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew by man’s hands, said you were people who do not know God.
49002012	You were living without Christ then. The Jewish people who belonged to God had nothing to do with you. The promises He gave to them were not for you. You had nothing in this world to hope for. You were without God.
49002013	But now you belong to Christ Jesus. At one time you were far away from God. Now you have been brought close to Him. Christ did this for you when He gave His blood on the cross.
49002014	We have peace because of Christ. He has made the Jews and those who are not Jews one people. He broke down the wall that divided them.
49002015	He stopped the fighting between them by His death on the cross. He put an end to the Law. Then He made of the two people one new kind of people like Himself. In this way, He made peace.
49002016	He brought both groups together to God. Christ finished the fighting between them by His death on the cross.
49002017	Then Christ came and preached the Good News of peace to you who were far away from God. And He preached it to us who were near God.
49002018	Now all of us can go to the Father through Christ by way of the one Holy Spirit.
49002019	From now on you are not strangers and people who are not citizens. You are citizens together with those who belong to God. You belong in God’s family.
49002020	This family is built on the teachings of the missionaries and the early preachers. Jesus Christ Himself is the cornerstone, which is the most important part of the building.
49002021	Christ keeps this building together and it is growing into a holy building for the Lord.
49002022	You are also being put together as a part of this building because God lives in you by His Spirit.
49003001	I, Paul, am in prison because I am a missionary for Jesus Christ to you who are not Jews.
49003002	I am sure you have heard that God trusted me with His loving-favor.
49003003	I wrote a little about this to you before. In a special way, God showed me His secret plan.
49003004	When you read this, you will understand how I know about the things that are not easy to understand about Christ.
49003005	Long ago men did not know these things. But now they have been shown to His missionaries and to the early preachers by the Holy Spirit.
49003006	Let me tell you that the Good News is for the people who are not Jews also. They are able to have life that lasts forever. They are to be a part of His church and family, together with the Jews. And together they are to receive all that God has promised through Christ.
49003007	God asked me to preach this Good News. He gave me the gift of His loving-favor. He gave me His power to preach it.
49003008	Of all those who belong to Christ, I am the least important. But this loving-favor was given to me to preach to the people who are not Jews. I was to tell them of the great riches in Christ which do not come to an end.
49003009	I was to make all men understand the meaning of this secret. God kept this secret to Himself from the beginning of the world. And He is the One Who made all things.
49003010	This was done so the great wisdom of God might be shown now to the leaders and powers in the heavenly places. It is being done through the church.
49003011	This was the plan God had for all time. He did this through Christ Jesus our Lord.
49003012	We can come to God without fear because we have put our trust in Christ.
49003013	So I ask you not to lose heart because of my suffering for you. It is to help you.
49003014	For this reason, I bow my knees and pray to the Father.
49003015	It is from Him that every family in heaven and on earth has its name.
49003016	I pray that because of the riches of His shining-greatness, He will make you strong with power in your hearts through the Holy Spirit.
49003017	I pray that Christ may live in your hearts by faith. I pray that you will be filled with love.
49003018	I pray that you will be able to understand how wide and how long and how high and how deep His love is.
49003019	I pray that you will know the love of Christ. His love goes beyond anything we can understand. I pray that you will be filled with God Himself.
49003020	God is able to do much more than we ask or think through His power working in us.
49003021	May we see His shining-greatness in the church. May all people in all time honor Christ Jesus. Let it be so.
49004001	I am being held in prison because of working for the Lord. I ask you from my heart to live and work the way the Lord expected you to live and work.
49004002	Live and work without pride. Be gentle and kind. Do not be hard on others. Let love keep you from doing that.
49004003	Work hard to live together as one by the help of the Holy Spirit. Then there will be peace.
49004004	There is one body and one Spirit. There is one hope in which you were called.
49004005	There is one Lord and one faith and one baptism.
49004006	There is one God. He is the Father of us all. He is over us all. He is the One working through us all. He is the One living in us all.
49004007	Loving-favor has been given to each one of us. We can see how great it is by the gift of Christ.
49004008	The Holy Writings say, “When Christ went up to heaven, He took those who were held with Him. He gave gifts to men.” (Psalm 68:18)
49004009	When they say, “He went up,” what does it mean but that He had first gone down to the deep parts of the earth?
49004010	Christ Who went down into the deep also went up far above the heavens. He did this to fill all the world with Himself.
49004011	Christ gave gifts to men. He gave to some the gift to be missionaries, some to be preachers, others to be preachers who go from town to town. He gave others the gift to be church leaders and teachers.
49004012	These gifts help His people work well for Him. And then the church which is the body of Christ will be made strong.
49004013	All of us are to be as one in the faith and in knowing the Son of God. We are to be full-grown Christians standing as high and complete as Christ is Himself.
49004014	Then we will not be as children any longer. Children are like boats thrown up and down on big waves. They are blown with the wind. False teaching is like the wind. False teachers try everything possible to make people believe a lie,
49004015	but we are to hold to the truth with love in our hearts. We are to grow up and be more like Christ. He is the leader of the church.
49004016	Christ has put each part of the church in its right place. Each part helps other parts. This is what is needed to keep the whole body together. In this way, the whole body grows strong in love.
49004017	I tell you this in the name of the Lord: You must not live any longer like the people of the world who do not know God. Their thoughts are foolish.
49004018	Their minds are in darkness. They are strangers to the life of God. This is because they have closed their minds to Him and have turned their hearts away from Him.
49004019	They do not care anymore about what is right or wrong. They have turned themselves over to the sinful ways of the world and are always wanting to do every kind of sinful act they can think of.
49004020	But you did not learn anything like this from Christ.
49004021	If you have heard of Him and have learned from Him,
49004022	put away the old person you used to be. Have nothing to do with your old sinful life. It was sinful because of being fooled into following bad desires.
49004023	Let your minds and hearts be made new.
49004024	You must become a new person and be God-like. Then you will be made right with God and have a true holy life.
49004025	So stop lying to each other. Tell the truth to your neighbor. We all belong to the same body.
49004026	If you are angry, do not let it become sin. Get over your anger before the day is finished.
49004027	Do not let the devil start working in your life.
49004028	Anyone who steals must stop it! He must work with his hands so he will have what he needs and can give to those who need help.
49004029	Watch your talk! No bad words should be coming from your mouth. Say what is good. Your words should help others grow as Christians.
49004030	Do not make God’s Holy Spirit have sorrow for the way you live. The Holy Spirit has put a mark on you for the day you will be set free.
49004031	Put out of your life all these things: bad feelings about other people, anger, temper, loud talk, bad talk which hurts other people, and bad feelings which hurt other people.
49004032	You must be kind to each other. Think of the other person. Forgive other people just as God forgave you because of Christ’s death on the cross.
49005001	Do as God would do. Much-loved children want to do as their fathers do.
49005002	Live with love as Christ loved you. He gave Himself for us, a gift on the altar to God which was as a sweet smell to God.
49005003	Do not let sex sins or anything sinful be even talked about among those who belong to Christ. Do not always want everything.
49005004	Do not be guilty of telling bad stories and of foolish talk. These things are not for you to do. Instead, you are to give thanks for what God has done for you.
49005005	Be sure of this! No person who does sex sins or who is not pure will have any part in the holy nation of Christ and of God. The same is true for the person who always wants what other people have. This becomes a god to him.
49005006	Do not let anyone lead you in the wrong way with foolish talk. The anger of God comes on such people because they choose to not obey Him.
49005007	Have nothing to do with them.
49005008	At one time you lived in darkness. Now you are living in the light that comes from the Lord. Live as children who have the light of the Lord in them.
49005009	This light gives us truth. It makes us right with God and makes us good.
49005010	Learn how to please the Lord.
49005011	Have nothing to do with the bad things done in darkness. Instead, show that these things are wrong.
49005012	It is a shame even to talk about these things done in secret.
49005013	All things can be seen when they are in the light. Everything that can be seen is in the light.
49005014	The Holy Writings say, “Wake up, you who are sleeping. Rise from the dead and Christ will give you light.” (Isaiah 60:1)
49005015	So be careful how you live. Live as men who are wise and not foolish.
49005016	Make the best use of your time. These are sinful days.
49005017	Do not be foolish. Understand what the Lord wants you to do.
49005018	Do not get drunk with wine. That leads to wild living. Instead, be filled with the Holy Spirit.
49005019	Tell of your joy to each other by singing the Songs of David and church songs. Sing in your heart to the Lord.
49005020	Always give thanks for all things to God the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
49005021	Be willing to help and care for each other because of Christ. By doing this, you honor Christ.
49005022	Wives, obey your own husbands. In doing this, you obey the Lord.
49005023	For a husband is the head of his wife as Christ is the head of the church. It is His body (the church) that He saves.
49005024	As the church is to obey Christ, wives are to obey their own husbands in everything.
49005025	Husbands, love your wives. You must love them as Christ loved the church. He gave His life for it.
49005026	Christ did this so He could set the church apart for Himself. He made it clean by the washing of water with the Word.
49005027	Christ did this so the church might stand before Him in shining-greatness. There is to be no sin of any kind in it. It is to be holy and without blame.
49005028	So men should love their wives as they love their own bodies. He who loves his wife loves himself.
49005029	No man hates himself. He takes care of his own body. That is the way Christ does. He cares for His body which is the church.
49005030	We are all a part of His body, the church.
49005031	For this reason, a man must leave his father and mother when he gets married and be joined to his wife. The two become one.
49005032	This is hard to understand, but it shows that the church is the body of Christ.
49005033	So every man must love his wife as he loves himself. Every wife must respect her husband.
49006001	Children, as Christians, obey your parents. This is the right thing to do.
49006002	Respect your father and mother. This is the first Law given that had a promise.
49006003	The promise is this: If you respect your father and mother, you will live a long time and your live will be full of many good things.
49006004	Fathers, do not be too hard on your children so they will become angry. Teach them in their growing years with Christian teaching.
49006005	You servants who are owned by someone must obey your owners. Work for them as hard as you can. Work for them the same as if you were working for Christ.
49006006	Do not work hard only when your owner sees you. You would be doing this just to please men. Work as you would work for Christ. Do what God wants you to do with all your heart.
49006007	Be happy as you work. Do your work as for the Lord, not for men.
49006008	Remember this, whatever good thing you do, the Lord will pay you for it. It is the same to the Lord if you are a servant owned by someone or if you work for pay.
49006009	Owners, do the right thing for those who work for you. Stop saying that you are going to be hard on them. Remember that your Owner and their Owner is in heaven. God does not respect one person more than another.
49006010	This is the last thing I want to say: Be strong with the Lord’s strength.
49006011	Put on the things God gives you to fight with. Then you will not fall into the traps of the devil.
49006012	Our fight is not with people. It is against the leaders and the powers and the spirits of darkness in this world. It is against the demon world that works in the heavens.
49006013	Because of this, put on all the things God gives you to fight with. Then you will be able to stand in that sinful day. When it is all over, you will still be standing.
49006014	So stand up and do not be moved. Wear a belt of truth around your body. Wear a piece of iron over your chest which is being right with God.
49006015	Wear shoes on your feet which are the Good News of peace.
49006016	Most important of all, you need a covering of faith in front of you. This is to put out the fire-arrows of the devil.
49006017	The covering for your head is that you have been saved from the punishment of sin. Take the sword of the Spirit which is the Word of God.
49006018	You must pray at all times as the Holy Spirit leads you to pray. Pray for the things that are needed. You must watch and keep on praying. Remember to pray for all Christians.
49006019	Pray for me also. Pray that I might open my mouth without fear. Pray that I will use the right words to preach that which is hard to understand in the Good News.
49006020	This is the reason I was sent out. But now I am in chains for preaching the Good News. I want to keep on speaking for Christ without fear the way I should.
49006021	Tychicus will tell you how I am getting along. He is a much-loved brother and a faithful preacher.
49006022	I have sent him to you because I want him to tell you about us. He will comfort you.
49006023	May all the Christian brothers have peace and love with faith from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
49006024	May God give loving-favor to all who love our Lord Jesus Christ with a love that never gets weak.
50001001	This letter is from Paul and Timothy. We are servants owned by Jesus Christ. This letter is to all who belong to Christ Jesus who are living in the city of Philippi and to the church leaders and their helpers also.
50001002	May you have loving-favor and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
50001003	I thank God for you whenever I think of you.
50001004	I always have joy as I pray for all of you.
50001005	It is because you have told others the Good News from the first day you heard it until now.
50001006	I am sure that God Who began the good work in you will keep on working in you until the day Jesus Christ comes again.
50001007	It is right for me to feel like this about all of you. It is because you are very dear to me. While I was in prison and when I was proving that the Good News is true, you all shared God’s loving-favor with me.
50001008	God knows what I am saying. He knows how much I love you all with a love that comes from Jesus Christ.
50001009	And this is my prayer: I pray that your love will grow more and more. I pray that you will have better understanding and be wise in all things.
50001010	I pray that you will know what is the very best. I pray that you will be true and without blame until the day Christ comes again.
50001011	And I pray that you will be filled with the fruits of right living. These come from Jesus Christ, with honor and thanks to God.
50001012	Christian brothers, I want you to know that what has happened to me has helped spread the Good News.
50001013	Everyone around here knows why I am in prison. It is because I preached about Jesus Christ. All the soldiers who work for the leader of the country know why I am here.
50001014	Because of this, most of my Christian brothers have had their faith in the Lord made stronger. They have more power to preach the Word of God without fear.
50001015	Some are preaching because they are jealous and want to make trouble. Others are doing it for the right reason.
50001016	These do it because of love. They know that I am put here to prove the Good News is true.
50001017	The others preach about Christ for what they get out of it. Their hearts are not right. They want to make me suffer while I am in prison.
50001018	What difference does it make if they pretend or if they are true? I am happy, yes, and I will keep on being happy that Christ is preached.
50001019	Because of your prayers and the help the Holy Spirit gives me, all of this will turn out for good.
50001020	I hope very much that I will have no reason to be ashamed. I hope to honor Christ with my body if it be by my life or by my death. I want to honor Him without fear, now and always.
50001021	To me, living means having Christ. To die means that I would have more of Him.
50001022	If I keep on living here in this body, it means that I can lead more people to Christ. I do not know which is better.
50001023	There is a strong pull from both sides. I have a desire to leave this world to be with Christ, which is much better.
50001024	But it is more important for you that I stay.
50001025	I am sure I will live to help you grow and be happy in your faith.
50001026	This will give you reason to give more thanks to Christ Jesus when I come to visit you again.
50001027	Live your lives as the Good News of Christ says you should. If I come to you or not, I want to hear that you are standing true as one. I want to hear that you are working together as one, preaching the Good News.
50001028	Do not be afraid of those who hate you. Their hate for you proves they will be destroyed. It proves you have life from God that lasts forever.
50001029	You are not only to put your trust in Him, but you are to suffer for Him also.
50001030	You know what the fight is like. Now it is time for you to have a part in it as I have.
50002001	Are you strong because you belong to Christ? Does His love comfort you? Do you have joy by being as one in sharing the Holy Spirit? Do you have loving-kindness and pity for each other?
50002002	Then give me true joy by thinking the same thoughts. Keep having the same love. Be as one in thoughts and actions.
50002003	Nothing should be done because of pride or thinking about yourself. Think of other people as more important than yourself.
50002004	Do not always be thinking about your own plans only. Be happy to know what other people are doing.
50002005	Think as Christ Jesus thought.
50002006	Jesus has always been as God is. But He did not hold to His rights as God.
50002007	He put aside everything that belonged to Him and made Himself the same as a servant who is owned by someone. He became human by being born as a man.
50002008	After He became a man, He gave up His important place and obeyed by dying on a cross.
50002009	Because of this, God lifted Jesus high above everything else. He gave Him a name that is greater than any other name.
50002010	So when the name of Jesus is spoken, everyone in heaven and on earth and under the earth will bow down before Him.
50002011	And every tongue will say Jesus Christ is Lord. Everyone will give honor to God the Father.
50002012	My Christian friends, you have obeyed me when I was with you. You have obeyed even more when I have been away. You must keep on working to show you have been saved from the punishment of sin. Be afraid that you may not please God.
50002013	He is working in you. God is helping you obey Him. God is doing what He wants done in you.
50002014	Be glad you can do the things you should be doing. Do all things without arguing and talking about how you wish you did not have to do them.
50002015	In that way, you can prove yourselves to be without blame. You are God’s children and no one can talk against you, even in a sin-loving and sin-sick world. You are to shine as lights among the sinful people of this world.
50002016	Take a strong hold on the Word of Life. Then when Christ comes again, I will be happy that I did not work with you for nothing.
50002017	Even if I give my life as a gift on the altar to God for you, I am glad and share this joy with you.
50002018	You must be happy and share your joy with me also.
50002019	I hope by the help of the Lord Jesus that I can send Timothy to you soon. It will comfort me when he brings news about you.
50002020	I have no one else who is as interested in you as Timothy.
50002021	Everyone else thinks of himself instead of Jesus Christ.
50002022	You know how Timothy proved to be such a true friend to me when we preached the Good News. He was like a son helping his father.
50002023	I hope to send Timothy as soon as I know what they are going to do to me.
50002024	I hope by the help of the Lord that I can come soon also.
50002025	I thought it was right that I send Epaphroditus back to you. You helped me by sending him to me. We have worked together like brothers. He was like a soldier fighting beside me.
50002026	He has been wanting to see all of you and was troubled because you heard he was sick.
50002027	It is true, he was sick. Yes, he almost died, but God showed loving-kindness to him and to me. If he had died, I would have had even more sorrow.
50002028	This is all the more reason I have sent him to you. When you see him, you will be glad and I will have less sorrow.
50002029	Take him into your church with joy. Show respect for men like him.
50002030	He came close to death while working for Christ. He almost died doing things for me that you could not do.
50003001	So now, my Christian brothers, be happy because you belong to Christ. It is not hard for me to write the same things to you. It is good for you.
50003002	Watch out for false teachers. Watch out for sinful men. They want you to depend on the religious act of becoming a Jew for your hope.
50003003	The act of becoming a Jew has nothing to do with us becoming Christians. We worship God through His Spirit and are proud of Jesus Christ. We have no faith in what we ourselves can do.
50003004	I could have reason to trust in the flesh. If anyone could feel that the flesh could do something for him, I could.
50003005	I went through the religious act of becoming a Jew when I was eight days old. I was born a Jew and came from the family group of Benjamin. I was a Jewish son of Jewish parents. I belonged to the group of the proud religious law-keepers.
50003006	I followed my religion with all my heart and did everything I could to make it hard for the church. No one could say anything against the way I obeyed the Law.
50003007	But I gave up those things that were so important to me for Christ.
50003008	Even more than that, I think of everything as worth nothing. It is so much better to know Christ Jesus my Lord. I have lost everything for Him. And I think of these things as worth nothing so that I can have Christ.
50003009	I want to be as one with Him. I could not be right with God by what the Law said I must do. I was made right with God by faith in Christ.
50003010	I want to know Him. I want to have the same power in my life that raised Jesus from the dead. I want to understand and have a share in His sufferings and be like Christ in His death.
50003011	Then I may be raised up from among the dead.
50003012	I do not say that I have received this or have already become perfect. But I keep going on to make that life my own as Christ Jesus made me His own.
50003013	No, Christian brothers, I do not have that life yet. But I do one thing. I forget everything that is behind me and look forward to that which is ahead of me.
50003014	My eyes are on the crown. I want to win the race and get the crown of God’s call from heaven through Christ Jesus.
50003015	All of us who are full-grown Christians should think this way. If you do not think this way, God will show it to you.
50003016	So let us keep on obeying the same truth we have already been following.
50003017	Christian brothers, live your lives as I have lived mine. Watch those who live as I have taught you to live.
50003018	There are many whose lives show they hate the cross of Christ. I have told you this before. Now I tell you again with tears in my eyes.
50003019	Their god is their stomach. They take pride in things they should be ashamed of. All they think about are the things of this world. In the end they will be destroyed.
50003020	But we are citizens of heaven. Christ, the One Who saves from the punishment of sin, will be coming down from heaven again. We are waiting for Him to return.
50003021	He will change these bodies of ours of the earth and make them new. He will make them like His body of shining-greatness. He has the power to do this because He can make all things obey Him.
50004001	So, my dear Christian brothers, you are my joy and crown. I want to see you. Keep on staying true to the Lord, my dear friends.
50004002	I ask Euodias and Syntyche to agree as Christians should.
50004003	My true helper, I ask you to help these women who have worked with me so much in preaching the Good News to others. Clement helped also. There are others who worked with me. Their names are in the book of life.
50004004	Be full of joy always because you belong to the Lord. Again I say, be full of joy!
50004005	Let all people see how gentle you are. The Lord is coming again soon.
50004006	Do not worry. Learn to pray about everything. Give thanks to God as you ask Him for what you need.
50004007	The peace of God is much greater than the human mind can understand. This peace will keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
50004008	Christian brothers, keep your minds thinking about whatever is true, whatever is respected, whatever is right, whatever is pure, whatever can be loved, and whatever is well thought of. If there is anything good and worth giving thanks for, think about these things.
50004009	Keep on doing all the things you learned and received and heard from me. Do the things you saw me do. Then the God Who gives peace will be with you.
50004010	The Lord gives me a reason to be full of joy. It is because you are able to care for me again. I know you wanted to before but you did not have a way to help me.
50004011	I am not saying I need anything. I have learned to be happy with whatever I have.
50004012	I know how to get along with little and how to live when I have much. I have learned the secret of being happy at all times. If I am full of food and have all I need, I am happy. If I am hungry and need more, I am happy.
50004013	I can do all things because Christ gives me the strength.
50004014	It was kind of you to help me when I was in trouble.
50004015	You Philippians also know that when I first preached the Good News, you were the only church that helped me. It was when I left for the country of Macedonia.
50004016	Even while I was in the city of Thessalonica you helped me more than once.
50004017	It is not that I want to receive the gift. I want you to get the pay that is coming to you later.
50004018	I have everything I need and more than enough. I am taken care of because Epaphroditus brought your gift. It is a sweet gift. It is a gift that cost you something. It is the kind of gift God is so pleased with.
50004019	And my God will give you everything you need because of His great riches in Christ Jesus.
50004020	Now may our God and Father be honored forever. Let it be so.
50004021	Greet all those who belong to Christ Jesus. The Christian brothers here with me greet you.
50004022	All those who belong to Christ greet you and most of all, those who live in Caesar’s house.
50004023	May your spirit have the loving-favor of the Lord Jesus Christ.
51001001	This letter is from Paul, a missionary for Jesus Christ. God wanted me to work for Him. This letter is from brother Timothy also.
51001002	I am writing to you who belong to Christ in the city of Colossae. May all the Christian brothers there have loving-favor and peace from God our Father.
51001003	We always pray and give thanks to God for you. He is the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
51001004	We give thanks to God for you because we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus. We thank God for your love for all those who belong to Christ.
51001005	We thank God for the hope that is being kept for you in heaven. You first heard about this hope through the Good News which is the Word of Truth.
51001006	The Good News came to you the same as it is now going out to all the world. Lives are being changed, just as your life was changed the day you heard the Good News. You understood the truth about God’s loving-kindness.
51001007	You heard the Good News through our much-loved brother Epaphras who is taking my place. He is a faithful servant of Christ.
51001008	He told us that the Holy Spirit had given you much love.
51001009	This is why I have never stopped praying for you since I heard about you. I ask God that you may know what He wants you to do. I ask God to fill you with the wisdom and understanding the Holy Spirit gives.
51001010	Then your lives will please the Lord. You will do every kind of good work, and you will know more about God.
51001011	I pray that God’s great power will make you strong, and that you will have joy as you wait and do not give up.
51001012	I pray that you will be giving thanks to the Father. He has made it so you could share the good things given to those who belong to Christ who are in the light.
51001013	God took us out of a life of darkness. He has put us in the holy nation of His much-loved Son.
51001014	We have been bought by His blood and made free. Our sins are forgiven through Him.
51001015	Christ is as God is. God cannot be seen. Christ lived before anything was made.
51001016	Christ made everything in the heavens and on the earth. He made everything that is seen and things that are not seen. He made all the powers of heaven. Everything was made by Him and for Him.
51001017	Christ was before all things. All things are held together by Him.
51001018	Christ is the head of the church which is His body. He is the beginning of all things. He is the first to be raised from the dead. He is to have first place in everything.
51001019	God the Father was pleased to have everything made perfect by Christ, His Son.
51001020	Everything in heaven and on earth can come to God because of Christ’s death on the cross. Christ’s blood has made peace.
51001021	At one time you were strangers to God and your minds were at war with Him. Your thoughts and actions were wrong.
51001022	But Christ has brought you back to God by His death on the cross. In this way, Christ can bring you to God, holy and pure and without blame.
51001023	This is for you if you keep the faith. You must not change from what you believe now. You must not leave the hope of the Good News you received. The Good News was preached to you and to all the world. And I, Paul, am one of Christ’s missionaries.
51001024	Now I am full of joy to be suffering for you. In my own body I am doing my share of what has to be done to make Christ’s sufferings complete. This is for His body which is the Church.
51001025	I became a preacher in His church for your good. In the plan of God I am to preach the Good News.
51001026	This great secret was hidden to the people of times past, but it is now made known to those who belong to Christ.
51001027	God wants these great riches of the hidden truth to be made known to the people who are not Jews. The secret is this: Christ in you brings hope of all the great things to come.
51001028	We preach Christ. We tell every man how he must live. We use wisdom in teaching every man. We do this so every man will be complete in Christ.
51001029	This is the reason I am working. God’s great power is working in me.
51002001	I want you to know how hard I have worked for you and for the Christians in the city of Laodicea and for those who have never seen me.
51002002	May their hearts be given comfort. May they be brought close together in Christian love. May they be rich in understanding and know God’s secret. It is Christ Himself.
51002003	In Christ are hidden all the riches of wisdom and understanding.
51002004	I tell you this so no one will try to change your mind with big sounding talk.
51002005	Even if I am far away from you in body, I am with you in spirit. I am happy to learn how well you are getting along. It is good to hear that your faith is so strong in Christ.
51002006	As you have put your trust in Christ Jesus the Lord to save you from the punishment of sin, now let Him lead you in every step.
51002007	Have your roots planted deep in Christ. Grow in Him. Get your strength from Him. Let Him make you strong in the faith as you have been taught. Your life should be full of thanks to Him.
51002008	Be careful that no one changes your mind and faith by much learning and big sounding ideas. Those things are what men dream up. They are always trying to make new religions. These leave out Christ.
51002009	For Christ is not only God-like, He is God in human flesh.
51002010	When you have Christ, you are complete. He is the head over all leaders and powers.
51002011	When you became a Christian, you were set free from the sinful things of the world. This was not done by human hands. You were set free from the sins of your old self by what was done in Christ’s body.
51002012	When you were baptized, you were buried as Christ was buried. When you were raised up in baptism, you were raised as Christ was raised. You were raised to a new life by putting your trust in God. It was God Who raised Jesus from the dead.
51002013	When you were dead in your sins, you were not set free from the sinful things of the world. But God forgave your sins and gave you new life through Christ.
51002014	We had broken the Law many ways. Those sins were held against us by the Law. That Law had writings which said we were sinners. But now He has destroyed that writing by nailing it to the cross.
51002015	God took away the power of the leaders of this world and the powers of darkness. He showed them to the world. The battle was won over them through Christ.
51002016	Do not let anyone tell you what you should or should not eat or drink. They have no right to say if it is right or wrong to eat certain foods or if you are to go to religious suppers. They have no right to say what you are to do at the time of the new moon or on the Day of Rest.
51002017	These things are a picture of what is coming. The important thing is Christ Himself.
51002018	Do not let anyone rob you of your crown. They will try to get you to bow down in worship of angels. They think this shows you are not proud. They say they were told to do this in a dream. These people are proud because of their sinful minds.
51002019	Such people are not a part of Christ. Christ is the Head. We Christians make up His body. We are joined together as a body is held together. Our strength to grow comes from Christ.
51002020	You have died with Christ and become dead to those old ways. Then why do you follow the old ways of worship? Why do you obey man-made rules?
51002021	These rules say, “You must not put your hand on this.” “Do not put this into your mouth.” “You must not put your finger on that.”
51002022	All these things come to an end when they are used. You are following only man-made rules.
51002023	It looks as if it is wise to follow these rules in an act of worship, because they are hard on the body. It looks as if they are done without pride, but they are worth nothing. They do not take away a man’s desire to sin.
51003001	If then you have been raised with Christ, keep looking for the good things of heaven. This is where Christ is seated on the right side of God.
51003002	Keep your minds thinking about things in heaven. Do not think about things on the earth.
51003003	You are dead to the things of this world. Your new life is now hidden in God through Christ.
51003004	Christ is our life. When He comes again, you will also be with Him to share His shining-greatness.
51003005	Destroy the desires to sin that are in you. These desires are: sex sins, anything that is not clean, a desire for sex sins, and wanting something someone else has. This is worshiping a god.
51003006	It is because of these sins that the anger of God comes down on those who do not obey Him.
51003007	You used to do these sins when you lived that kind of life.
51003008	Put out of your life these things also: anger, bad temper, bad feelings toward others, talk that hurts people, speaking against God, and dirty talk.
51003009	Do not lie to each other. You have put out of your life your old ways.
51003010	You have now become a new person and are always learning more about Christ. You are being made more like Christ. He is the One Who made you.
51003011	There is no difference in men in this new life. Greeks and Jews are the same. The man who has gone through the religious act of becoming a Jew and the one who has not are the same. There is no difference between nations. Men who are servants and those who are free are the same. Christ is everything. He is in all of us.
51003012	God has chosen you. You are holy and loved by Him. Because of this, your new life should be full of loving-pity. You should be kind to others and have no pride. Be gentle and be willing to wait for others.
51003013	Try to understand other people. Forgive each other. If you have something against someone, forgive him. That is the way the Lord forgave you.
51003014	And to all these things, you must add love. Love holds everything and everybody together and makes all these good things perfect.
51003015	Let the peace of Christ have power over your hearts. You were chosen as a part of His body. Always be thankful.
51003016	Let the teaching of Christ and His words keep on living in you. These make your lives rich and full of wisdom. Keep on teaching and helping each other. Sing the Songs of David and the church songs and the songs of heaven with hearts full of thanks to God.
51003017	Whatever you say or do, do it in the name of the Lord Jesus. Give thanks to God the Father through the Lord Jesus.
51003018	Wives, obey your husbands. This is what the Lord wants you to do.
51003019	Husbands, love your wives. Do not hold hard feelings against them.
51003020	Children, obey your parents in everything. The Lord is pleased when you do.
51003021	Fathers, do not be so hard on your children that they will give up trying to do what is right.
51003022	You who are servants who are owned by someone, obey your owners. Work hard for them all the time, not just when they are watching you. Work for them as you would for the Lord because you honor God.
51003023	Whatever work you do, do it with all your heart. Do it for the Lord and not for men.
51003024	Remember that you will get your reward from the Lord. He will give you what you should receive. You are working for the Lord Christ.
51003025	If anyone does wrong, he will suffer for it. God does not respect one person more than another.
51004001	Owners, give your servants what is right. Do the same for all. Remember that your Owner is in heaven.
51004002	You must keep praying. Keep watching! Be thankful always.
51004003	As you pray, be sure to pray for us also. Pray that God will open the door for us to preach the Word. We want to tell the secret of Christ. And this is the reason I am in prison.
51004004	Pray that I will be able to preach so everyone can understand. This is the way I should speak.
51004005	Be wise in the way you live around those who are not Christians. Make good use of your time.
51004006	Speak with them in such a way they will want to listen to you. Do not let your talk sound foolish. Know how to give the right answer to anyone.
51004007	Tychicus will tell you how I am getting along. He is a much-loved brother and faithful helper. Both of us are owned by the Lord.
51004008	This is the reason I have sent him to you. It is so you can know about us. He can also bring joy to your hearts.
51004009	Onesimus is going with Tychicus. He is one of your own people. He is faithful and we love him very much. They will tell you about everything here.
51004010	One of the men here in prison with me is Aristarchus. He greets you. Mark, the cousin of Barnabas, greets you. (You have heard before that if he comes to you, you are to receive him and make him happy.)
51004011	Jesus Justus greets you also. These are the only Jewish workers helping me teach about the holy nation of God. What a help they have been to me!
51004012	Epaphras greets you. He is one of your people and a servant of Jesus Christ. As he prays for you, he asks God to help you to be strong and to make you perfect. He prays that you will know what God wants you to do in all things.
51004013	I can tell you for sure that he works hard for you and for the Christians in the cities of Laodicea and Hierapolis.
51004014	Luke, the dear doctor, and Demas greet you.
51004015	Greet all the Christians in Laodicea. Greet Nympha and the Christians who gather for church in her house.
51004016	When this letter has been read to you, have it read in the church in Laodicea also. Be sure you read the letter that is coming from Laodicea.
51004017	Tell Archippus to be sure to finish the work the Lord called him to do.
51004018	I, Paul, am writing this last part with my own hand. Do not forget that I am in prison. May you have God’s loving-favor.
52001001	This letter is from Paul and Silas and Timothy. It is to you, the church, in the city of Thessalonica. You belong to God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ. May you have His loving-favor and His peace.
52001002	We thank God for you all the time and pray for you.
52001003	While praying to God our Father, we always remember your work of faith and your acts of love and your hope that never gives up in our Lord Jesus Christ.
52001004	Christian brothers, we know God loves you and that He has chosen you.
52001005	The Good News did not come to you by word only, but with power and through the Holy Spirit. You knew it was true. You also knew how we lived among you. It was for your good.
52001006	You followed our way of life and the life of the Lord. You suffered from others because of listening to us. But you had the joy that came from the Holy Spirit.
52001007	Because of your good lives, you are showing all the Christians in the countries of Macedonia and Greece how to live.
52001008	The Word of the Lord has been spoken by you in the countries of Macedonia and Greece. People everywhere know of your faith in God without our telling them.
52001009	The people themselves tell us how you received us when we came to you. They talk of how you turned to God from worshiping false gods. Now you worship the true and living God.
52001010	They tell us how you are waiting for His Son Jesus to come down from heaven. God raised Him from the dead. It is Jesus Who will save us from the anger of God that is coming.
52002001	Christian brothers, you know that my visit with you was not wasted.
52002002	Just before we came to you, we had been in the city of Philippi. You know how they worked against us and made us suffer. But God helped us preach the Good News to you without fear, even while many people hated us and made it hard for us.
52002003	You remember what we said to you was true. We had no wrong desire in teaching you. We did not try to fool you.
52002004	God has allowed us to be trusted with the Good News. Because of this, we preach it to please God, not man. God tests and proves our hearts.
52002005	You know we never used smooth-sounding words. God knows we never tried to get money from you by preaching.
52002006	We never looked for thanks from men, not from you or from anyone else. But because we were missionaries of Christ, we could have asked you to do much for us.
52002007	Instead, we were gentle when we came to you. We were like a mother caring for her children.
52002008	We had such a strong desire to help you that we were happy to give you the Good News. Because we loved you so much, we were ready to give you our own lives also.
52002009	You remember, Christian brothers, we worked night and day for our food and clothes while we preached the Good News to you. We did not want to make it hard for you.
52002010	You know, and so does God, how pure and right and without blame we were among you who believe.
52002011	As a father helps his children, you know how we wanted to help you and give you comfort. We told you with strong words
52002012	that you should live to please God. He is the One Who chose you to come into His holy nation and to share His shining-greatness.
52002013	We always thank God that when you heard the Word of God from us, you believed it. You did not receive it as from men, but you received it as the Word of God. That is what it is. It is at work in the lives of you who believe.
52002014	Christian brothers, you became just like the churches in the country of Judea. You had to suffer from the men in your country as those churches had to suffer from the Jews.
52002015	It was the Jews who killed the Lord Jesus and the early preachers. The Jews made it hard for us and made us leave. They do not please God and are working against all men.
52002016	They tried to keep us from preaching the Good News to the people who are not Jews. The Jews do not want them saved from the punishment of sin. The lives of the Jews are full of more sin all the time. But now God’s anger has come to them at last.
52002017	Christian brothers, because we have not been able to be with you, our hearts have been with you. We have wanted very much to see you.
52002018	We wanted to come to you. I, Paul, have tried to come to you more than once but Satan kept us from coming.
52002019	Who is our hope or joy or crown of happiness? It is you, when you stand before our Lord Jesus Christ when He comes again.
52002020	You are our pride and joy.
52003001	When we could wait no longer, we decided it was best to stay in the city of Athens alone.
52003002	And we sent Timothy to you. He works with us for God, teaching the Good News of Christ. We sent him to give strength and comfort to your faith.
52003003	We do not want anyone to give up because of troubles. You know that we can expect troubles.
52003004	Even when we were with you, we told you that much trouble would come to us. It has come as you can see.
52003005	For this reason, I could wait no longer. I sent Timothy to find out about your faith. I was afraid the devil had tempted you. Then our work with you would be wasted.
52003006	But Timothy has come to us from you. He brought good news about your faith and love. It is good to know that you think well of us and that you would like to see us. We would like to see you also.
52003007	Christian brothers, word about your faith has made us happy even while we are suffering and are in much trouble.
52003008	It is life to us to know that your faith in the Lord is strong.
52003009	How can we give God enough thanks for you for all the joy you give us?
52003010	We keep on praying night and day that we may see you again. We want to help your faith to be complete.
52003011	May our God and Father Himself and the Lord Jesus Christ take us on our way to you.
52003012	May the Lord make you grow in love for each other and for everyone. We have this kind of love for you.
52003013	May our God and Father make your hearts strong and without blame. May your hearts be without sin in God’s sight when our Lord Jesus comes again with all those who belong to Him.
52004001	Christian brothers, we ask you, because of the Lord Jesus, to keep on living in a way that will please God. I have already told you how to grow in the Christian life.
52004002	The Lord Jesus gave us the right and the power to tell you what to do.
52004003	God wants you to be holy. You must keep away from sex sins.
52004004	God wants each of you to use his body in the right way by keeping it holy and by respecting it.
52004005	You should not use it to please your own desires like the people who do not know God.
52004006	No man should do wrong to his Christian brother in anything. The Lord will punish a person who does. I have told you this before.
52004007	For God has not called us to live in sin. He has called us to live a holy life.
52004008	The one who turns away from this teaching does not turn away from man, but from God. It is God Who has given us His Holy Spirit.
52004009	You do not need anyone to write to you about loving your Christian brothers. God has taught you to love each other.
52004010	You love all the Christians in all the country of Macedonia. But we ask you to love them even more.
52004011	Do your best to live a quiet life. Learn to do your own work well. We told you about this before.
52004012	By doing this, you will be respected by those who are not Christians. Then you will not be in need and others will not have to help you.
52004013	Christian brothers, we want you to know for sure about those who have died. You have no reason to have sorrow as those who have no hope.
52004014	We believe that Jesus died and then came to life again. Because we believe this, we know that God will bring to life again all those who belong to Jesus.
52004015	We tell you this as it came from the Lord. Those of us who are alive when the Lord comes again will not go ahead of those who have died.
52004016	For the Lord Himself will come down from heaven with a loud call. The head angel will speak with a loud voice. God’s horn will give its sounds. First, those who belong to Christ will come out of their graves to meet the Lord.
52004017	Then, those of us who are still living here on earth will be gathered together with them in the clouds. We will meet the Lord in the sky and be with Him forever.
52004018	Because of this, comfort each other with these words.
52005001	You do not need anyone to write to tell you when and at what kind of times these things will happen.
52005002	You know for sure that the day the Lord comes back to earth will be as a robber coming in the night.
52005003	When they say, “Everything is fine and safe,” then all at once they will be destroyed. It will be like pain that comes on a woman when a child is born. They will not be able to get away from it.
52005004	But you are not in darkness, Christian brothers. That day will not surprise you as a robber would.
52005005	For you are children of the light and of the day. We are not of darkness or of night.
52005006	Keep awake! Do not sleep like others. Watch and keep your minds awake to what is happening.
52005007	People sleep at night. Those who get drunk do it at night.
52005008	Because we are men of the day, let us keep our minds awake. Let us cover our chests with faith and love. Let us cover our heads with the hope of being saved.
52005009	God planned to save us from the punishment of sin through our Lord Jesus Christ. He did not plan for us to suffer from His anger.
52005010	He died for us so that, dead or alive, we will be with Him.
52005011	So comfort each other and make each other strong as you are already doing.
52005012	We ask you, Christian brothers, to respect those who work among you. The Lord has placed them over you and they are your teachers.
52005013	You must think much of them and love them because of their work. Live in peace with each other.
52005014	We ask you, Christian brothers, speak to those who do not want to work. Comfort those who feel they cannot keep going on. Help the weak. Understand and be willing to wait for all men.
52005015	Do not let anyone pay back for the bad he received. But look for ways to do good to each other and to all people.
52005016	Be full of joy all the time.
52005017	Never stop praying.
52005018	In everything give thanks. This is what God wants you to do because of Christ Jesus.
52005019	Do not try to stop the work of the Holy Spirit.
52005020	Do not laugh at those who speak for God.
52005021	Test everything and do not let good things get away from you.
52005022	Keep away from everything that even looks like sin.
52005023	May the God of peace set you apart for Himself. May every part of you be set apart for God. May your spirit and your soul and your body be kept complete. May you be without blame when our Lord Jesus Christ comes again.
52005024	The One Who called you is faithful and will do what He promised.
52005025	Christian brothers, pray for us.
52005026	Greet all the Christians with a kiss of holy love.
52005027	I tell you to have this letter read to all the Christians.
52005028	May you have loving-favor from our Lord Jesus Christ.
53001001	This letter is from Paul and Silas and Timothy. It is to the church in the city of Thessalonica that belongs to God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
53001002	May you have loving-favor and peace from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
53001003	We must give thanks to God for you always, Christian brothers. It is the right thing to do because your faith is growing so much. Your love for each other is stronger all the time.
53001004	We are proud of you and tell the other churches about you. We tell them how your faith stays so strong even when people make it hard for you and make you suffer.
53001005	God wants you to prove yourselves to be worth being in His holy nation by suffering for Him.
53001006	He does what is right and will allow trouble to come to those who are making it hard for you.
53001007	He will help you and us who are suffering. This will happen when the Lord Jesus comes down from heaven with His powerful angels in a bright fire.
53001008	He will punish those who do not know God and those who do not obey the Good News of our Lord Jesus Christ.
53001009	They will be punished forever and taken away from the Lord and from the shining-greatness of His power.
53001010	On the day He comes, His shining-greatness will be seen in those who belong to Him. On that day, He will receive honor from all those who put their trust in Him. You believed what we had to say to you.
53001011	For this reason, we always pray for you. We pray that our God will make you worth being chosen. We pray that His power will help you do the good things you want to do. We pray that your work of faith will be complete.
53001012	In this way, the name of the Lord Jesus Christ will be honored by you and you will be honored by Him. It is through the loving-favor of our God and of the Lord Jesus Christ.
53002001	Our Lord Jesus Christ is coming again. We will be gathered together to meet Him. But we ask you, Christian brothers,
53002002	do not be troubled in mind or worried by the talk you hear. Some say that the Lord has already come. People may say that I wrote this in a letter or that a spirit told them.
53002003	Do not let anyone fool you. For the Lord will not come again until many people turn away from God. Then the leader of those who break the law will come. He is the man of sin.
53002004	He works against and puts himself above every kind of god that is worshiped. He will take his seat in the house of God and say that he himself is God.
53002005	Do you not remember that while I was with you, I told you this?
53002006	You know the power that is keeping the man of sin back now. The man of sin will come only when his time is ready.
53002007	For the secret power of breaking the law is already at work in the world. But that secret power can only do so much until the One Who keeps back the man of sin is taken out of the way.
53002008	Then this man of sin will come. The Lord Jesus will kill him with the breath of His mouth. The coming of Christ will put an end to him.
53002009	Satan will use this man of sin. He will have Satan’s power. He will do strange things and many powerful works that will be false.
53002010	Those who are lost in sin will be fooled by the things he can do. They are lost in sin because they did not love the truth that would save them.
53002011	For this reason, God will allow them to follow false teaching so they will believe a lie.
53002012	They will all be guilty as they stand before God because they wanted to do what was wrong.
53002013	Christian brothers, the Lord loves you. We always thank God for you. It is because God has chosen you from the beginning to save you from the punishment of sin. He chose to make you holy by the Holy Spirit and to give you faith to believe the truth.
53002014	It was by our preaching the Good News that you were chosen. He chose you to share the shining-greatness of our Lord Jesus Christ.
53002015	So then, Christian brothers, keep a strong hold on what we have taught you by what we have said and by what we have written.
53002016	Our Lord Jesus Christ and God our Father loves us. Through His loving-favor He gives us comfort and hope that lasts forever.
53002017	May He give your hearts comfort and strength to say and do every good thing.
53003001	My last words to you, Christian brothers, are that you pray for us. Pray that the Word of the Lord will go out over all the land and prove its power just as it did with you.
53003002	Pray that we will be kept from sinful men, because not all men are Christians.
53003003	But the Lord is faithful. He will give you strength and keep you safe from the devil.
53003004	We have faith in the Lord for you. We believe you are doing and will keep on doing the things we told you.
53003005	May the Lord lead your hearts into the love of God. May He help you as you wait for Christ.
53003006	Now this is what we tell you to do, Christian brothers. In the name of the Lord Jesus, keep away from any Christian who is lazy and who does not do what we taught you.
53003007	You know you should follow the way of life we lived when we were with you. We worked hard while we were there.
53003008	We did not eat anyone’s food without paying for it. We worked hard night and day so none of you would have to give us anything.
53003009	We could have asked you to give us food. But we did not so that you might follow our way of living.
53003010	When we were with you, we told you that if a man does not work, he should not eat.
53003011	We hear that some are not working. But they are spending their time trying to see what others are doing.
53003012	Our words to such people are that they should be quiet and go to work. They should eat their own food. In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ we say this.
53003013	But you, Christian brothers, do not get tired of doing good.
53003014	If anyone does not want to listen to what we say in this letter, remember who he is and stay away from him. In that way, he will be put to shame.
