53003015	Do not think of him as one who hates you. But talk to him as a Christian brother.
53003016	May the Lord of peace give you His peace at all times. The Lord be with you all.
53003017	I, Paul, write this last part with my own hand. It is the way I finish all my letters.
53003018	May all of you have loving-favor from our Lord Jesus Christ.
54001001	This letter is from Paul, a missionary of Jesus Christ. I am sent by God, the One Who saves, and by our Lord Jesus Christ Who is our hope.
54001002	I write to you, Timothy. You are my son in the Christian faith. May God the Father and Jesus Christ our Lord give you His loving-favor and loving-kindness and peace.
54001003	When I left for the country of Macedonia, I asked you to stay in the city of Ephesus. I wanted you to stay there so you could tell those who are teaching what is not true to stop.
54001004	They should not listen to stories that are not true. It is foolish for them to try to learn more about their early fathers. These only bring more questions to their minds and do not make their faith in God stronger.
54001005	We want to see our teaching help you have a true love that comes from a pure heart. Such love comes from a heart that says we are not guilty and from a faith that does not pretend.
54001006	But some have turned away from these things. They have turned to foolish talking.
54001007	Some of them want to be teachers of the Law. But they do not know what they are talking about even if they act as if they do.
54001008	We know the Law is good when it is used the way God meant it to be used.
54001009	We must remember the Law is not for the person who is right with God. It is for those who do not obey anybody or anything. It is for the sinners who hate God and speak against Him. It is for those who kill their fathers and mothers and for those who kill other people.
54001010	It is for those who do sex sins and for people who do sex sins with their own sex. It is for people who steal other people and for those who lie and for those who promise not to lie, but do. It is for everything that is against right teaching.
54001011	The great Good News of our honored God is right teaching. God has trusted me to preach this Good News.
54001012	I thank Christ Jesus our Lord for the power and strength He has given me. He trusted me and gave me His work to do.
54001013	Before He chose me, I talked bad about Christ. I made His followers suffer. I hurt them every way I could. But God had loving-kindness for me. I did not understand what I was doing for I was not a Christian then.
54001014	Then our Lord gave me much of His loving-favor and faith and love which are found in Christ Jesus.
54001015	What I say is true and all the world should receive it. Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners from their sin and I am the worst sinner.
54001016	And yet God had loving-kindness for me. Jesus Christ used me to show how long He will wait for even the worst sinners. In that way, others will know they can have life that lasts forever also.
54001017	We give honor and thanks to the King Who lives forever. He is the One Who never dies and Who is never seen. He is the One Who knows all things. He is the only God. Let it be so.
54001018	Timothy, my son, here is my word to you. Fight well for the Lord! God’s preachers told us you would.
54001019	Keep a strong hold on your faith in Christ. May your heart always say you are right. Some people have not listened to what their hearts say. They have done what they knew was wrong. Because of this, their faith in Christ was wrecked.
54001020	This happened to Hymenaeus and Alexander. I gave them over to Satan to teach them not to speak against God.
54002001	First of all, I ask you to pray much for all men and to give thanks for them.
54002002	Pray for kings and all others who are in power over us so we might live quiet God-like lives in peace.
54002003	It is good when you pray like this. It pleases God Who is the One Who saves.
54002004	He wants all people to be saved from the punishment of sin. He wants them to come to know the truth.
54002005	There is one God. There is one Man standing between God and men. That Man is Christ Jesus.
54002006	He gave His life for all men so they could go free and not be held by the power of sin. God made this known to the world at the right time.
54002007	This is why I was chosen to be a teacher and a missionary. I am to teach faith and truth to the people who do not know God. I am not lying but telling the truth.
54002008	I want men everywhere to pray. They should lift up holy hands as they pray. They should not be angry or argue.
54002009	Christian women should not be dressed in the kind of clothes and their hair should not be combed in a way that will make people look at them. They should not wear much gold or pearls or clothes that cost much money.
54002010	Instead of these things, Christian women should be known for doing good things and living good lives.
54002011	Women should be quiet when they learn. They should listen to what men have to say.
54002012	I never let women teach men or be leaders over men. They should be quiet.
54002013	Adam was made first, then Eve.
54002014	Adam was not fooled by Satan; it was the woman who was fooled and sinned.
54002015	But women will be saved through the giving of birth to children if they keep on in faith and live loving and holy lives.
54003001	It is true that if a man wants to be a church leader, he wants to do a good work.
54003002	A church leader must be a good man. His life must be so no one can say anything against him. He must have only one wife and must be respected for his good living. He must be willing to take people into his home. He must be willing to learn and able to teach the Word of God.
54003003	He must not get drunk or want to fight. Instead, he must be gentle. He must not have a love for money.
54003004	He should be a good leader in his own home. His children must obey and respect him.
54003005	If a man cannot be a good leader in his own home, how can he lead the church?
54003006	A church leader must not be a new Christian. A new Christian might become proud and fall into sin which is brought on by the devil.
54003007	A church leader must be respected by people who are not Christians so nothing can be said against him. In that way, he will not be trapped by the devil.
54003008	Church helpers must also be good men and act so people will respect them. They must speak the truth. They must not get drunk. They must not have a love for money.
54003009	They must have their faith in Christ and be His follower with a heart that says they are right.
54003010	They must first be tested to see if they are ready for the work as church helpers. Then if they do well, they may be chosen as church helpers.
54003011	The wives of church helpers must be careful how they act. They must not carry stories from one person to another. They must be wise and faithful in all they do.
54003012	Church helpers must have only one wife. They must lead their home well and their children must obey them.
54003013	Those who work well as church helpers will be respected by others and their own faith in Christ Jesus will grow.
54003014	I hope to come to you soon. I am writing these things
54003015	because it may be awhile before I get there. I wanted you to know how you should act among people in the church which is the house of the living God. The church holds up the truth.
54003016	It is important to know the secret of God-like living, which is: Christ came to earth as a Man. He was pure in His Spirit. He was seen by angels. The nations heard about Him. Men everywhere put their trust in Him. He was taken up into heaven.
54004001	The Holy Spirit tells us in plain words that in the last days some people will turn away from the faith. They will listen to what is said about spirits and follow the teaching about demons.
54004002	Those who teach this tell it as the truth when they know it is a lie. They do it so much that their own hearts no longer say it is wrong.
54004003	They will say, “Do not get married. Do not eat some kinds of food.” But God gave these things to Christians who know the truth. We are to thank God for them.
54004004	Everything God made is good. We should not put anything aside if we can take it and thank God for it.
54004005	It is made holy by the Word of God and prayer.
54004006	If you keep telling these things to the Christians, you will be a good worker for Jesus Christ. You will feed your own soul on these words of faith and on this good teaching which you have followed.
54004007	Have nothing to do with foolish stories old women tell. Keep yourself growing in God-like living.
54004008	Growing strong in body is all right but growing in God-like living is more important. It will not only help you in this life now but in the next life also.
54004009	These words are true and they can be trusted.
54004010	Because of this, we work hard and do our best because our hope is in the living God, the One Who would save all men. He saves those who believe in Him.
54004011	Tell people that this is what they must do.
54004012	Let no one show little respect for you because you are young. Show other Christians how to live by your life. They should be able to follow you in the way you talk and in what you do. Show them how to live in faith and in love and in holy living.
54004013	Until I come, read and preach and teach the Word of God to the church.
54004014	Be sure to use the gift God gave you. The leaders saw this in you when they laid their hands on you and said what you should do.
54004015	Think about all this. Work at it so everyone may see you are growing as a Christian.
54004016	Watch yourself how you act and what you teach. Stay true to what is right. If you do, you and those who hear you will be saved from the punishment of sin.
54005001	Do not speak sharp words to an older man. Talk with him as if he were a father. Talk to younger men as brothers.
54005002	Talk to older women as mothers. Talk to younger women as sisters, keeping yourself pure.
54005003	Help women whose husbands have died.
54005004	If a woman whose husband has died has children or grandchildren, they are the ones to care for her. In that way, they can pay back to their parents the kindness that has been shown to them. God is pleased when this is done.
54005005	Women whose husbands have died are alone in this world. Their trust is in the Lord. They pray day and night.
54005006	But the one who lives only for the joy she can receive from this world is the same as dead even if she is alive.
54005007	Teach these things so they will do what is right.
54005008	Anyone who does not take care of his family and those in his house has turned away from the faith. He is worse than a person who has never put his trust in Christ.
54005009	A woman over sixty years old whose husband has died may receive help from the church. To receive this help, she must have been the wife of one man.
54005010	She must be known for doing good things for people and for being a good mother. She must be known for taking strangers into her home and for washing the feet of Christians. She must be known for helping those who suffer and for showing kindness.
54005011	Do not write the names of younger women whose husbands have died together with the names of others who need help. They will turn away from Christ because of wanting to get married again.
54005012	Then they would be thought of as guilty of breaking their first promise.
54005013	They will waste their time. They will go from house to house carrying stories. They will find fault with people and say things they should not talk about.
54005014	I think it is best for younger women whose husbands have died to get married. They should have children and care for their own homes. Then no one can speak against them.
54005015	Some of these women have already turned away to follow Satan.
54005016	If you have any women whose husbands have died in your family, you must care for them. The church should not have to help them. The church can help women whose husbands have died who are all alone in this world and have no one else to help them.
54005017	Leaders who do their work well should be given twice as much pay, and for sure, those who work hard preaching and teaching.
54005018	The Holy Writings say, “When a cow is walking on the grain to break it open, do not stop it from eating some” (Deuteronomy 25:4), and “A person who works should be paid.” (Matthew 10:10)
54005019	Do not listen to what someone says against a church leader unless two or three persons say the same thing.
54005020	Show those who keep on sinning where they are wrong in front of the whole church. Then others will be afraid of sinning.
54005021	I tell you from my heart that you must follow these rules without deciding before the truth is known. God and Jesus Christ and the chosen angels know what I am saying. Show favors to no one.
54005022	Do not be in a hurry about choosing a church leader. You do not want to have any part in other men’s sins. Keep yourself pure.
54005023	Do not drink water only. Use a little wine because of your stomach and because you are sick so often.
54005024	The sins of some men can be seen. Their sins go before them and make them guilty. The sins of other men will be seen later.
54005025	In the same way, good works are easy to see now. But some that are not easy to be seen cannot always be hid.
54006001	All you Christians who are servants must respect your owners and work hard for them. Do not let the name of God and our teaching be spoken against because of poor work.
54006002	Those who have Christian owners must respect their owners because they are Christian brothers. They should work hard for them because much-loved Christian brothers are being helped by their work. Teach and preach these things.
54006003	Someone may teach something else. He may not agree with the teaching of our Lord Jesus Christ. He may not teach you to live God-like lives.
54006004	Such a person is full of pride and knows nothing. He wastes time on questions and argues about things that are not important. This makes those he teaches jealous and they want to fight. They talk bad and have bad ideas about others.
54006005	Men who are not able to use their minds in the right way because of sin argue all the time. They do not have the truth. They think religion is a way to get much for themselves.
54006006	A God-like life gives us much when we are happy for what we have.
54006007	We came into this world with nothing. For sure, when we die, we will take nothing with us.
54006008	If we have food and clothing, let us be happy.
54006009	But men who want lots of money are tempted. They are trapped into doing all kinds of foolish things and things which hurt them. These things drag them into sin and will destroy them.
54006010	The love of money is the beginning of all kinds of sin. Some people have turned from the faith because of their love for money. They have made much pain for themselves because of this.
54006011	But you, man of God, turn away from all these sinful things. Work at being right with God. Live a God-like life. Have faith and love. Be willing to wait. Have a kind heart.
54006012	Fight the good fight of faith. Take hold of the life that lasts forever. You were chosen to receive it. You have spoken well about this life in front of many people.
54006013	I tell you this before God Who gives life to all people and before Jesus Christ Who spoke well in front of Pontius Pilate.
54006014	You must do all our Lord Jesus Christ said so no one can speak against you. Do this until He comes again.
54006015	At the right time, we will be shown that God is the One Who has all power. He is the King of kings and Lord of lords.
54006016	He can never die. He lives in a light so bright that no man can go near Him. No man has ever seen God or can see Him. Honor and power belong to Him forever. Let it be so.
54006017	Tell those who are rich in this world not to be proud and not to trust in their money. Money cannot be trusted. They should put their trust in God. He gives us all we need for our happiness.
54006018	Tell them to do good and be rich in good works. They should give much to those in need and be ready to share.
54006019	Then they will be gathering together riches for themselves. These good things are what they will build on for the future. Then they will have the only true life!
54006020	Timothy, keep safe what God has trusted you with. Turn away from foolish talk. Do not argue with those who think they know so much. They know less than they think they do.
54006021	Some people have gone after much learning. It has proved to be false and they have turned away from the faith. May you have God’s loving-favor.
55001001	This letter is from Paul, a missionary of Jesus Christ. God has sent me to tell that He has promised life that lasts forever through Christ Jesus.
55001002	I am writing to you, Timothy. You are my much-loved son. May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord give you His loving-favor and loving-kindness and peace.
55001003	I thank God for you. I pray for you night and day. I am working for God the way my early fathers worked. My heart says I am free from sin.
55001004	When I remember your tears, it makes me want to see you. That would fill me with joy.
55001005	I remember your true faith. It is the same faith your grandmother Lois had and your mother Eunice had. I am sure you have that same faith also.
55001006	For this reason, I ask you to keep using the gift God gave you. It came to you when I laid my hands on you and prayed that God would use you.
55001007	For God did not give us a spirit of fear. He gave us a spirit of power and of love and of a good mind.
55001008	Do not be ashamed to tell others about what our Lord said, or of me here in prison. I am here because of Jesus Christ. Be ready to suffer for preaching the Good News and God will give you the strength you need.
55001009	He is the One Who saved us from the punishment of sin. He is the One Who chose us to do His work. It is not because of anything we have done. But it was His plan from the beginning that He would give us His loving-favor through Christ Jesus.
55001010	We know about it now because of the coming of Jesus Christ, the One Who saves. He put a stop to the power of death and brought life that never dies which is seen through the Good News.
55001011	I have been chosen to be a missionary and a preacher and a teacher of this Good News.
55001012	For this reason, I am suffering. But I am not ashamed. I know the One in Whom I have put my trust. I am sure He is able to keep safe that which I have trusted to Him until the day He comes again.
55001013	Keep all the things I taught you. They were given to you in the faith and love of Jesus Christ.
55001014	Keep safe that which He has trusted you with by the Holy Spirit Who lives in us.
55001015	I am sure you have heard that all the Christians in the countries of Asia have turned away from me. Phygelus and Hermogenes turned away also.
55001016	Onesiphorus was not ashamed of me in prison. He came often to comfort me. May the Lord show loving-kindness to his family.
55001017	When he came to Rome, he looked everywhere until he found me.
55001018	You know what a help he was to me in Ephesus. When the Lord comes again, may He show loving-kindness to Onesiphorus.
55002001	So you, my son, be strong in the loving-favor of Christ Jesus.
55002002	What you have heard me say in front of many people, you must teach to faithful men. Then they will be able to teach others also.
55002003	Take your share of suffering as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.
55002004	No soldier fighting in a war can take time to make a living. He must please the one who made him a soldier.
55002005	Anyone who runs in a race must follow the rules to get the crown.
55002006	A hard-working farmer should receive first some of what he gathers from the field.
55002007	Think about these things and the Lord will help you understand them.
55002008	Remember this! Jesus Christ, Who was born from the early family of David, was raised from the dead! This is the Good News I preach.
55002009	I suffer much and am in prison as one who has done something very bad. I am in chains, but the Word of God is not chained.
55002010	I suffer all things so the people that God has chosen can be saved from the punishment of their sin through Jesus Christ. Then they will have God’s shining-greatness that lasts forever.
55002011	These things are true. If we die with Him, we will live with Him also.
55002012	If we suffer and stay true to Him, then we will be a leader with Him. If we say we do not know Him, He will say He does not know us.
55002013	If we have no faith, He will still be faithful for He cannot go against what He is.
55002014	Tell your people about these things again. In the name of the Lord, tell them not to argue over words that are not important. It helps no one and it hurts the faith of those who are listening.
55002015	Do your best to know that God is pleased with you. Be as a workman who has nothing to be ashamed of. Teach the words of truth in the right way.
55002016	Do not listen to foolish talk about things that mean nothing. It only leads people farther away from God.
55002017	Such talk will spread like cancer. Hymenaeus and Philetus are like this.
55002018	They have turned from the truth. They say the dead have already been raised. The faith of some people has been made weak because of such foolish talk.
55002019	But the truth of God cannot be changed. It says, “The Lord knows those who are His.” And, “Everyone who says he is a Christian must turn away from sin!”
55002020	In a big house there are not only things made of gold and silver, but also of wood and clay. Some are of more use than others. Some are used every day.
55002021	If a man lives a clean life, he will be like a dish made of gold. He will be respected and set apart for good use by the owner of the house.
55002022	Turn away from the sinful things young people want to do. Go after what is right. Have a desire for faith and love and peace. Do this with those who pray to God from a clean heart.
55002023	Let me say it again. Have nothing to do with foolish talk and those who want to argue. It can only lead to trouble.
55002024	A servant owned by God must not make trouble. He must be kind to everyone. He must be able to teach. He must be willing to suffer when hurt for doing good.
55002025	Be gentle when you try to teach those who are against what you say. God may change their hearts so they will turn to the truth.
55002026	Then they will know they had been held in a trap by the devil to do what he wanted them to do. But now they are able to get out of it.
55003001	You must understand that in the last days there will come times of much trouble.
55003002	People will love themselves and money. They will have pride and tell of all the things they have done. They will speak against God. Children and young people will not obey their parents. People will not be thankful and they will not be holy.
55003003	They will not love each other. No one can get along with them. They will tell lies about others. They will not be able to keep from doing things they know they should not do. They will be wild and want to beat and hurt those who are good.
55003004	They will not stay true to their friends. They will act without thinking. They will think too much of themselves. They will love fun instead of loving God.
55003005	They will do things to make it look as if they are Christians. But they will not receive the power that is for a Christian. Keep away from such people.
55003006	These are the kind of people who go from house to house. They talk to foolish women who are loaded down with sins and all kinds of sinful desires.
55003007	Such women are always listening to new teaching. But they are never able to understand the truth.
55003008	Jannes and Jambres fought against Moses. So do these teachers fight against the truth today. Their minds think only of sinful things. They have turned against the Christian teaching.
55003009	They will not get very far. Their foolish teaching will be seen by everyone. That was the way it was with the two who worked against Moses.
55003010	But you know what I teach and how I live. You know what I want to do. You know about my faith and my love. You know how long I am willing to wait for something. You know how I keep on working for God even when it is hard for me.
55003011	You know about all the troubles and hard times I have had. You have seen how I suffered in the cities of Antioch and Iconium and Lystra. Yet the Lord brought me out of all those troubles.
55003012	Yes! All who want to live a God-like life who belong to Christ Jesus will suffer from others.
55003013	Sinful men and false teachers will go from bad to worse. They will lead others the wrong way and will be led the wrong way themselves.
55003014	But as for you, hold on to what you have learned and know to be true. Remember where you learned them.
55003015	You have known the Holy Writings since you were a child. They are able to give you wisdom that leads to being saved from the punishment of sin by putting your trust in Christ Jesus.
55003016	All the Holy Writings are God-given and are made alive by Him. Man is helped when he is taught God’s Word. It shows what is wrong. It changes the way of a man’s life. It shows him how to be right with God.
55003017	It gives the man who belongs to God everything he needs to work well for Him.
55004001	These words are from my heart to you. I say this before God and Jesus Christ. Some day He will judge those who are living and those who are dead. It will be when Christ comes to bring His holy nation.
55004002	Preach the Word of God. Preach it when it is easy and people want to listen and when it is hard and people do not want to listen. Preach it all the time. Use the Word of God to show people they are wrong. Use the Word of God to help them do right. You must be willing to wait for people to understand what you teach as you teach them.
55004003	The time will come when people will not listen to the truth. They will look for teachers who will tell them only what they want to hear.
55004004	They will not listen to the truth. Instead, they will listen to stories made up by men.
55004005	You must watch for all these things. Do not be afraid to suffer for our Lord. Preach the Good News from place to place. Do all the work you are to do.
55004006	It will soon be time for me to leave this life.
55004007	I have fought a good fight. I have finished the work I was to do. I have kept the faith.
55004008	There is a crown which comes from being right with God. The Lord, the One Who will judge, will give it to me on that great day when He comes again. I will not be the only one to receive a crown. All those who love to think of His coming and are looking for Him will receive one also.
55004009	Come to me here as soon as you can.
55004010	Demas left me. He loved the things of this world and has gone to the city of Thessalonica. Crescens has gone to the city of Galatia. Titus has gone to the city of Dalmatia.
55004011	Luke is the only one with me here. Bring Mark when you come. He is a help to me in this work.
55004012	I sent Tychicus to the city of Ephesus.
55004013	When you come, bring the coat I left with Carpus in the city of Troas. Bring the books and for sure do not forget the writings written on sheepskin.
55004014	Alexander, the man who makes things out of copper, has worked hard against me. The Lord will give him the pay that is coming to him.
55004015	Watch him! He fought against every word we preached.
55004016	At my first trial no one helped me. Everyone left me. I hope this will not be held against them.
55004017	But the Lord was with me. He gave me power to preach the Good News so all the people who do not know God might hear. I was taken from the mouth of the lion.
55004018	The Lord will look after me and will keep me from every sinful plan they have. He will bring me safe into His holy nation of heaven. May He have all the shining-greatness forever. Let it be so.
55004019	Greet Priscilla and Aquila for me and to all the family of Onesiphorus.
55004020	Erastus stayed in the city of Corinth. I left Trophimus sick in the city of Miletus.
55004021	Try to come before winter. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the Christian brothers greet you.
55004022	May the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. May you have God’s loving-favor.
56001001	This letter is from Paul, a servant owned by God, and a missionary of Jesus Christ. I have been sent to those God has chosen for Himself. I am to teach them the truth that leads to God-like living.
56001002	This truth also gives hope of life that lasts forever. God promised this before the world began. He cannot lie.
56001003	He made this known at the right time through His Word. God, the One Who saves, told me I should preach it.
56001004	I am writing to you, Titus. You are my true son in the faith which we both have. May you have loving-favor and peace from God the Father and Jesus Christ, the One Who saves.
56001005	I left you on the island of Crete so you could do some things that needed to be done. I asked you to choose church leaders in every city.
56001006	Their lives must be so that no one can talk against them. They must have only one wife. Their children must be Christians and known to be good. They must obey their parents. They must not be wild.
56001007	A church leader is God’s servant. His life must be so that no one can say anything against him. He should not try to please himself and not be quick to get angry over little things. He must not get drunk or want to fight. He must not always want more money for himself.
56001008	He must like to take people into his home. He must love what is good. He must be able to think well and do all things in the right way. He must live a holy life and be the boss over his own desires.
56001009	He must hold to the words of truth which he was taught. He must be able to teach the truth and show those who are against the truth that they are wrong.
56001010	There are many men who will not listen or will not obey the truth. Their teaching is foolish and they lead people to believe a lie. Some Jews believe their lies.
56001011	This must be stopped. It turns whole families from the truth. They teach these things to make money.
56001012	One of their own teachers said, “People of the island of Crete always lie. They are like wild animals. They are lazy. All they want to do is eat.”
56001013	This is true of them. Speak sharp words to them because it is true. Lead them in the right way so they will have strong faith.
56001014	Do not let them listen to Jewish stories made up by men. Do not let them listen to man-made rules which lead them away from the truth.
56001015	All things are pure to the man with a pure heart. But to sinful people nothing is pure. Both their minds and their hearts are bad.
56001016	They say they know God, but by the way they act, they show that they do not. They are sinful people. They will not obey and are of no use for any good work.
56002001	You must teach what is right and true.
56002002	Older men are to be quiet and to be careful how they act. They are to be the boss over their own desires. Their faith and love are to stay strong and they are not to give up.
56002003	Teach older women to be quiet and to be careful how they act also. They are not to go around speaking bad things about others or things that are not true. They are not to be chained by strong drink. They should teach what is good.
56002004	Older women are to teach the young women to love their husbands and children.
56002005	They are to teach them to think before they act, to be pure, to be workers at home, to be kind, and to obey their own husbands. In this way, the Word of God is honored.
56002006	Also teach young men to be wise.
56002007	In all things show them how to live by your life and by right teaching.
56002008	You should be wise in what you say. Then the one who is against you will be ashamed and will not be able to say anything bad about you.
56002009	Those who are servants owned by someone must obey their owners and please them in everything. They must not argue.
56002010	They must not steal from their owners but prove they can be trusted in every way. In this way, their lives will honor the teaching of God Who saves us.
56002011	God’s free gift of being saved is being given to everyone.
56002012	We are taught to have nothing to do with that which is against God. We are to have nothing to do with the desires of this world. We are to be wise and to be right with God. We are to live God-like lives in this world.
56002013	We are to be looking for the great hope and the coming of our great God and the One Who saves, Christ Jesus.
56002014	He gave Himself for us. He did this by buying us with His blood and making us free from all sin. He gave Himself so His people could be clean and want to do good.
56002015	Teach all these things and give words of help. Show them if they are wrong. You have the right and the power to do this. Do not let anyone think little of you.
56003001	Teach your people to obey the leaders of their country. They should be ready to do any good work.
56003002	They must not speak bad of anyone, and they must not argue. They should be gentle and kind to all people.
56003003	There was a time when we were foolish and did not obey. We were fooled in many ways. Strong desires held us in their power. We wanted only to please ourselves. We wanted what others had and were angry when we could not have them. We hated others and they hated us.
56003004	But God, the One Who saves, showed how kind He was and how He loved us
56003005	by saving us from the punishment of sin. It was not because we worked to be right with God. It was because of His loving-kindness that He washed our sins away. At the same time He gave us new life when the Holy Spirit came into our lives.
56003006	God gave the Holy Spirit to fill our lives through Jesus Christ, the One Who saves.
56003007	Because of this, we are made right with God by His loving-favor. Now we can have life that lasts forever as He has promised.
56003008	What I have told you is true. Teach these things all the time so those who have put their trust in God will be careful to do good things. These things are good and will help all men.
56003009	Do not argue with people about foolish questions and about the Law. Do not spend time talking about all of your early fathers. This does not help anyone and it is of no use.
56003010	Talk once or twice to a person who tries to divide people into groups against each other. If he does not stop, have nothing to do with him.
56003011	You can be sure he is going the wrong way. He is sinning and he knows it.
56003012	I will send Artemas or Tychicus to you. As soon as one of them gets there, try to come to me in the city of Nicopolis. I have decided to spend the winter there.
56003013	Zenas, the man who knows the law, and Apollos are going on a trip. Do everything you can to help them.
56003014	Our people must learn to work hard. They must work for what they need and be able to give to others who need help. Then their lives will not be wasted.
56003015	All those with me here greet you. Greet my Christian friends there. May you have God’s loving-favor.
57001001	This letter is from Paul. I am in prison because of Jesus Christ. Brother Timothy is also writing to you, Philemon. You are a much-loved workman together with us.
57001002	We are also writing to the church that meets in your home. This letter is also for our Christian sister Apphia and it is for Archippus who is a soldier together with us.
57001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you His loving-favor and peace.
57001004	I always thank God when I speak of you in my prayers.
57001005	It is because I hear of your love and trust in the Lord Jesus and in all the Christians.
57001006	I pray that our faith together will help you know all the good things you have through Christ Jesus.
57001007	Your love has given me much joy and comfort. The hearts of the Christians have been made happy by you, Christian brother.
57001008	So now, through Christ, I am free to tell you what you must do.
57001009	But because I love you, I will only ask you. I am Paul, an old man, here in prison because of Jesus Christ.
57001010	I am asking you for my son, Onesimus. He has become my son in the Christian life while I have been here in prison.
57001011	At one time he was of no use to you. But now he is of use to you and to me.
57001012	I am sending him back to you. It is like sending you my own heart.
57001013	I would like to keep him with me. He could have helped me in your place while I am in prison for preaching the Good News.
57001014	But I did not want to keep him without word from you. I did not want you to be kind to me because you had to but because you wanted to.
57001015	He ran away from you for awhile. But now he is yours forever.
57001016	Do not think of him any longer as a servant you own. He is more than that to you. He is a much-loved Christian brother to you and to me.
57001017	If you think of me as a true friend, take him back as you would take me.
57001018	If he has done anything wrong or owes you anything, send me the bill.
57001019	I will pay it. I, Paul, am writing this with my own hand. I will not talk about how much you owe me because you owe me your life.
57001020	Yes, Christian brother, I want you to be of use to me as a Christian. Give my heart new joy in Christ.
57001021	I write this letter knowing you will do what I ask and even more.
57001022	Please have a room ready for me. I trust God will answer your prayers and let me come to you soon.
57001023	Epaphras greets you. He is a brother in Christ in prison with me.
57001024	Mark and Aristarchus and Demas and Luke who are workers with me greet you.
57001025	May the loving-favor of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.
58001001	Long ago God spoke to our early fathers in many different ways. He spoke through the early preachers.
58001002	But in these last days He has spoken to us through His Son. God gave His Son everything. It was by His Son that God made the world.
58001003	The Son shines with the shining-greatness of the Father. The Son is as God is in every way. It is the Son Who holds up the whole world by the power of His Word. The Son gave His own life so we could be clean from all sin. After He had done that, He sat down on the right side of God in heaven.
58001004	The Son of God was made greater and better than the angels. God gave Him a greater name than theirs.
58001005	God did not say to any of His angels, “You are My Son. Today I have become Your Father.” (Psalm 2:7) And He did not say to any angel, “I will be a Father to Him. He will be a Son to Me.” (2 Samuel 7:14)
58001006	But when God brought His first-born Son, Jesus, into the world, He said, “Let all the angels of God worship Him.”
58001007	He said this about the angels, “He makes His angels to be winds. He makes His servants a burning fire.” (Psalm 104:4)
58001008	But about His Son, He says, “O God, Your throne will last forever. Whatever You say in Your nation is right and good.
58001009	You have loved what is right. You have hated what is wrong. That is why God, Your God, has chosen You. He has poured over You the oil of joy more than over anyone else.” (Psalm 45:6–7)
58001010	He said also, “Lord, You made the earth in the beginning. You made the heavens with Your hands.
58001011	They will be destroyed but You will always be here. They will all become old just as clothes become old.
58001012	You will roll up the heavens like a coat. They will be changed. But You are always the same. You will never grow old.” (Psalm 102:25–27)
58001013	God never said to any angel, “Sit at My right side, until I make those who hate You a place to rest Your feet.” (Psalm 110:1)
58001014	Are not all the angels spirits who work for God? They are sent out to help those who are to be saved from the punishment of sin.
58002001	That is why we must listen all the more to the truths we have been told. If we do not, we may slip away from them.
58002002	These truths given by the angels proved to be true. People were punished when they did not obey them.
58002003	God was so good to make a way for us to be saved from the punishment of sin. What makes us think we will not go to hell if we do not take the way to heaven that He has made for us? The Lord was the first to tell us of this. Then those who heard Him told it later.
58002004	God proved what they said was true by showing us special things to see and by doing powerful works. He gave the gifts of the Holy Spirit as He wanted to.
58002005	God did not make angels to be the leaders of that world to come which we have been speaking about.
58002006	Instead, the Holy Writings say, “What is man that You think of him and the son of man that You should remember him?” (Psalm 8:4)
58002007	“You made him so he took a place that was not as important as the angels for a little while. You gave him the crown of honor and shining-greatness. You made him the head over everything You have made.
58002008	You have put everything under his feet.” (Psalm 8:4-6) There is nothing that does not obey him, but we do not see all things obey him yet.
58002009	But we do see Jesus. For a little while He took a place that was not as important as the angels. But God had loving-favor for everyone. He had Jesus suffer death on a cross for all of us. Then, because of Christ’s death on a cross, God gave Him the crown of honor and shining-greatness.
58002010	God made all things. He made all things for Himself. It was right for God to make Jesus a perfect Leader by having Him suffer for men’s sins. In this way, He is bringing many men to share His shining-greatness.
58002011	Jesus makes men holy. He takes away their sins. Both Jesus and the ones being made holy have the same Father. That is why Jesus is not ashamed to call them His brothers.
58002012	Jesus is saying to His Father, “I will tell My brothers Your name. I will sing songs of thanks for You among the people.” (Psalm 22:22)
58002013	And again He says, “I will put My trust in God.” At another time He said, “Here I am with the children God gave Me.” (Isaiah 8:17–18)
58002014	It is true that we share the same Father with Jesus. And it is true that we share the same kind of flesh and blood because Jesus became a man like us. He died as we must die. Through His death He destroyed the power of the devil who has the power of death.
58002015	Jesus did this to make us free from the fear of death. We no longer need to be chained to this fear.
58002016	Jesus did not come to help angels. Instead, He came to help men who are of Abraham’s family.
58002017	So Jesus had to become like His brothers in every way. He had to be one of us to be our Religious Leader to go between God and us. He had loving-pity on us and He was faithful. He gave Himself as a gift to die on a cross for our sins so that God would not hold these sins against us any longer.
58002018	Because Jesus was tempted as we are and suffered as we do, He understands us and He is able to help us when we are tempted.
58003001	Christian brothers, you have been chosen and set apart by God. So let us think about Jesus. He is the One God sent and He is the Religious Leader of our Christian faith.
58003002	Jesus was faithful in God’s house just as Moses was faithful in all of God’s house.
58003003	The man who builds a house gets more honor than the house. That is why Jesus gets more honor than Moses.
58003004	Every house is built by someone. And God is the One Who has built everything.
58003005	Moses was a faithful servant owned by God in God’s house. He spoke of the things that would be told about later on.
58003006	But Christ was faithful as a Son Who is Head of God’s house. We are of God’s house if we keep our trust in the Lord until the end. This is our hope.
58003007	The Holy Spirit says, “If you hear His voice today,
58003008	do not let your hearts become hard as your early fathers did when they turned against Me. It was at that time in the desert when they put Me to the test.
58003009	Your early fathers tempted Me and tried Me. They saw the work I did for forty years.
58003010	For this reason, I was angry with the people of this day. And I said to them, ‘They always think wrong thoughts. They have never understood what I have tried to do for them.’
58003011	I was angry with them and said to Myself, ‘They will never go into My rest.’” (Psalm 95:7–11)
58003012	Christian brothers, be careful that not one of you has a heart so bad that it will not believe and will turn away from the living God.
58003013	Help each other. Speak day after day to each other while it is still today so your heart will not become hard by being fooled by sin.
58003014	For we belong to Christ if we keep on trusting Him to the end just as we trusted Him at first.
58003015	The Holy Writings say, “If you hear His voice today, do not let your hearts become hard as your early fathers did when they turned against Me.” (Psalm 95:7–8)
58003016	Who heard God’s voice and turned against Him? Did not all those who were led out of the country of Egypt by Moses?
58003017	Who made God angry for forty years? Was it not those people who had sinned in the desert? Was it not those who died and were buried there?
58003018	Who did He say could never go into His rest? Was it not those who did not obey Him?
58003019	So we can see that they were not able to go into His rest because they did not put their trust in Him.
58004001	The same promise of going into God’s rest is still for us. But we should be afraid that some of us may not be able to go in.
58004002	We have heard the Good News even as they did, but it did them no good because it was not mixed with faith.
58004003	We who have put our trust in God go into His rest. God said this of our early fathers, “I was angry and said, ‘They will not go into My rest.’ ”(Psalm 95:11) And yet God’s work was finished after He made the world.
58004004	In the Holy Writings He said this about the seventh day when He made the whole world, “God rested on the seventh day from all He had made.” (Genesis 2:2)
58004005	But God said this about those who turned against Him, “They will not go into My rest.” (Psalm 95:11)
58004006	Those who heard the Good News first did not go into His rest. It was because they had not obeyed Him. But the promise is still good and some are going into His rest.
58004007	God has again set a certain day for people to go into His rest. He says through David many years later as He had said before, “If you hear His voice today, do not let your hearts become hard.” (Psalm 95:7-8)
58004008	If Joshua had led those people into God’s rest, He would not have told of another day after that.
58004009	And so God’s people have a complete rest waiting for them.
58004010	The man who goes into God’s rest, rests from his own work the same as God rested from His work.
58004011	Let us do our best to go into that rest or we will be like the people who did not go in.
58004012	God’s Word is living and powerful. It is sharper than a sword that cuts both ways. It cuts straight into where the soul and spirit meet and it divides them. It cuts into the joints and bones. It tells what the heart is thinking about and what it wants to do.
58004013	No one can hide from God. His eyes see everything we do. We must give an answer to God for what we have done.
58004014	We have a great Religious Leader Who has made the way for man to go to God. He is Jesus, the Son of God, Who has gone to heaven to be with God. Let us keep our trust in Jesus Christ.
58004015	Our Religious Leader understands how weak we are. Christ was tempted in every way we are tempted, but He did not sin.
58004016	Let us go with complete trust to the throne of God. We will receive His loving-kindness and have His loving-favor to help us whenever we need it.
58005001	Every Jewish religious leader is chosen from among men. He is a helper standing between God and men. He gives gifts on the altar in worship to God from the people. He gives blood from animals for the sins of the people.
58005002	A Jewish religious leader is weak in many ways because he is just a man himself. He knows how to be gentle with those who know little. He knows how to help those who are doing wrong.
58005003	Because he is weak himself, he must give gifts to God for his own sins as well as for the sins of the people.
58005004	A Jewish religious leader does not choose this honor for himself. God chooses a man for this work. Aaron was chosen this way.
58005005	It is the same way with Christ. He did not choose the honor of being a Religious Leader Who has made the way for man to go to God. Instead, God said to Christ, “You are My Son. Today I have become Your Father.” (Psalm 2:7)
58005006	God says in another part of His Word, “You will be a Religious Leader forever. You will be like Melchizedek.” (Psalm 110:4)
58005007	During the time Jesus lived on earth, He prayed and asked God with loud cries and tears. Jesus’ prayer was to God Who was able to save Him from death. God heard Christ because Christ honored God.
58005008	Even being God’s Son, He learned to obey by the things He suffered.
58005009	And having been made perfect, He planned and made it possible for all those who obey Him to be saved from the punishment of sin.
58005010	In God’s plan He was to be a Religious Leader Who made the way for man to go to God. He was like Melchizedek.
58005011	There is much we could say about this, but it is hard to make you understand. It is because you do not want to hear well.
58005012	By now you should be teachers. Instead, you need someone to teach you again the first things you need to know from God’s Word. You still need milk instead of solid food.
58005013	Anyone who lives on milk cannot understand the teaching about being right with God. He is a baby.
58005014	Solid food is for full-grown men. They have learned to use their minds to tell the difference between good and bad.
58006001	So let us leave the first things you need to know about Christ. Let us go on to the teaching that full-grown Christians should understand. We do not need to teach these first truths again. You already know that you must be sorry for your sins and turn from them. You know that you must have faith in God.
58006002	You know about being baptized and about putting hands on people. You know about being raised from the dead and about being punished forever.
58006003	We will go on, if God lets us.
58006004	There are those who have known the truth. They have received the gift from heaven. They have shared the Holy Spirit.
58006005	They know how good the Word of God is. They know of the powers of the world to come.
58006006	But if they turn away, they cannot be sorry for their sins and turn from them again. It is because they are nailing the Son of God on a cross again. They are holding Him up in shame in front of all people.
58006007	It is the same with a piece of ground that has had many rains fall on it. God makes it possible for that ground to give good fruits and vegetables.
58006008	But if it gives nothing but weeds, it is worth nothing. It will be hated and destroyed by fire.
58006009	Dear friends, even as we tell you this, we are sure of better things for you. These things go along with being saved from the punishment of sin.
58006010	God always does what is right. He will not forget the work you did to help the Christians and the work you are still doing to help them. This shows your love for Christ.
58006011	We want each one of you to keep on working to the end. Then what you hope for, will happen.
58006012	Do not be lazy. Be like those who have faith and have not given up. They will receive what God has promised them.
58006013	When God made a promise to Abraham, He made that promise in His own name because no one was greater.
58006014	He said, “I will make you happy in so many ways. For sure, I will give you many children.” (Genesis 22:16-17)
58006015	Abraham was willing to wait and God gave to him what He had promised.
58006016	When men make a promise, they use a name greater than themselves. They do this to make sure they will do what they promise. In this way, no one argues about it.
58006017	And so God made a promise. He wanted to show Abraham that He would never change His mind. So He made the promise in His own name.
58006018	God gave these two things that cannot be changed and God cannot lie. We who have turned to Him can have great comfort knowing that He will do what He has promised.
58006019	This hope is a safe anchor for our souls. It will never move. This hope goes into the Holiest Place of All behind the curtain of heaven.
58006020	Jesus has already gone there. He has become our Religious Leader forever and has made the way for man to go to God. He is like Melchizedek.
58007001	Melchizedek was king of Salem. He was a religious leader for God. When Abraham was coming back from the war where many kings were killed, Melchizedek met Abraham and showed respect to him.
58007002	Abraham gave Melchizedek one-tenth part of all he had. Melchizedek’s name means king of what is right. Salem means peace. So he is king of peace.
58007003	Melchizedek was without a father or mother or any family. He had no beginning of life or end of life. He is a religious leader forever like the Son of God.
58007004	We can see how great Melchizedek was. Abraham gave him one-tenth part of all he had taken in the war.
58007005	The Law made the family of Levi the Jewish religious leaders. The Law said that the religious leaders were to take one-tenth part of everything from their own people.
58007006	Melchizedek was not even from the family group of Levi but Abraham paid him. Melchizedek showed respect to Abraham who was the one who had received God’s promises.
58007007	The one who shows respect is always greater than the one who receives it.
58007008	Jewish religious leaders receive one-tenth part. They are men and they all die. But here Melchizedek received one-tenth part and is alive.
58007009	We might say that Levi, who receives one-tenth part, paid one-tenth part through Abraham.
58007010	Levi was not yet born. He was still inside Abraham’s body when Abraham paid Melchizedek.
58007011	The Law was given during the time when Levi and his sons were the religious leaders. If the work of those religious leaders had been perfect in taking away the sins of the people, there would have been no need for another religious leader. But one like Melchizedek was needed and not one from the family group of Aaron.
58007012	For when the family group of religious leaders changed, the Law had to be changed also.
58007013	These things speak of Christ Who is from another family group. That family group never had a religious leader who killed animals and gave gifts at the altar for the sins of the people.
58007014	Our Lord came from the family group of Judah. Moses did not write anything about religious leaders coming from that family group.
58007015	We can see that a different Religious Leader has come. This One is like Melchizedek.
58007016	Christ did not become a Religious Leader by coming from the family group of Levi as the Law said had to be. He became the Religious Leader by the power of a life that never ends.
58007017	The Holy Writings say this about Christ, “You are a Religious Leader forever like Melchizedek.” (Psalm 110:4)
58007018	God put the Law of Moses aside. It was weak and could not be used.
58007019	For the Law of Moses could not make men right with God. Now there is a better hope through which we can come near to God.
58007020	God made a promise when Christ became the Religious Leader Who made the way for man to go to God.
58007021	God did not make such a promise when Levi’s family group became religious leaders. But when Christ became a Religious Leader, this is the promise God made, “The Lord has made a promise. He will never change His mind. You will be a Religious Leader forever.” (Psalm 110:4)
58007022	Christ makes this New Way of Worship sure for us because of God’s promise.
58007023	There had to be many religious leaders during the time of the Old Way of Worship. They died and others had to keep on in their work.
58007024	But Jesus lives forever. He is the Religious Leader forever. It will never change.
58007025	And so Jesus is able, now and forever, to save from the punishment of sin all who come to God through Him because He lives forever to pray for them.
58007026	We need such a Religious Leader Who made the way for man to go to God. Jesus is holy and has no guilt. He has never sinned and is different from sinful men. He has the place of honor above the heavens.
58007027	Christ is not like other religious leaders. They had to give gifts every day on the altar in worship for their own sins first and then for the sins of the people. Christ did not have to do that. He gave one gift on the altar and that gift was Himself. It was done once and it was for all time.
58007028	The Law makes religious leaders of men. These men are not perfect. After the Law was given, God spoke with a promise. He made His Son a perfect Religious Leader forever.
58008001	Now the important thing is this: We have such a Religious Leader Who has made the way for man to go to God. He is the One Who sits at the right side of the All-powerful God in the heavens.
58008002	He is the Religious Leader of that holy place in heaven which is the true place of worship. It was built by the Lord and not by men’s hands.
58008003	Every religious leader of the Old Way of Worship had the work of killing animals and of giving gifts on the altar to God. So Christ had to have something to give also.
58008004	If Christ were on the earth, He would not be a religious leader such as these. The religious leaders on earth give gifts like the Law says.
58008005	Their work shows us only a picture of the things in heaven. When Moses was putting up the tent to worship in, God told him, “Be sure you make the tent for worship like I showed you on Mount Sinai.” (Exodus 25:40)
58008006	But Christ has a more perfect work. He is the One Who goes between God and man in this new and better way. The New Way of Worship promises better things.
58008007	If the Old Way of Worship had been perfect, there would have been no need for another one.
58008008	God was not happy how the people lived by the Old Way of Worship. He said, “The day will come when I will make a New Way of Worship for the Jews and those of the family group of Judah.
58008009	The New Way of Worship will not be like the Old Way of Worship I gave to their early fathers. That was when I took them by the hand and led them out of Egypt. But they did not follow the Old Way of Worship. And so I turned away from them.
58008010	This is the New Way of Worship that I will give to the Jews. When that day comes, says the Lord, I will put My Laws into their minds. And I will write them in their hearts. I will be their God, and they will be My people.
58008011	No one will need to teach his neighbor or his brother to know the Lord. All of them will already know Me from the least to the greatest.
58008012	I will show loving-kindness to them and forgive their sins. I will remember their sins no more.” (Jeremiah 31:31-34)
58008013	When God spoke about a New Way of Worship, He showed that the Old Way of Worship was finished and of no use now. It will never be used again.
58009001	There were special ways of worship and a special holy place made by man for the Old Way of Worship.
58009002	A big tent was built and set up. It was called the holy place. It had a light and a table, and the holy bread was on the table.
58009003	Behind the second curtain there was another tent. This was called the Holiest Place of All.
58009004	In the inside tent there was an altar where special perfume was burned. There was also a large box made of wood called the box of the Way of Worship. Both of these were covered with gold inside and out. Inside the box was a pot made of gold with the bread from heaven. It also had in it Aaron’s stick that once started to grow. The stones on which the Law of Moses was written were in it.
58009005	Above the box were the cherubim of honor. Their wings were spread up and over and met in the center. On the top of the box and under the shadow of their wings was the mercy-seat. We cannot tell anymore about these things now.
58009006	When everything was finished, the Jewish religious leaders went in and out of the outside tent to do the things which had to be done to worship God.
58009007	Once each year the head religious leader would go into the inside tent alone. He would not go in without blood. He gave this blood to God as a gift in worship for his own sins and for the sins of all the people who sinned without knowing it.
58009008	And so the Holy Spirit is teaching that, with the Old Way of Worship, the people could not go into the Holiest Place of All as long as the outside tent and its Old Way of Worship were being used.
58009009	The outside tent is a picture of that day. With the Old Way of Worship, animals killed and gifts given in worship to God could not take away the guilty feeling of sin.
58009010	The Old Way of Worship was made up of Laws about what to eat and drink. These Laws told how to wash and other things to do with the body. These things had to be done until Christ came to bring a better way of worship.
58009011	But Christ came as the Head Religious Leader of the good things God promised. He made the way for man to go to God. He was a greater and more perfect tent. He was not made by human hands and was not a part of this earth.
58009012	Christ went into the Holiest Place of All one time for all people. He did not take the blood of goats and young cows to give to God as a gift in worship. He gave His own blood. By doing this, He bought us with His own blood and made us free from sin forever.
58009013	With the Old Way of Worship, the blood and ashes of animals could make men clean after they had sinned.
58009014	How much more the blood of Christ will do! He gave Himself as a perfect gift to God through the Spirit that lives forever. Now your heart can be free from the guilty feeling of doing work that is worth nothing. Now you can work for the living God.
58009015	Christ is the One Who gave us this New Way of Worship. All those who have been called by God may receive life that lasts forever just as He promised them. Christ bought us with His blood when He died for us. This made us free from our sins which we did under the Old Way of Worship.
58009016	When a man wants to give his money to someone after he dies, he writes it all down on paper. But that paper is worth nothing until the man is dead.
58009017	That piece of paper means nothing as long as he is alive. It is good only when he dies.
58009018	The Old Way of Worship had to have a death to make it good. The blood of an animal was used.
58009019	Moses told the people all the things they had to obey in the Law. Then he took the blood of animals together with water and put it on the Book of the Law and on all the people. He used special branches and red wool as he put it on them.
58009020	Moses said, “This is the blood of the Way of Worship which God said you must obey.” (Exodus 24:8)
58009021	In the same way, Moses put the blood on the tent and on all the things used in worship.
58009022	The Law says that almost everything is made clean by blood. Sins are not forgiven unless blood is given.
58009023	The tent to worship in and the things inside to worship with were like the things in heaven. They were made clean by putting blood on them. But the things in heaven were made clean by a much better gift of worship.
58009024	For Christ did not go into the Holiest Place of All that was made by men, even if it was like the true one in heaven. He went to heaven itself and He is before God for us.
58009025	Christ has not given Himself many times, as the head religious leader here on earth went into the Holiest Place of All each year with blood that was not his own.
58009026	For then Christ would have had to die many times since the world began. But He came once at the end of the Old Way of Worship. He gave Himself once for all time. He gave Himself to destroy sin.
58009027	It is in the plan that all men die once. After that, they will stand before God and be judged.
58009028	It is the same with Christ. He gave Himself once to take away the sins of many. When He comes the second time, He will not need to give Himself again for sin. He will save all those who are waiting for Him.
58010001	The Law is like a picture of the good things to come. The Jewish religious leaders gave gifts on the altar in worship to God all the time year after year. Those gifts could not make the people who came to worship perfect.
58010002	If those gifts given to God could take away sins, the people who came to worship would no longer feel guilty of sin. They would have given no more gifts.
58010003	When they gave the gifts year after year, it made them remember that they still had their sins.
58010004	The blood of animals cannot take away the sins of men.
58010005	When Christ came to the world, He said to God, “You do not want animals killed or gifts given in worship. You have made My body ready to give as a gift.
58010006	You are not pleased with animals that have been killed or burned and given as gifts on the altar to take away sin.
58010007	Then I said, ‘I have come to do what You want, O God. It is written in the Law that I would.’”
58010008	Then Christ said, “You do not want animals killed or gifts given in worship to you for sin. You are not pleased with them.” These things are done because the Law says they should be done.
58010009	Then He said, “I have come to do what You want Me to do.” And this is what He did when He died on a cross. God did away with the Old Way of Worship and made a New Way of Worship.
58010010	Our sins are washed away and we are made clean because Christ gave His own body as a gift to God. He did this once for all time.
58010011	All Jewish religious leaders stand every day killing animals and giving gifts on the altar. They give the same gifts over and over again. These gifts cannot take away sins.
58010012	But Christ gave Himself once for sins and that is good forever. After that He sat down at the right side of God.
58010013	He is waiting there for God to make of those who have hated Him a place to rest His feet.
58010014	And by one gift He has made perfect forever all those who are being set apart for God-like living.
58010015	The Holy Spirit tells us this: First He says,
58010016	“This is the New Way of Worship that I will give them. When that day comes, says the Lord, I will put My Laws in their hearts. And I will write them in their minds.” Then He says,
58010017	“I will not remember their sins and wrong-doings anymore.” (Jeremiah 31:33-34)
58010018	No more gifts on the altar in worship are needed when our sins are forgiven.
58010019	Christian brothers, now we know we can go into the Holiest Place of All because the blood of Jesus was given.
58010020	We now come to God by the new and living way. Christ made this way for us. He opened the curtain, which was His own body.
58010021	We have a great Religious Leader over the house of God.
58010022	And so let us come near to God with a true heart full of faith. Our hearts must be made clean from guilty feelings and our bodies washed with pure water.
58010023	Let us hold on to the hope we say we have and not be changed. We can trust God that He will do what He promised.
58010024	Let us help each other to love others and to do good.
58010025	Let us not stay away from church meetings. Some people are doing this all the time. Comfort each other as you see the day of His return coming near.
58010026	If we keep on sinning because we want to after we have received and know the truth, there is no gift that will take away sins then.
58010027	Instead, we will stand before God and on that day He will judge us. And the hot fires of hell will burn up those who work against God.
58010028	Anyone who did not obey the Old Way of Worship died without loving-kindness when two or three men spoke against him.
58010029	How much more will a man have to be punished if he walks on and hates the Son of God? How much more will he be punished if he acts as if the blood of God’s New Way of Worship is worth nothing? This New Way of Worship is God’s way of making him holy. How much more will he be punished if he laughs at the Holy Spirit Who wanted to show him loving-favor?
58010030	For we know God said, “I will pay back what is coming to them.” And, “The Lord will judge His people.” (Deuteronomy 32:35–36)
58010031	The very worst thing that can happen to a man is to fall into the hands of the living God!
58010032	Remember how it was in those days after you heard the truth. You suffered much.
58010033	People laughed at you and beat you. When others suffered, you suffered with them.
58010034	You had loving-pity for those who were in prison. You had joy when your things were taken away from you. For you knew you would have something better in heaven which would last forever.
58010035	Do not throw away your trust, for your reward will be great.
58010036	You must be willing to wait without giving up. After you have done what God wants you to do, God will give you what He promised you.
58010037	The Holy Writings say, “In a little while, the One you are looking for will come. It will not be a long time now.
58010038	For the one right with God lives by faith. If anyone turns back, I will not be pleased with him.” (Habakkuk 2:3–4)
58010039	We are not of those people who turn back and are lost. Instead, we have faith to be saved from the punishment of sin.
58011001	Now faith is being sure we will get what we hope for. It is being sure of what we cannot see.
58011002	God was pleased with the men who had faith who lived long ago.
58011003	Through faith we understand that the world was made by the Word of God. Things we see were made from what could not be seen.
58011004	Because Abel had faith, he gave a better gift in worship to God than Cain. His gift pleased God. Abel was right with God. Abel died, but by faith he is still speaking to us.
58011005	Because Enoch had faith, he was taken up from the earth without dying. He could not be found because God had taken him. The Holy Writings tell how he pleased God before he was taken up.
58011006	A man cannot please God unless he has faith. Anyone who comes to God must believe that He is. That one must also know that God gives what is promised to the one who keeps on looking for Him.
58011007	Because Noah had faith, he built a large boat for his family. God told him what was going to happen. His faith made him hear God speak and he obeyed. His family was saved from death because he built the boat. In this way, Noah showed the world how sinful it was. Noah became right with God because of his faith in God.
58011008	Because Abraham had faith, he obeyed God when God called him to leave his home. He was to go to another country that God promised to give him. He left his home without knowing where he was going.
58011009	His faith in God kept him living as a stranger in the country God had promised to him. Isaac and Jacob had received the same promise. They all lived in tents together.
58011010	Abraham was looking to God and waiting for a city that could not be moved. It was a city planned and built by God.
58011011	Because Sarah had faith, she was able to have a child long after she was past the age to have children. She had faith to believe that God would do what He promised.
58011012	Abraham was too old to have children. But from this one man came a family with as many in it as the stars in the sky and as many as the sand by the sea.
58011013	These people all died having faith in God. They did not receive what God had promised to them. But they could see far ahead to all the things God promised and they were glad for them. They knew they were strangers here. This earth was not their home.
58011014	People who say these things show they are looking for a country of their own.
58011015	They did not think about the country they had come from. If they had, they might have gone back.
58011016	But they wanted a better country. And so God is not ashamed to be called their God. He has made a city for them.
58011017	Because Abraham had faith, when he was tested, he gave his son Isaac as a gift on the altar in worship. God had made a promise to Abraham that He would give him a son. And yet Abraham was willing to give his only son as a gift on the altar in worship.
58011018	God had said to Abraham, “Your family will come from Isaac.” (Genesis 21:12)
58011019	Abraham believed God was able to bring Isaac back to life again. And so it may be said that Abraham did receive him back from death.
58011020	Because Isaac had faith, he said that good would come to Jacob and Esau in the future.
58011021	Because Jacob had faith, he said that good would come to each of Joseph’s sons as he was dying. He used his walking stick to hold him up as he prayed to God.
58011022	Because Joseph had faith, he spoke of the Jews leaving the country of Egypt. He was going to die soon, and he told them to bury his body in the country where they were going.
58011023	Because of faith, Moses, after he was born, was hidden by his parents for three months. They saw that he was a beautiful child. They were not afraid of the king when he said that all baby boys should be killed.
58011024	Because Moses had faith, he would not be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter when he grew up.
58011025	He chose to suffer with God’s people instead of having fun doing sinful things for awhile.
58011026	Any shame that he suffered for Christ was worth more than all the riches in Egypt. He kept his eyes on the reward God was going to give him.
58011027	Because Moses had faith, he left Egypt. He was not afraid of the king’s anger. Moses did not turn from the right way but kept seeing God in front of him.
58011028	Because Moses had faith, he told all the Jews to put blood over their doors. Then the angel of death would pass over their houses and not kill their oldest sons.
58011029	Because the Jews had faith, they went through the Red Sea as if they were on dry ground. But when the people of Egypt tried to go through, they were all killed by the water.
58011030	Because the Jews had faith, the walls of the city of Jericho fell down after the Jews had walked around the city for seven days.
58011031	Because Rahab had faith, she was kept from being killed along with those who did not obey God. She was a woman who sold the use of her body. But she helped the men who had come in secret to look over the country.
58011032	What more should I say? There is not enough time to tell of Gideon and of Barak and of Samson and of Jephthah and of David and of Samuel and of the early preachers.
58011033	It was because these people had faith that they won wars over other countries. They were good leaders. They received what God promised to them. They closed the mouths of lions
58011034	and stopped fire that was burning. They got away from being killed with swords. They were made strong again after they had been weak and sick. They were strong in war. They made fighting men from other countries run home.
58011035	It was because some women had faith that they received their dead back to life. Others chose to be beaten instead of being set free, because they would not turn against God. In this way, they would be raised to a better life.
58011036	Others were talked against. Some were beaten. Some were put in chains and in prison.
58011037	They were killed by stones being thrown at them. People were cut in pieces. They were tested. They were killed with swords. They wore skins of sheep and goats and had nothing they could call their own. They were hungry and sick. Everyone was bad to them.
58011038	They walked around in deserts and in mountains. They looked for caves and holes in the earth to live in. They were too good for this world.
58011039	It was because of their faith that God was pleased with them. But they did not receive what God had promised.
58011040	God had planned something better for us. These men could not be made perfect without us.
58012001	All these many people who have had faith in God are around us like a cloud. Let us put every thing out of our lives that keeps us from doing what we should. Let us keep running in the race that God has planned for us.
58012002	Let us keep looking to Jesus. Our faith comes from Him and He is the One Who makes it perfect. He did not give up when He had to suffer shame and die on a cross. He knew of the joy that would be His later. Now He is sitting at the right side of God.
58012003	Sinful men spoke words of hate against Christ. He was willing to take such shame from sinners. Think of this so you will not get tired and give up.
58012004	In your fight against sin, you have not yet had to stand against sin with your blood.
58012005	Do you remember what God said to you when He called you His sons? “My son, listen when the Lord punishes you. Do not give up when He tells you what you must do.
58012006	The Lord punishes everyone He loves. He whips every son He receives.” (Proverbs 3:11-12)
58012007	Do not give up when you are punished by God. Be willing to take it, knowing that God is teaching you as a son. Is there a father who does not punish his son sometimes?
58012008	If you are not punished as all sons are, it means that you are not a true son of God. You are not a part of His family and He is not your Father.
58012009	Remember that our fathers on earth punished us. We had respect for them. How much more should we obey our Father in heaven and live?
58012010	For a little while our fathers on earth punished us when they thought they should. But God punishes us for our good so we will be holy as He is holy.
58012011	There is no joy while we are being punished. It is hard to take, but later we can see that good came from it. And it gives us the peace of being right with God.
58012012	So lift up your hands that have been weak. Stand up on your weak legs.
58012013	Walk straight ahead so the weak leg will not be turned aside, but will be healed.
58012014	Be at peace with all men. Live a holy life. No one will see the Lord without having that kind of life.
58012015	See that no one misses God’s loving-favor. Do not let wrong thoughts about others get started among you. If you do, many people will be turned to a life of sin.
58012016	None of you should fall into sex sins or forget God like Esau did. He had a right to get all Isaac had because he was the oldest son. But for one plate of food he sold this right to his brother.
58012017	You know that later he would have received everything. But he did not get it even when he asked for it with tears. It was too late to make right the wrong he had done.
58012018	For you have not come close to a mountain that you can touch. You have not come to worship where there is burning fire and darkness and storm and wind.
58012019	The sound of a horn was heard and God’s voice spoke. The people cried out to Moses to have God stop speaking to them.
58012020	They could not stand to listen to His strong words, “Even if an animal comes to the mountain, it must be killed.” (Exodus 19:12)
58012021	What Moses saw was so hard to look at that he said, “I am full of fear and am shaking.” (Deuteronomy 9:19)
