58012022	But instead, you have come to the mountain of Jerusalem. It is the city of the living God. It is the Jerusalem of heaven with its thousands of angels.
58012023	You have gathered there with God’s children who were born long ago. They are citizens of heaven. God is there. He will judge all men. The spirits of all those right with God are there. They have been made perfect.
58012024	Jesus is there. He has made a way for man to go to God. He gave His blood that men might worship God the New Way. The blood of Jesus tells of better things than that which Abel used.
58012025	Be sure you listen to the One Who is speaking to you. The Jews did not obey when God’s Law was given to them on earth. They did not go free. They were punished. We will be punished more if we do not listen to God as He speaks from heaven.
58012026	On Mount Sinai, God’s voice shook the earth. But now He has promised, saying, “Once more I will shake the earth and the heavens.” (Exodus 19:18)
58012027	When God says, “Once more,” He means He will take away everything of this world that can be shaken so the things that cannot be shaken will be left.
58012028	Since we have received a holy nation that cannot be moved, let us be thankful. Let us please God and worship Him with honor and fear.
58012029	For our God is a fire that destroys everything.
58013001	Keep on loving each other as Christian brothers.
58013002	Do not forget to be kind to strangers and let them stay in your home. Some people have had angels in their homes without knowing it.
58013003	Remember those in prison. Think of them as if you were in prison with them. Remember those who are suffering because of what others have done to them. You may suffer in the same way.
58013004	Marriage should be respected by everyone. God will punish those who do sex sins and are not faithful in marriage.
58013005	Keep your lives free from the love of money. Be happy with what you have. God has said, “I will never leave you or let you be alone.” (Deuteronomy 31:6)
58013006	So we can say for sure, “The Lord is my Helper. I am not afraid of anything man can do to me.” (Psalm 118:6)
58013007	Remember your leaders who first spoke God’s Word to you. Think of how they lived, and trust God as they did.
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever.
58013009	Do not let the many strange teachings lead you in the wrong way. Our hearts are made strong by God’s loving-favor. Food does not make our hearts strong. Those who obey laws about eating certain foods are not helped by them.
58013010	We have an altar from which those who work in the place of worship have no right to eat.
58013011	The head religious leader takes the blood of animals into the holy place to give it on the altar for sins. But the bodies of the animals are burned outside the city.
58013012	It was the same with Jesus. He suffered and died outside the city so His blood would make the people clean from sin.
58013013	So let us go to Him outside the city to share His shame.
58013014	For there is no city here on earth that will last forever. We are looking for the one that is coming.
58013015	Let us give thanks all the time to God through Jesus Christ. Our gift to Him is to give thanks. Our lips should always give thanks to His name.
58013016	Remember to do good and help each other. Gifts like this please God.
58013017	Obey your leaders and do what they say. They keep watch over your souls. They have to tell God what they have done. They should have joy in this and not be sad. If they are sad, it is no help to you.
58013018	Pray for us. Our hearts tell us we are right. We want to do the right thing always.
58013019	Pray for me all the more so that I will be able to come to you soon.
58013020	God is a God of peace. He raised our Lord Jesus from the dead. Jesus is the Good Shepherd of the sheep. His blood made the New Way of Worship which will last forever.
58013021	May God give you every good thing you need so you can do what He wants. May He do in us what pleases Him through Jesus Christ. May Christ have all the shining-greatness forever! Let it be so.
58013022	Christian brothers, I beg of you to listen to these words that will help you. This has been a short letter.
58013023	I want you to know that Timothy is out of prison. If he comes soon, I will bring him with me when I come to see you.
58013024	Greet all of your leaders and to all those who belong to Christ. The Christians from the country of Italy greet you.
58013025	May all of you have God’s loving-favor. Let it be so.
59001001	This letter is from James. I am a servant owned by God and the Lord Jesus Christ. I greet the twelve family groups of the Jewish nation living in many parts of the world.
59001002	My Christian brothers, you should be happy when you have all kinds of tests.
59001003	You know these prove your faith. It helps you not to give up.
59001004	Learn well how to wait so you will be strong and complete and in need of nothing.
59001005	If you do not have wisdom, ask God for it. He is always ready to give it to you and will never say you are wrong for asking.
59001006	You must have faith as you ask Him. You must not doubt. Anyone who doubts is like a wave which is pushed around by the sea.
59001007	Such a man will get nothing from the Lord.
59001008	The man who has two ways of thinking changes in everything he does.
59001009	A Christian brother who has few riches of this world should be happy for what he has. He is great in the eyes of God.
59001010	But a rich man should be happy even if he loses everything. He is like a flower that will die.
59001011	The sun comes up with burning heat. The grass dries up and the flower falls off. It is no longer beautiful. The rich man will die also and all his riches will be gone.
59001012	The man who does not give up when tests come is happy. After the test is over, he will receive the crown of life. God has promised this to those who love Him.
59001013	When you are tempted to do wrong, do not say, “God is tempting me.” God cannot be tempted. He will never tempt anyone.
59001014	A man is tempted to do wrong when he lets himself be led by what his bad thoughts tell him to do.
59001015	When he does what his bad thoughts tell him to do, he sins. When sin completes its work, it brings death.
59001016	My Christian brothers, do not be fooled about this.
59001017	Whatever is good and perfect comes to us from God. He is the One Who made all light. He does not change. No shadow is made by His turning.
59001018	He gave us our new lives through the truth of His Word only because He wanted to. We are the first children in His family.
59001019	My Christian brothers, you know everyone should listen much and speak little. He should be slow to become angry.
59001020	A man’s anger does not allow him to be right with God.
59001021	Put out of your life all that is unclean and wrong. Receive with a gentle spirit the Word that was taught. It has the power to save your souls from the punishment of sin.
59001022	Obey the Word of God. If you hear only and do not act, you are only fooling yourself.
59001023	Anyone who hears the Word of God and does not obey is like a man looking at his face in a mirror.
59001024	After he sees himself and goes away, he forgets what he looks like.
59001025	But the one who keeps looking into God’s perfect Law and does not forget it will do what it says and be happy as he does it. God’s Word makes men free.
59001026	If a person thinks he is religious, but does not keep his tongue from speaking bad things, he is fooling himself. His religion is worth nothing.
59001027	Religion that is pure and good before God the Father is to help children who have no parents and to care for women whose husbands have died who have troubles. Pure religion is also to keep yourself clean from the sinful things of the world.
59002001	My Christian brothers, our Lord Jesus Christ is the Lord of shining- greatness. Since your trust is in Him, do not look on one person as more important than another.
59002002	What if a man comes into your church wearing a gold ring and good clothes? And at the same time a poor man comes wearing old clothes.
59002003	What if you show respect to the man in good clothes and say, “Come and sit in this good place”? But if you say to the poor man, “Stand up over there,” or “Sit on the floor by my feet,”
59002004	are you not thinking that one is more important than the other? This kind of thinking is sinful.
59002005	Listen, my dear Christian brothers, God has chosen those who are poor in the things of this world to be rich in faith. The holy nation of heaven is theirs. That is what God promised to those who love Him.
59002006	You have not shown respect to the poor man. Is it not the rich men who make it hard for you and take you to court?
59002007	They speak against the name of Christ. And it was Christ Who called you.
59002008	You do well when you obey the Holy Writings which say, “You must love your neighbor as you love yourself.” (Leviticus 19:18)
59002009	But if you look on one man as more important than another, you are sinning. And the Law says you are sinning.
59002010	If you obey all the Laws but one, you are as guilty as the one who has broken them all.
59002011	The One Who said, “You must not do any sex sins,” also said, “You must not kill another person.” If you do no sex sins but kill someone, you are guilty of breaking the Law.
59002012	Keep on talking and acting as people who will be told they are guilty or not by the Law that makes men free.
59002013	Anyone who shows no loving-kindness will have no loving-kindness shown to him when he is told he is guilty. But if you show loving-kindness, God will show loving-kindness to you when you are told you are guilty.
59002014	My Christian brothers, what good does it do if you say you have faith but do not do things that prove you have faith? Can that kind of faith save you from the punishment of sin?
59002015	What if a Christian does not have clothes or food?
59002016	And one of you says to him, “Good-bye, keep yourself warm and eat well.” But if you do not give him what he needs, how does that help him?
59002017	A faith that does not do things is a dead faith.
59002018	Someone may say, “You have faith, and I do things. Prove to me you have faith when you are doing nothing. I will prove to you I have faith by doing things.”
59002019	You believe there is one God. That is good! But even the demons believe that, and because they do, they shake.
59002020	You foolish man! Do I have to prove to you that faith without doing things is of no use?
59002021	Was not our early father Abraham right with God by what he did? He obeyed God and put his son Isaac on the altar to die.
59002022	You see his faith working by what he did and his faith was made perfect by what he did.
59002023	It happened as the Holy Writings said it would happen. They say, “Abraham put his trust in God and he became right with God.” (Genesis 15:6) He was called the friend of God.
59002024	A man becomes right with God by what he does and not by faith only.
59002025	The same was true with Rahab, the woman who sold the use of her body. She became right with God by what she did in helping the men who had been sent to look through the country and sent them away by another road.
59002026	The body is dead when there is no spirit in it. It is the same with faith. Faith is dead when nothing is done.
59003001	My Christian brothers, not many of you should become teachers. If we do wrong, it will be held against us more than other people who are not teachers.
59003002	We all make many mistakes. If anyone does not make a mistake with his tongue by saying the wrong things, he is a perfect man. It shows he is able to make his body do what he wants it to do.
59003003	We make a horse go wherever we want it to go by a small bit in its mouth. We turn its whole body by this.
59003004	Sailing ships are driven by strong winds. But a small rudder turns a large ship whatever way the man at the wheel wants the ship to go.
59003005	The tongue is also a small part of the body, but it can speak big things. See how a very small fire can set many trees on fire.
59003006	The tongue is a fire. It is full of wrong. It poisons the whole body. The tongue sets our whole lives on fire with a fire that comes from hell.
59003007	Men can make all kinds of animals and birds and fish and snakes do what they want them to do.
59003008	But no man can make his tongue say what he wants it to say. It is sinful and does not rest. It is full of poison that kills.
59003009	With our tongue we give thanks to our Father in heaven. And with our tongue we speak bad words against men who are made like God.
59003010	Giving thanks and speaking bad words come from the same mouth. My Christian brothers, this is not right!
59003011	Does a well of water give good water and bad water from the same place?
59003012	Can a fig tree give olives or can a grape-vine give figs? A well does not give both good water and bad water.
59003013	Who among you is wise and understands? Let that one show from a good life by the things he does that he is wise and gentle.
59003014	If you have jealousy in your heart and fight to have many things, do not be proud of it. Do not lie against the truth.
59003015	This is not the kind of wisdom that comes from God. But this wisdom comes from the world and from that which is not Christian and from the devil.
59003016	Wherever you find jealousy and fighting, there will be trouble and every other kind of wrongdoing.
59003017	But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure. Then it gives peace. It is gentle and willing to obey. It is full of loving-kindness and of doing good. It has no doubts and does not pretend to be something it is not.
59003018	Those who plant seeds of peace will gather what is right and good.
59004001	What starts wars and fights among you? Is it not because you want many things and are fighting to have them?
59004002	You want something you do not have, so you kill. You want something but cannot get it, so you fight for it. You do not get things because you do not ask for them.
59004003	Or if you do ask, you do not receive because your reasons for asking are wrong. You want these things only to please yourselves.
59004004	You are as wives and husbands who are not faithful in marriage and do sex sins. Do you not know that to love the sinful things of the world and to be a friend to them is to be against God? Yes, I say it again, if you are a friend of the world, you are against God.
59004005	Do you think the Holy Writings mean nothing when they said, “The Holy Spirit Whom God has given to live in us has a strong desire for us to be faithful to Him”?
59004006	But He gives us more loving-favor. For the Holy Writings say, “God works against the proud but gives loving-favor to those who have no pride.” (Proverbs 3:34)
59004007	So give yourselves to God. Stand against the devil and he will run away from you.
59004008	Come close to God and He will come close to you. Wash your hands, you sinners. Clean up your hearts, you who want to follow the sinful ways of the world and God at the same time.
59004009	Be sorry for your sins and cry because of them. Be sad and do not laugh. Let your joy be turned to sorrow.
59004010	Let yourself be brought low before the Lord. Then He will lift you up and help you.
59004011	Christian brothers, do not talk against anyone or speak bad things about each other. If a person says bad things about his brother, he is speaking against him. And he will be speaking against God’s Law. If you say the Law is wrong, and do not obey it, you are saying you are better than the Law.
59004012	Only God can say what is right or wrong. He made the Law. He can save or put to death. How can we say if our brother is right or wrong?
59004013	Listen! You who say, “Today or tomorrow we will go to this city and stay a year and make money.”
59004014	You do not know about tomorrow. What is your life? It is like fog. You see it and soon it is gone.
59004015	What you should say is, “If the Lord wants us to, we will live and do this or that.”
59004016	But instead you are proud. You talk loud and big about yourselves. All such pride is sin.
59004017	If you know what is right to do but you do not do it, you sin.
59005001	Listen, you rich men! Cry about the troubles that will come to you.
59005002	Your riches are worth nothing. Your fine clothes are full of moth holes.
59005003	Your gold and silver have rusted. Their rust will speak against you and eat your flesh like fire. You have saved riches for yourselves for the last days.
59005004	See! The men working in your fields are crying against you because you have kept back part of their pay. Their cries have been heard by the Lord Who hears His people.
59005005	You have had everything while you lived on the earth and have enjoyed its fun. You have made your hearts fat and are ready to be killed as an animal is killed.
59005006	You have killed men who are right with God who were not making it hard for you.
59005007	Christian brothers, be willing to wait for the Lord to come again. Learn from the farmer. He waits for the good fruit from the earth until the early and late rains come.
59005008	You must be willing to wait also. Be strong in your hearts because the Lord is coming again soon.
59005009	Do not complain about each other, Christian brothers. Then you will not be judged. See! The Judge is standing at the door.
59005010	See how the early preachers spoke for the Lord by their suffering and by being willing to wait.
59005011	We think of those who stayed true to Him as happy even though they suffered. You have heard how long Job waited. You have seen what the Lord did for him in the end. The Lord is full of loving-kindness and pity.
59005012	My Christian brothers, do not swear. Do not use heaven or earth or anything else to swear by. If you mean yes, say yes. If you mean no, say no. You will be guilty for saying anything more.
59005013	Is anyone among you suffering? He should pray. Is anyone happy? He should sing songs of thanks to God.
59005014	Is anyone among you sick? He should send for the church leaders and they should pray for him. They should pour oil on him in the name of the Lord.
59005015	The prayer given in faith will heal the sick man, and the Lord will raise him up. If he has sinned, he will be forgiven.
59005016	Tell your sins to each other. And pray for each other so you may be healed. The prayer from the heart of a man right with God has much power.
59005017	Elijah was a man as we are. He prayed that it might not rain. It did not rain on the earth for three and one-half years.
59005018	Then he prayed again that it would rain. It rained much and the fields of the earth gave fruit.
59005019	My Christian brothers, if any of you should be led away from the truth, let someone turn him back again.
59005020	That person should know that if he turns a sinner from the wrong way, he will save the sinner’s soul from death and many sins will be forgiven.
60001001	This letter is from Peter, a missionary of Jesus Christ. I am writing to hose who were taken away from their homeland and are living in the countries of Pontus and Galatia and Cappadocia and Asia and Bithynia.
60001002	You were chosen by God the Father long ago. He knew you were to become His children. You were set apart for holy living by the Holy Spirit. May you obey Jesus Christ and be made clean by His blood. May you be full of His loving-favor and peace.
60001003	Let us thank the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ. It was through His loving-kindness that we were born again to a new life and have a hope that never dies. This hope is ours because Jesus was raised from the dead.
60001004	We will receive the great things that we have been promised. They are being kept safe in heaven for us. They are pure and will not pass away. They will never be lost.
60001005	You are being kept by the power of God because you put your trust in Him and you will be saved from the punishment of sin at the end of the world.
60001006	With this hope you can be happy even if you need to have sorrow and all kinds of tests for awhile.
60001007	These tests have come to prove your faith and to show that it is good. Gold, which can be destroyed, is tested by fire. Your faith is worth much more than gold and it must be tested also. Then your faith will bring thanks and shining-greatness and honor to Jesus Christ when He comes again.
60001008	You have never seen Him but you love Him. You cannot see Him now but you are putting your trust in Him. And you have joy so great that words cannot tell about it.
60001009	You will get what your faith is looking for, which is to be saved from the punishment of sin.
60001010	The early preachers tried to find out how to be saved. They told of the loving-favor that would come to you.
60001011	The early preachers wondered at what time or to what person this would happen. The Spirit of Christ in them was talking to them and told them to write about how Christ would suffer and about His shining-greatness later on.
60001012	They knew these things would not happen during the time they lived but while you are living many years later. These are the very things that were told to you by those who preached the Good News. The Holy Spirit Who was sent from heaven gave them power and they told of things that even the angels would like to know about.
60001013	Get your minds ready for good use. Keep awake. Set your hope now and forever on the loving-favor to be given you when Jesus Christ comes again.
60001014	Be like children who obey. Do not desire to sin like you used to when you did not know any better.
60001015	Be holy in every part of your life. Be like the Holy One Who chose you.
60001016	The Holy Writings say, “You must be holy, for I am holy.” (Leviticus 11:44-45)
60001017	The Father is the One Who judges you by what you do. He does not respect one person more than another. If you call Him Father, be sure you honor Him with love and fear all the days of your life here on earth.
60001018	You know you were not bought and made free from sin by paying gold or silver which comes to an end. And you know you were not saved from the punishment of sin by the way of life that you were given from your early fathers. That way of life was worth nothing.
60001019	The blood of Christ saved you. This blood is of great worth and no amount of money can buy it. Christ was given as a lamb without sin and without spot.
60001020	Long before the world was made, God chose Christ to be given to you in these last days.
60001021	Because of Christ, you have put your trust in God. He raised Christ from the dead and gave Him great honor. So now your faith and hope are in God.
60001022	You have made your souls pure by obeying the truth through the Holy Spirit. This has given you a true love for the Christians. Let it be a true love from the heart.
60001023	You have been given a new birth. It was from a seed that cannot die. This new life is from the Word of God which lives forever.
60001024	All people are like grass. Their greatness is like the flowers. The grass dries up and the flowers fall off.
60001025	But the Word of the Lord will last forever. That Word is the Good News which was preached to you.
60002001	Put out of your life hate and lying. Do not pretend to be someone you are not. Do not always want something someone else has. Do not say bad things about other people.
60002002	As new babies want milk, you should want to drink the pure milk which is God’s Word so you will grow up and be saved from the punishment of sin.
60002003	If you have tasted of the Lord, you know how good He is.
60002004	Come to Christ as to a living stone. Men have put Him aside, but He was chosen by God and is of great worth in the sight of God.
60002005	You are to be as living stones in the building God is making also. You are His religious leaders giving yourselves to God through Jesus Christ. This kind of gift pleases God.
60002006	The Holy Writings say, “See, I lay down in Jerusalem a Stone of great worth, worth far more than any amount of money. Anyone who puts his trust in Him will not be ashamed.” (Isaiah 28:16)
60002007	This Stone is of great worth to you who have your trust in Him. But to those who have not put their trust in Him, the Holy Writings say, “The Stone which the workmen put aside has become the most important part of the building.” (Psalm 118:22)
60002008	The Holy Writings say, also, “Christ is the Stone that some men will trip over and the Rock over which they will fall.” (Isaiah 8:14) When they do not obey the Word of God, they trip over it. This is what happens to such men.
60002009	But you are a chosen group of people. You are the King’s religious leaders. You are a holy nation. You belong to God. He has done this for you so you can tell others how God has called you out of darkness into His great light.
60002010	At one time you were a people of no use. Now you are the people of God. At one time you did not have loving-kindness. Now you have God’s loving-kindness.
60002011	Dear friends, your real home is not here on earth. You are strangers here. I ask you to keep away from all the sinful desires of the flesh. These things fight to get hold of your soul.
60002012	When you are around people who do not know God, be careful how you act. Even if they talk against you as wrongdoers, in the end they will give thanks to God for your good works when Christ comes again.
60002013	Obey the head leader of the country and all other leaders over you. This pleases the Lord.
60002014	Obey the men who work for them. God sends them to punish those who do wrong and to show respect to those who do right.
60002015	This is what God wants. When you do right, you stop foolish men from saying bad things.
60002016	Obey as men who are free but do not use this to cover up sin. Live as servants owned by God at all times.
60002017	Show respect to all men. Love the Christians. Honor God with love and fear. Respect the head leader of the country.
60002018	Servants, you are to respect your owners and do what they say. Do this if you have a good and kind owner. You must do it even if your owner is hard to work for.
60002019	This shows you have received loving-favor when you are even punished for doing what is right because of your trust in God.
60002020	What good is it if, when you are beaten for doing something wrong, you do not try to get out of it? But if you are beaten when you have done what is right, and do not try to get out of it, God is pleased.
60002021	These things are all a part of the Christian life to which you have been called. Christ suffered for us. This shows us we are to follow in His steps.
60002022	He never sinned. No lie or bad talk ever came from His lips.
60002023	When people spoke against Him, He never spoke back. When He suffered from what people did to Him, He did not try to pay them back. He left it in the hands of the One Who is always right in judging.
60002024	He carried our sins in His own body when He died on a cross. In doing this, we may be dead to sin and alive to all that is right and good. His wounds have healed you!
60002025	You were like lost sheep. But now you have come back to Him Who is your Shepherd and the One Who cares for your soul.
60003001	Wives, obey your own husbands. Some of your husbands may not obey the Word of God. By obeying your husbands, they may become Christians by the life you live without you saying anything.
60003002	They will see how you love God and how your lives are pure.
60003003	Do not let your beauty come from the outside. It should not be the way you comb your hair or the wearing of gold or the wearing of fine clothes.
60003004	Your beauty should come from the inside. It should come from the heart. This is the kind that lasts. Your beauty should be a gentle and quiet spirit. In God’s sight this is of great worth and no amount of money can buy it.
60003005	This was the kind of beauty seen in the holy women who lived many years ago. They put their hope in God. They also obeyed their husbands.
60003006	Sarah obeyed her husband Abraham. She respected him as the head of the house. You are her children if you do what is right and do not have fear.
60003007	In the same way, husbands should understand and respect their wives, because women are weaker than men. Remember, both husband and wife are to share together the gift of life that lasts forever. If this is not done, you will find it hard to pray.
60003008	Last of all, you must share the same thoughts and the same feelings. Love each other with a kind heart and with a mind that has no pride.
60003009	When someone does something bad to you, do not do the same thing to him. When someone talks about you, do not talk about him. Instead, pray that good will come to him. You were called to do this so you might receive good things from God.
60003010	For “If you want joy in your life and have happy days, keep your tongue from saying bad things and your lips from talking bad about others.
60003011	Turn away from what is sinful. Do what is good. Look for peace and go after it.
60003012	The Lord watches over those who are right with Him. He hears their prayers. But the Lord is against those who sin.” (Psalm 34:12-16)
60003013	Who will hurt you if you do what is right?
60003014	But even if you suffer for doing what is right, you will be happy. Do not be afraid or troubled by what they may do to make it hard for you.
60003015	Your heart should be holy and set apart for the Lord God. Always be ready to tell everyone who asks you why you believe as you do. Be gentle as you speak and show respect.
60003016	Keep your heart telling you that you have done what is right. If men speak against you, they will be ashamed when they see the good way you have lived as a Christian.
60003017	If God wants you to suffer, it is better to suffer for doing what is right than for doing what is wrong.
60003018	Christ suffered and died for sins once for all. He never sinned and yet He died for us who have sinned. He died so He might bring us to God. His body died but His spirit was made alive.
60003019	Christ went and preached to the spirits in prison.
60003020	Those were the spirits of the people who would not obey in the days of Noah. God waited a long time for them while Noah was building the big boat. But only eight people were saved from dying when the earth was covered with water.
60003021	This is like baptism to us. Baptism does not mean we wash our bodies clean. It means we are saved from the punishment of sin and go to God in prayer with a heart that says we are right. This can be done because Christ was raised from the dead.
60003022	Christ has gone to heaven and is on the right side of God. Angels and powers of heaven are obeying Him.
60004001	Since Christ has suffered in His body, we must be ready to suffer also. Suffering puts an end to sin.
60004002	You should no longer spend the rest of your life giving in to the sinful desires of the flesh. But do what God wants as long as you live in this world.
60004003	In the past you gave enough of your life over to living like the people who do not know God. You gave your life to sex sins and to sinful desires. You got drunk and went to wild parties and to drinking parties and you worshiped false gods.
60004004	Those who do not know God are surprised you do not join them in the sinful things they do. They laugh at you and say bad things against you.
60004005	Remember, they will give an answer to Him Who judges all who are living or dead.
60004006	For this reason, the Good News was preached to the dead. They stood in the flesh before the One Who judges so they might live in the Spirit as God wants.
60004007	The end of the world is near. You must be the boss over your mind. Keep awake so you can pray.
60004008	Most of all, have a true love for each other. Love covers many sins.
60004009	Be happy to have people stay for the night and eat with you.
60004010	God has given each of you a gift. Use it to help each other. This will show God’s loving-favor.
60004011	If a man preaches, let him do it with God speaking through him. If a man helps others, let him do it with the strength God gives. So in all things God may be honored through Jesus Christ. Shining-greatness and power belong to Him forever. Let it be so.
60004012	Dear friends, your faith is going to be tested as if it were going through fire. Do not be surprised at this.
60004013	Be happy that you are able to share some of the suffering of Christ. When His shining-greatness is shown, you will be filled with much joy.
60004014	If men speak bad of you because you are a Christian, you will be happy because the Spirit of shining-greatness and of God is in you.
60004015	None of you should suffer as one who kills another person or as one who steals or as one who makes trouble or as one who tries to be the boss of other peoples’ lives.
60004016	But if a man suffers as a Christian, he should not be ashamed. He should thank God that he is a Christian.
60004017	The time has come for Christians to stand before God and He will judge. If this happens to us, what will happen to those who do not obey the Good News of God?
60004018	If it is hard for a man who is right with God to be saved, what will happen to the sinner?
60004019	So if God wants you to suffer, give yourself to Him. He will do what is right for you. He made you and He is faithful.
60005001	I want to speak to the church leaders among you. I am a church leader also. I saw Christ suffer and die on a cross. I will also share His shining-greatness when He comes again.
60005002	Be good shepherds of the flock God has put in your care. Do not care for the flock as if you were made to. Do not care for the flock for money, but do it because you want to.
60005003	Do not be bosses over the people you lead. Live as you would like to have them live.
60005004	When the Head Shepherd comes again, you will get the crown of shining-greatness that will not come to an end.
60005005	In the same way, you younger men must obey the church leaders. Be gentle as you care for each other. God works against those who have pride. He gives His loving-favor to those who do not try to honor themselves.
60005006	So put away all pride from yourselves. You are standing under the powerful hand of God. At the right time He will lift you up.
60005007	Give all your worries to Him because He cares for you.
60005008	Keep awake! Watch at all times. The devil is working against you. He is walking around like a hungry lion with his mouth open. He is looking for someone to eat.
60005009	Stand against him and be strong in your faith. Remember, other Christians over all the world are suffering the same as you are.
60005010	After you have suffered for awhile, God Himself will make you perfect. He will keep you in the right way. He will give you strength. He is the God of all loving-favor and has called you through Christ Jesus to share His shining-greatness forever.
60005011	God has power over all things forever. Let it be so.
60005012	I have known Silvanus as a faithful Christian brother and it is by him I have written this short letter to help you. It tells you of the true loving-favor of God. Stay true in His loving-favor.
60005013	The church which is in the city of Babylon greets you. It has been chosen by God the same as you have been. My son, Mark, greets you also.
60005014	Greet each other with a kiss of holy love. May all of you Christians have peace.
61001001	This letter is from Simon Peter. I am a missionary of Jesus Christ and a servant owned by Him. I am writing to those who have received the same faith as ours which is of great worth and which no amount of money can buy. This faith comes from our God and Jesus Christ, the One Who saves.
61001002	May you have more and more of His loving-favor and peace as you come to know God and our Lord Jesus Christ better.
61001003	He gives us everything we need for life and for holy living. He gives it through His great power. As we come to know Him better, we learn that He called us to share His own shining-greatness and perfect life.
61001004	Through His shining-greatness and perfect life, He has given us promises. These promises are of great worth and no amount of money can buy them. Through these promises you can have God’s own life in you now that you have gotten away from the sinful things of the world which came from wrong desires of the flesh.
61001005	Do your best to add holy living to your faith. Then add to this a better understanding.
61001006	As you have a better understanding, be able to say no when you need to. Do not give up. And as you wait and do not give up, live God-like.
61001007	As you live Godlike, be kind to Christian brothers and love them.
61001008	If you have all these things and keep growing in them, they will keep you from being of no use and from having no fruit when it comes to knowing our Lord Jesus Christ.
61001009	But if you do not have these things, you are blind and cannot see far. You forget God saved you from your old life of sin.
61001010	Christian brothers, make sure you are among those He has chosen and called out for His own. As long as you do these things, you will never trip and fall.
61001011	In this way, the road will be made wide open for you. And you will go into the holy nation that lasts forever of our Lord Jesus Christ, the One Who saves.
61001012	You already know about these things but I want to keep telling you about them. You are strong in the faith now.
61001013	I think it is right as long as I am alive to keep you thinking about these things.
61001014	I know that I will soon be leaving this body. Our Lord Jesus Christ has told me this.
61001015	I will try to make a way for you to remember these things after I am gone.
61001016	We had nothing to do with man-made stories when we told you about the power of our Lord Jesus Christ and of His coming again. We have seen His great power with our own eyes.
61001017	When He received honor and shining-greatness from God the Father, a voice came to Him from the All-powerful God, saying, “This is My much-loved Son. I am very happy with Him.”
61001018	We heard this voice come from heaven when we were with Christ on the holy mountain.
61001019	All this helps us know that what the early preachers said was true. You will do well to listen to what they have said. Their words are as lights that shine in a dark place. Listen until you understand what they have said. Then it will be like the morning light which takes away the darkness. And the Morning Star (Christ) will rise to shine in your hearts.
61001020	Understand this first: No part of the Holy Writings was ever made up by any man.
61001021	No part of the Holy Writings came long ago because of what man wanted to write. But holy men who belonged to God spoke what the Holy Spirit told them.
61002001	But there were false teachers among the people. And there will be false teachers among you also. These people will work in secret ways to bring false teaching to you. They will turn against Christ Who bought them with His blood. They bring fast death on themselves.
61002002	Many people will follow their wrong ways. Because of what they do, people will speak bad things against the way of truth.
61002003	They will tell lies and false stories so they can use you to get things for themselves. But God judged them long ago and their death is on the way.
61002004	God did not hold back from punishing the angels who sinned, but sent them down to hell. They are to be kept there in the deep hole of darkness until they stand before Him Who judges them.
61002005	God did not hold back from punishing the people of the world who sinned long ago. He brought the flood on the world of sinners. But Noah was a preacher of right living. He and his family of seven were the only ones God saved.
61002006	God said that the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah were guilty, and He destroyed them with fire. This was to show people who did not worship God what would happen to them.
61002007	Lot was taken away from Sodom because he was right with God. He had been troubled by the sins that bad men did in wild living.
61002008	He saw and heard how the people around him broke the Law. Everyday his own soul which was right with God was troubled because of their sinful ways.
61002009	But the Lord knows how to help men who are right with God when they are tempted. He also knows how to keep the sinners suffering for their wrong-doing until the day they stand before God Who will judge them.
61002010	This is true about those who keep on wanting to please their own bodies in sinful desires and those who will not obey laws. They want to please themselves and are not afraid when they laugh and say bad things about the powers in heaven.
61002011	Angels are greater in strength and power than they. But angels do not speak against these powers before the Lord.
61002012	Men like this are like animals who are not able to think but are born to be caught and killed. They speak bad words against that which they do not understand. They will die in their own sinful ways.
61002013	This is the pay they will suffer for their sinful lives. They are not ashamed when they sin in the daylight. They are sores and dirty spots among you while they eat and drink big meals with you.
61002014	Their eyes are full of sex sins. They never have enough sin. They get weak people to go along with them. Their hearts are always wanting something. They are people who will end up in hell because
61002015	they have left the right way and have gone the wrong way. They have followed the way of Balaam, who was the son of Beor. He loved the money he got for his sin.
61002016	But he was stopped in his sin. A donkey spoke to him with a man’s voice. It stopped this early preacher from going on in his crazy way.
61002017	Such people are like wells without water. They are like clouds before a storm. The darkest place below has been kept for them.
61002018	They speak big-sounding words which show they are proud. They get men who are trying to keep away from sinful men to give in to the sinful desires of the flesh.
61002019	They promise that these men will be free. But they themselves are chained to sin. For a man is chained to anything that has power over him.
61002020	There are men who have been made free from the sins of the world by learning to know the Lord Jesus Christ, the One Who saves. But if they do these sins again, and are not able to keep from doing them, they are worse than they were before.
61002021	After knowing the holy Law that was given to them, they turned from it. It would have been better for them if they had not known how to be right with God.
61002022	They are like the wise saying, 'A dog turns back to what he has thrown up.” (Proverbs 26:11) And, 'A pig that has been washed goes back to roll in the mud.”
61003001	Dear friends, this is the second letter I have written to you. In both of them I have tried to get you to remember some things.
61003002	You should remember the words that were spoken before by the holy early preachers. Do not forget the teaching of the Lord, the One Who saves. This was given to you by your missionaries.
61003003	First of all, I want you to know that in the last days men will laugh at the truth. They will follow their own sinful desires.
61003004	They will say, 'He promised to come again. Where is He? Since our early fathers died, everything is the same from the beginning of the world.”
61003005	But they want to forget that God spoke and the heavens were made long ago. The earth was made out of water and water was all around it.
61003006	Long ago the earth was covered with water and it was destroyed.
61003007	But the heaven we see now and the earth we live on now have been kept by His word. They will be kept until they are to be destroyed by fire. They will be kept until the day men stand before God and sinners will be destroyed.
61003008	Dear friends, remember this one thing, with the Lord one day is as 1,000 years, and 1,000 years are as one day.
61003009	The Lord is not slow about keeping His promise as some people think. He is waiting for you. The Lord does not want any person to be punished forever. He wants all people to be sorry for their sins and turn from them.
61003010	The day of the Lord will come as a robber comes. The heavens will pass away with a loud noise. The sun and moon and stars will burn up. The earth and all that is in it will be burned up.
61003011	Since all these things are to be destroyed in this way, you should think about the kind of life you are living. It should be holy and God-like.
61003012	You should look for the day of God to come. You should do what you can to make it come soon. At that time the heavens will be destroyed by fire. And the sun and moon and stars will melt away with much heat.
61003013	We are looking for what God has promised, which are new heavens and a new earth. Only what is right and good will be there.
61003014	Dear friends, since you are waiting for these things to happen, do all you can to be found by Him in peace. Be clean and free from sin.
61003015	You can be sure the long waiting of our Lord is part of His plan to save men from the punishment of sin. God gave our dear brother Paul the wisdom to write about this also.
61003016	He wrote about these things in all of his writings. Some of these things are hard to understand. People who do not have much understanding and some who are not strong in the faith change the meaning of his letters. They do this to the other parts of the Holy Writings also. They are destroying themselves as they do this.
61003017	And so, dear friends, now that you know this, watch so you will not be led away by the mistakes of these sinful people. Do not be moved by them.
61003018	Grow in the loving-favor that Christ gives you. Learn to know our Lord Jesus Christ better. He is the One Who saves. May He have all the shining-greatness now and forever. Let it be so.
62001001	Christ is the Word of Life. He was from the beginning. We have heard Him and have seen Him with our own eyes. We have looked at Him and put our hands on Him.
62001002	Christ Who is Life was shown to us. We saw Him. We tell you and preach about the Life that lasts forever. He was with the Father and He has come down to us.
62001003	We are preaching what we have heard and seen. We want you to share together with us what we have with the Father and with His Son, Jesus Christ.
62001004	We are writing this to you so our joy may be full.
62001005	This is what we heard Him tell us. We are passing it on to you. God is light. There is no darkness in Him.
62001006	If we say we are joined together with Him but live in darkness, we are telling a lie. We are not living the truth.
62001007	If we live in the light as He is in the light, we share what we have in God with each other. And the blood of Jesus Christ, His Son, makes our lives clean from all sin.
62001008	If we say that we have no sin, we lie to ourselves and the truth is not in us.
62001009	If we tell Him our sins, He is faithful and we can depend on Him to forgive us of our sins. He will make our lives clean from all sin.
62001010	If we say we have not sinned, we make God a liar. And His Word is not in our hearts.
62002001	My dear children, I am writing this to you so you will not sin. But if anyone does sin, there is One Who will go between him and the Father. He is Jesus Christ, the One Who is right with God.
62002002	He paid for our sins with His own blood. He did not pay for ours only, but for the sins of the whole world.
62002003	We can be sure that we know Him if we obey His teaching.
62002004	Anyone who says, “I know Him,” but does not obey His teaching is a liar. There is no truth in him.
62002005	But whoever obeys His Word has the love of God made perfect in him. This is the way to know if you belong to Christ.
62002006	The one who says he belongs to Christ should live the same kind of life Christ lived.
62002007	Dear friends, I am not writing a new Law for you to obey. It is an old Law you have had from the beginning. The old Law is the Word that you have heard.
62002008	And yet it is a new Law that I am writing to you. It is truth. It was seen in Christ and it is seen in you also. The darkness is passing away and the true Light shines instead.
62002009	Whoever says he is in the light but hates his brother is still in darkness.
62002010	But whoever loves his brother is in the light. And there will be no reason to sin because of him.
62002011	Whoever hates his brother is not in the light but lives in darkness. He does not know where he is going because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
62002012	I am writing to you, my children, for your sins have been forgiven because of Christ’s name.
62002013	I am writing to you, fathers, because you know Him Who has been from the beginning. I am writing to you, young men, because you have power over the devil. I have written to you, young boys and girls, because you have learned to know the Father.
62002014	I have written to you, fathers, because you know Him Who has been from the beginning. I have written to you, young men, because you are strong. You have kept God’s Word in your hearts. You have power over the devil.
62002015	Do not love the world or anything in the world. If anyone loves the world, the Father’s love is not in him.
62002016	For everything that is in the world does not come from the Father. The desires of our flesh and the things our eyes see and want and the pride of this life come from the world.
62002017	The world and all its desires will pass away. But the man who obeys God and does what He wants done will live forever.
62002018	My children, we are near the end of the world. You have heard that the false-christ is coming. Many false-christs have already come. This is how we know the end of the world is near.
62002019	These left us. But they never belonged to us. If they had been a part of us, they would have stayed with us. Because they left, it is known they did not belong to us.
62002020	The Holy Spirit has been given to you and you all know the truth.
62002021	I have not written to you because you do not know the truth. I have written because you do know the truth and you know that no lie comes from the truth.
62002022	Who is a liar? He is a person who says that Jesus is not the Christ. The false-christ will have nothing to do with the Father and the Son and he will turn away from Them.
62002023	A person who will have nothing to do with the Son and turns against Him does not have the Father. The one who says he knows the Son has the Father also.
62002024	Keep in your heart what you have heard from the beginning. Then you will belong to the Son and to the Father if what you have heard from the beginning is in you.
62002025	And He has promised us life that lasts forever!
62002026	I have written to you about those who are trying to lead you in the wrong way.
62002027	Christ gave you the Holy Spirit and He lives in you. You do not need anyone to teach you. The Holy Spirit is able to teach you all things. What He teaches you is truth and not a lie. Live by the help of Christ as the Holy Spirit has taught you.
62002028	And now, my children, live by the help of Him. Then when He comes again, we will be glad to see Him and not be ashamed.
62002029	You know that Christ is right with God. Then you should know that everyone who is right with God is a child of His.
62003001	See what great love the Father has for us that He would call us His children. And that is what we are. For this reason the people of the world do not know who we are because they did not know Him.
62003002	Dear friends, we are God’s children now. But it has not yet been shown to us what we are going to be. We know that when He comes again, we will be like Him because we will see Him as He is.
62003003	The person who is looking for this to happen will keep himself pure because Christ is pure.
62003004	The person who keeps on sinning is guilty of not obeying the Law of God. For sin is breaking the Law of God.
62003005	You know that Christ came to take away our sins. There is no sin in Him.
62003006	The person who lives by the help of Christ does not keep on sinning. The person who keeps on sinning has not seen Him or has not known Him.
62003007	My children, let no one lead you in the wrong way. The man who does what is right, is right with God in the same way as Christ is right with God.
62003008	The person who keeps on sinning belongs to the devil. The devil has sinned from the beginning. But the Son of God came to destroy the works of the devil.
62003009	No person who has become a child of God keeps on sinning. This is because the Holy Spirit is in him. He cannot keep on sinning because God is his Father.
62003010	This is the way you can know who are the children of God and who are the children of the devil. The person who does not keep on doing what is right and does not love his brother does not belong to God.
62003011	This is what you have heard from the beginning, that we should love each other.
62003012	Do not be like Cain. He was a child of the devil and killed his brother. Why did he kill him? It was because he did what was sinful and his brother did what was right.
62003013	Do not be surprised if the world hates you, Christian brothers.
62003014	We know we have passed from death into life. We know this because we love the Christians. The person who does not love has not passed from death into life.
62003015	A man who hates his brother is a killer in his heart. You know that life which lasts forever is not in one who kills.
62003016	We know what love is because Christ gave His life for us. We should give our lives for our brothers.
62003017	What if a person has enough money to live on and sees his brother in need of food and clothing? If he does not help him, how can the love of God be in him?
62003018	My children, let us not love with words or in talk only. Let us love by what we do and in truth.
62003019	This is how we know we are Christians. It will give our heart comfort for sure when we stand before Him.
62003020	Our heart may say that we have done wrong. But remember, God is greater than our heart. He knows everything.
62003021	Dear friends, if our heart does not say that we are wrong, we will have no fear as we stand before Him.
62003022	We will receive from Him whatever we ask if we obey Him and do what He wants.
62003023	This is what He said we must do: Put your trust in the name of His Son, Jesus Christ, and love each other. Christ told us to do this.
62003024	The person who obeys Christ lives by the help of God and God lives in him. We know He lives in us by the Holy Spirit He has given us.
62004001	Dear Christian friends, do not believe every spirit. But test the spirits to see if they are from God for there are many false preachers in the world.
62004002	You can tell if the spirit is from God in this way: Every spirit that says Jesus Christ has come in a human body is from God.
62004003	And every spirit that does not say Jesus has come in a human body is not from God. It is the teaching of the false-christ. You have heard that this teaching is coming. It is already here in the world.
62004004	My children, you are a part of God’s family. You have stood against these false preachers and had power over them. You had power over them because the One Who lives in you is stronger than the one who is in the world.
62004005	Those false teachers are a part of the world. They speak about the things of the world. The world listens to them.
62004006	We are a part of God’s family. The person who knows God will listen to us. The person who is not a part of God’s family will not listen to us. In this way, we can tell what is the spirit of truth and what is the spirit of false teaching.
62004007	Dear friends, let us love each other, because love comes from God. Those who love are God’s children and they know God.
62004008	Those who do not love do not know God because God is love.
62004009	God has shown His love to us by sending His only Son into the world. God did this so we might have life through Christ.
62004010	This is love! It is not that we loved God but that He loved us. For God sent His Son to pay for our sins with His own blood.
62004011	Dear friends, if God loved us that much, then we should love each other.
62004012	No person has ever seen God at any time. If we love each other, God lives in us. His love is made perfect in us.
62004013	He has given us His Spirit. This is how we live by His help and He lives in us.
62004014	We have seen and are able to say that the Father sent His Son to save the world from the punishment of sin.
62004015	The person who tells of Him in front of men and says that Jesus is the Son of God, God is living in that one and that one is living by the help of God.
62004016	We have come to know and believe the love God has for us. God is love. If you live in love, you live by the help of God and God lives in you.
62004017	Love is made perfect in us when we are not ashamed as we stand before Him on the day He judges. For we know that our life in this world is His life lived in us.
62004018	There is no fear in love. Perfect love puts fear out of our hearts. People have fear when they are afraid of being punished. The man who is afraid does not have perfect love.
62004019	We love Him because He loved us first.
62004020	If a person says, “I love God,” but hates his brother, he is a liar. If a person does not love his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God Whom he has not seen?
62004021	We have these words from Him. If you love God, love your brother also.
62005001	The person who believes that Jesus is the Christ is a child of God. The person who loves the Father loves His children also.
62005002	This is the way we know we love God’s children. It is when we love God and obey His Word.
62005003	Loving God means to obey His Word, and His Word is not hard to obey.
62005004	Every child of God has power over the sins of the world. The way we have power over the sins of the world is by our faith.
62005005	Who could have power over the world except by believing that Jesus is the Son of God?
62005006	Jesus Christ came by water and blood. He did not come by water only, but by water and blood. The Holy Spirit speaks about this and He is truth.
62005007	There are three Who speak of this in heaven: the Father and the Word and the Holy Spirit. These three are one.
62005008	There are three who speak of this on the earth: the Holy Spirit and the water and the blood. These three speak the same thing.
62005009	If we believe what men say, we can be sure what God says is more important. God has spoken as He has told us about His Son.
62005010	The person who puts his trust in God’s Son knows in his own heart that Jesus is the Son of God. The person who does not have his trust in God’s Son makes God a liar. It is because he has not believed the word God spoke about His Son.
62005011	This is the word He spoke: God gave us life that lasts forever, and this life is in His Son.
62005012	He that has the Son has life. He that does not have the Son of God does not have life.
62005013	I have written these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God. Now you can know you have life that lasts forever.
62005014	We are sure that if we ask anything that He wants us to have, He will hear us.
62005015	If we are sure He hears us when we ask, we can be sure He will give us what we ask for.
62005016	You may see a Christian brother sinning in a way that does not lead to death. You should pray for him. God will give him life unless he has done that sin that leads to death. There is a sin that leads to death. There is no reason to pray for him if he has done that sin.
62005017	Every kind of wrong-doing is sin. But there is a sin that does not lead to death.
62005018	We know that no child of God keeps on sinning. The Son of God watches over him and the devil cannot get near him.
62005019	We know that we belong to God, but the whole world is under the power of the devil.
62005020	We know God’s Son has come. He has given us the understanding to know Him Who is the true God. We are joined together with the true God through His Son, Jesus Christ. He is the true God and the life that lasts forever.
62005021	My children, keep yourselves from false gods.
63001001	The church leader writes to the chosen lady and to her children. I love you because of the truth. I am not the only one who loves you. All who know the truth love you.
63001002	It is because the truth is in us and will be with us forever.
63001003	Loving-favor and loving-kindness and peace are ours as we live in truth and love. These come from God the Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ, Who is the Son of the Father.
63001004	I am happy to find some of your children living in the truth as the Father has said we should.
63001005	And now I ask you, lady, that we have love one for the other. I am not writing to you about a new Law but an old one we have had from the beginning.
63001006	Love means that we should live by obeying His Word. From the beginning He has said in His Word that our hearts should be full of love.
63001007	There are many false teachers in the world. They do not say that Jesus Christ came in a human body. Such a person does not tell the truth. He is the false-christ.
63001008	Watch yourselves! You do not want to lose what we have worked for. You want to get what has been promised to you.
63001009	Anyone who goes too far and does not live by the teachings of Christ does not have God. If you live by what Christ taught, you have both the Father and the Son.
63001010	If a person comes to you with some other kind of teaching, do not take him into your home. Do not even greet him.
63001011	The person who does has a share in his sins.
63001012	I have many things to write to you. I do not want to write them in this letter. But I hope to come to you soon. Then we can talk about these things together that your joy may be full.
63001013	The children of your chosen sister greet you.
64001001	The church leader writes to the much-loved Gaius. I love you because of the truth.
64001002	Dear friend, I pray that you are doing well in every way. I pray that your body is strong and well even as your soul is.
64001003	I was very happy when some Christians came and told me about how you are following the truth.
64001004	I can have no greater joy than to hear that my children are following the truth.
64001005	Dear friend, you are doing a good work by being kind to the Christians, and for sure, to the strangers.
64001006	They have told the church about your love. It will be good for you to help them on their way as God would have you.
64001007	These people are working for the Lord. They are taking nothing from the people who do not know God.
64001008	So we should help such people. That way we will be working with them as they teach the truth.
64001009	I wrote a letter to the church. But Diotrephes wants to be the leader and put himself first. He will have nothing to do with us.
64001010	So if I come, I will show what he is doing by the bad things he is saying about us. Not only that, he will not take the Christian brothers into his home. He keeps others from doing it also. When they do, he puts them out of the church.
64001011	Dear friend, do not follow what is sinful, but follow what is good. The person who does what is good belongs to God. The person who does what is sinful has not seen God.
64001012	Everyone speaks good things about Demetrius. The truth itself speaks for him. We say the same thing also and you know we are speaking the truth.
64001013	I have much to write about but I do not want to write it in this letter.
64001014	I hope to see you soon and then we can talk together. May you have peace. The friends here greet you. Greet each friend there by name.
65001001	This letter is from Jude, a brother of James. I am a servant owned by Jesus Christ. I am writing to you who have been chosen by God the Father. You are kept for Jesus Christ.
65001002	May you have much of God’s loving-kindness and peace and love.
65001003	Dear friends, I have been trying to write to you about what God did for us when He saved us from the punishment of sin. Now I must write to you and tell you to fight hard for the faith which was once and for all given to the holy people of God.
65001004	Some sinful men have come into your church without anyone knowing it. They are living in sin and they speak of the loving-favor of God to cover up their sins. They have turned against our only Leader and Lord, Jesus Christ. Long ago it was written that these people would die in their sins.
65001005	You already know all this, but think about it again. The Lord saved His people out of the land of Egypt. Later He destroyed all those who did not put their trust in Him.
65001006	Angels who did not stay in their place of power, but left the place where they were given to stay, are chained in a dark place. They will be there until the day they stand before God to be judged.
65001007	Do you remember about the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah and the towns around them? The people in those cities did the same things. They were full of sex sins and strong desires for sinful acts of the body. Those cities were destroyed by fire. They still speak to us of the fire of hell that lasts forever.
65001008	In the same way, these men go on dreaming and sinning against their bodies. They respect no leaders. They speak bad against those who live in the heavens.
65001009	Michael was one of the head angels. He argued with the devil about the body of Moses. But Michael would not speak sharp words to the devil, saying he was guilty. He said, “The Lord speaks sharp words to you.”
65001010	But these men speak against things they do not understand. They are like animals in the way they act. By these things they destroy themselves.
65001011	It is bad for them! They have followed the way of Cain who killed his brother. They have chosen the way of Balaam and think only about making money. They were destroyed as Korah was destroyed who would not show respect to leaders.
65001012	When you come together to eat the Christians’ love suppers, these people are like hidden rocks that wreck a ship. They only think of themselves. They are like clouds without rain carried along by the wind and like trees without fruit in the fall of the year. They are pulled out by the roots and are dead now and never can live again.
65001013	They are like the waves of a wild sea. Their sins are like the dirty water along the shore. They look like stars moving here and there. But the darkest place has been kept for them forever.
65001014	Enoch was the head of the seventh family born after Adam. He said this about such people, “The Lord comes with many thousands of His holy ones.
65001015	He comes to say that all are guilty for all the sin they have done and all the sinful things these sinners have spoken against God.”
65001016	These men complain and are never happy with anything. They let their desires lead them into sin. When they talk about themselves, they make it sound as if they are great people. They show respect to people only to get something out of them.
65001017	Dear friends, you must remember the words spoken by the missionaries of our Lord Jesus Christ.
65001018	They said, “In the last days there will be men who will laugh at the truth and will be led by their own sinful desires.”
65001019	They are men who will make trouble by dividing people into groups against each other. Their minds are on the things of the world because they do not have the Holy Spirit.
65001020	Dear friends, you must become strong in your most holy faith. Let the Holy Spirit lead you as you pray.
65001021	Keep yourselves in the love of God. Wait for life that lasts forever through the loving-kindness of our Lord Jesus Christ.
65001022	Have loving-kindness for those who doubt.
65001023	Save some by pulling them out of the fire. Have loving-kindness for others but also fear them. Be afraid of being led into doing their sins. Hate even the clothes that have touched sinful bodies.
65001024	There is One Who can keep you from falling and can bring you before Himself free from all sin. He can give you great joy as you stand before Him in His shining-greatness.
65001025	He is the only God. He is the One Who saves from the punishment of sin through Jesus Christ our Lord. May He have shining-greatness and honor and power and the right to do all things. He had this before the world began, He has it now, and He will have this forever. Let it be so.
66001001	The things that are written in the Book are made known by Jesus Christ. God gave these things to Christ so He could show them to the servants He owns. These are things which must happen very soon. Christ sent His angel to John who is a servant owned by Him. Christ made these things known to John.
66001002	John tells that the Word of God is true. He tells of Jesus Christ and all that he saw and heard of Him.
66001003	The man who reads this Book and listens to it being read and obeys what it says will be happy. For all these things will happen soon.
66001004	This is John writing to the seven churches in the country of Asia. May you have loving-favor and peace from God Who was and Who is and Who is to come. May you have loving-favor and peace from the seven Spirits who are before His throne.
66001005	May you have loving-favor and peace from Jesus Christ Who is faithful in telling the truth. Jesus Christ is the first to be raised from the dead. He is the head over all the kings of the earth. He is the One Who loves us and has set us free from our sins by His blood.
66001006	Christ has made us a holy nation of religious leaders who can go to His God and Father. He is the One to receive honor and power forever! Let it be so.
66001007	See! He is coming in the clouds. Every eye will see Him. Even the men who killed Him will see Him. All the people on the earth will cry out in sorrow because of Him. Yes, let it be so.
66001008	The Lord God says, “I am the First and the Last, the beginning and the end of all things. I am the All-powerful One Who was and Who is and Who is to come.”
66001009	I, John, am your Christian brother. I have shared with you in suffering because of Jesus Christ. I have also shared with you His holy nation and we have not given up. I was put on the island called Patmos because I preached the Word of God and told about Jesus Christ.
66001010	I was under the Spirit’s power on the Lord’s Day when I heard a loud voice behind me like the loud sound of a horn.
66001011	It said, “(I am the First and the Last.) Write in a book what you see and send it to the seven churches. They are in the cities of Ephesus and Smyrna and Pergamum and Thyatira and Sardis and Philadelphia and Laodicea.”
66001012	I turned around to see who was speaking to me. As I turned, I saw seven lights made of gold.
66001013	Among the lights stood One Who looked like the Son of Man. He had on a long coat that came to His feet. A belt of gold was around His chest.
66001014	His head and His hair were white like white wool. They were as white as snow. His eyes were like fire.
66001015	His feet were like shining brass as bright as if it were in a fire. His voice sounded like powerful rushing water.
66001016	He held seven stars in His right hand. A sharp sword that cuts both ways came out of His mouth. His face was shining as bright as the sun shines at noon.
66001017	When I saw Him, I fell down at His feet like a dead man. He laid His right hand on me and said, “Do not be afraid. I am the First and the Last.
66001018	I am the Living One. I was dead, but look, I am alive forever. I have power over death and hell.
66001019	So write the things you have seen and the things that are and the things that will happen later.
66001020	This is what the seven stars and the seven lights made of gold mean that you saw in My right hand. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches. The seven lights are the seven churches.
66002001	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Ephesus: ‘The One Who holds the seven stars in His right hand and the One Who walks among the seven lights made of gold, says this:
66002002	I know what you have done and how hard you have worked. I know how long you can wait and not give up. I know that you cannot put up with sinful men. I know that you have put men to the test who call themselves mission aries. You have found they are not missionaries but are false.
66002003	You have waited long and have not given up. You have suffered because of Me. You have kept going on and have not become tired.
66002004	But I have this one thing against you. You do not love Me as you did at first.
66002005	Remember how you once loved Me. Be sorry for your sin and love Me again as you did at first. If you do not, I will come to you and take your light out of its place. I will do this unless you are sorry for your sin and turn from it.
66002006	But you have this: You hate what the Nicolaitans do. I hate what they do also.
66002007	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches. I will give the fruit of the tree of life in the garden of God to everyone who has power and wins.’
66002008	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Smyrna: ‘The One Who is First and Last, the One Who died and came to life again, says this:
66002009	I know of your troubles. I know you are poor. But still you are rich! I know the bad things spoken against you by those who say they are Jews. But they are not Jews. They belong to the devil.
66002010	Do not be afraid of what you will suffer. Listen! The devil will throw some of you into prison to test you. You will be in trouble for ten days. Be faithful even to death. Then I will give you the crown of life.
66002011	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches. The person who has power and wins will not be hurt by the second death!’
66002012	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Pergamum: ‘The One Who has the sharp sword that cuts both ways, says this:
66002013	I know where you live. It is the place where Satan sits. I know that you are true to Me. You did not give up and turn away from your faith in Me, even when Antipas was killed. He was faithful in speaking for Me. He was killed in front of you where Satan is.
66002014	But I have a few things against you. You have some people who follow the teaching of Balaam. He taught Balak to set a trap for the Jews. He taught them to eat food that had been given as a gift in worship to false gods and to do sex sins.
66002015	You also have some who follow the teaching of the Nicolaitans in the same way.
66002016	Be sorry for your sins and turn from them. If you do not, I will come to you right away. I will fight against them with the sword of My mouth.
66002017	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches. I will give the hidden bread from heaven to everyone who has power and wins. I will give each of them a white stone also. A new name will be written on it. No one will know the name except the one who receives it!’
66002018	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Thyatira: ‘The Son of God Who has eyes like fire and Whose feet are like shining brass, says this:
66002019	I know what you are doing. I know of your love and faith. I know how you have worked and how you have waited long and have not given up. I know that you are working harder now than you did at first.
66002020	But I have this against you: You are allowing Jezebel who calls herself a preacher to teach my servants. She is leading them in the wrong way and they are doing sex sins. And they are eating food that has been given as a gift in worship to false gods.
66002021	I gave her time to be sorry for her sins and turn from them. She does not want to turn from her sex sins.
66002022	See! I will throw her on a bed. Those who do sex sins with her will suffer much trouble and pain. I will let them suffer unless they are sorry for the sins they have done with her and turn from them.
66002023	And I will kill her children. All the churches will know that I am the One Who looks deep into the hearts and minds. I will give you whatever is coming to you because of your work.
66002024	But the rest of you there in the city of Thyatira have not followed this false teaching. You have not learned what they call the secrets of Satan. So I will put no other load on you.
66002025	But hold on to what you have until I come.
66002026	To the one who has power and wins and does what I want him to do, I will give the right and the power over the nations.
66002027	He will be leader over them using a piece of iron. And they will be broken in pieces like pots of clay. My Father has given Me this right and power.
66002028	And I will give him the Morning Star.
66002029	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches!’
66003001	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Sardis: ‘The One Who has the seven Spirits of God and the seven stars, says this: I know what you are doing. I know people think you are alive, but you are dead.
66003002	Wake up! Make stronger what you have before it dies. I have not found your work complete in God’s sight.
66003003	So remember what you have received and heard. Keep it. Be sorry for your sins and turn from them. If you will not wake up, I will come as a robber. You will not know at what time I will come.
66003004	But there are a few people in the church in the city of Sardis whose clothes are not dirty with sins. They will walk with Me wearing white clothes. They have done what they should.
66003005	Everyone who has power and wins will wear white clothes. I will not take his name from the book of life. I will speak of his name before My Father and His angels.
66003006	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches.’
66003007	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Philadelphia: ‘He Who is holy and true, Who holds the key of David, Who opens and no man can shut, Who shuts and no man can open, says this:
66003008	I know what you are doing. See! You do not have much power, but you have obeyed My Word. You have not turned against Me. So I have given you an open door that no man can shut.
66003009	See! There are some who belong to Satan. They say they are Jews, but they are not. They are liars. See! I will make them come to you and get down at your feet. Then they will know that I love you.
66003010	I will keep you from the time of trouble. The time to test everyone is about to come to the whole world. I will do this because you have listened to Me and have waited long and have not given up.
66003011	I am coming very soon. Hold on to what you have so no one can take your crown.
66003012	I will make the one who has power and wins an important part that holds up the house of God. He will never leave it again. I will write on him the name of My God and the name of the city of My God. It is the new Jerusalem. The new Jerusalem will come down from My God out of heaven. I will write My new name on him.
66003013	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches.’
66003014	“Write this to the angel of the church in the city of Laodicea: ‘The One Who says, Let it be so, the One Who is faithful, the One Who tells what is true, the One Who made everything in God’s world, says this:
66003015	I know what you are doing. You are not cold or hot. I wish you were one or the other.
66003016	But because you are warm, and not hot or cold, I will spit you out of My mouth.
