66003017	You say that you are rich and that you need nothing, but you do not know that you are so troubled in mind and heart. You are poor and blind and without clothes.
66003018	You should buy gold from Me that has been tested by fire that you may be rich. Buy white clothes to dress yourself so the shame of not wearing clothes will be taken away. Buy medicine to put on your eyes so you can see.
66003019	I speak strong words to those I love and I punish them. Have a strong desire to please the Lord. Be sorry for your sins and turn from them.
66003020	See! I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears My voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and we will eat together.
66003021	I will allow the one who has power and wins to sit with Me on My throne, as I also had power and won and sat down with My Father on His throne.
66003022	You have ears! Then listen to what the Spirit says to the churches.’ ”
66004001	After this, I looked and saw a door standing open in heaven. The first voice I heard was like the loud sound of a horn. It said, “Come up here. I will show you what must happen after these things.”
66004002	At once I was under the Spirit’s power. See! The throne was in heaven, and One was sitting on it.
66004003	The One Who sat there looked as bright as jasper and sardius stones. The colors like those of an emerald stone were all around the throne.
66004004	There were twenty-four smaller thrones around the throne. And on these thrones twenty-four leaders were sitting dressed in white clothes. They had crowns of gold on their heads.
66004005	Lightning and noise and thunder came from the throne. Seven lights of fire were burning before the throne. These were the seven Spirits of God.
66004006	Before the throne there was what looked like a sea of glass, shining and clear. Around the throne and on each side there were four living beings that were full of eyes in front and in back.
66004007	The first living being was like a lion. The second one was like a young cow. The third one had a face like a man. The fourth one was like a very large bird with its wings spread.
66004008	Each one of the four living beings had six wings. They had eyes all over them, inside and out. Day and night they never stop saying, “Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God, the All-powerful One. He is the One Who was and Who is and Who is to come.”
66004009	The four living beings speak of His shining-greatness and give honor and thanks to Him Who sits on His throne as King. It is He Who lives forever.
66004010	The twenty-four leaders get down before Him and worship Him Who lives forever. They lay their crowns before Him and say,
66004011	“Our Lord and our God, it is right for You to have the shining-greatness and the honor and the power. You made all things. They were made and have life because You wanted it that way.”
66005001	I saw a book in the right hand of the One Who sat on the a throne. It had writing on the inside and on the back side. It was locked with seven locks.
66005002	I saw a powerful angel calling with a loud voice, “Who is able to open the book and to break its locks?”
66005003	No one in heaven or on the earth or under the earth was able to open the book or to look in it.
66005004	Then I began to cry with loud cries. I cried because no one was good enough to open the book or to look in it.
66005005	One of the leaders said to me, “Stop crying. See! The Lion from the family group of Judah has power and has won. He can open the book and break its seven locks. He is of the family of David.”
66005006	I saw a Lamb standing in front of the twenty-four leaders. He was before the throne and in front of the four living beings. He looked as if He had been killed. He had seven horns and seven eyes. These are the seven Spirits of God. They have been sent out into all the world.
66005007	The Lamb came and took the book from the right hand of the One Who sat on the throne.
66005008	When the Lamb had taken the book, the four living beings and the twenty-four leaders got down before Him. Each one had a harp. They all had pots made of gold, full of special perfume, which are the prayers of the people who belong to God.
66005009	They sang a new song, saying, “It is right for You to take the book and break its locks. It is because You were killed. Your blood has bought men for God from every family and from every language and from every kind of people and from every nation.
66005010	You have made them to be a holy nation of religious leaders to work for our God. They will be the leaders on the earth.”
66005011	I looked again. I heard the voices of many thousands of angels. They stood around the throne and around the four living beings and the leaders.
66005012	They said with a loud voice, “The Lamb Who was killed has the right to receive power and riches and wisdom and strength and honor and shining-greatness and thanks.”
66005013	Then I heard every living thing in heaven and on the earth and under the earth and in the sea and all that are in them. They were saying, “Thanks and honor and shining-greatness and all power are to the One Who sits on the throne and to the Lamb forever.”
66005014	The four living beings kept saying, “Let it be so!” And the twenty-four leaders fell down and worshiped.
66006001	I saw the Lamb break open the first of the seven locks. I heard one of the four living beings cry out like the sound of thunder, “Come and see!”
66006002	I looked and saw a white horse. The one who sat on it had a bow. A crown was given to him. He went out to win and he won.
66006003	He broke open the second lock. Then I heard the second living being say, “Come and see!”
66006004	Another horse came out. This one was red. The one who sat on it was given a long sword. He was given power to take peace from the earth so men would kill each other.
66006005	He broke open the third lock. Then I heard the third living being say, “Come and see!” I looked and saw a black horse. The one who sat on it had something in his hand with which to weigh things.
66006006	I heard a voice from among the four living beings saying, “A small jar of wheat for a day’s pay. Three small jars of barley for a day’s pay. Do not hurt the olive oil and wine.”
66006007	He broke open the fourth lock. Then I heard the fourth living being say, “Come and see!”
66006008	I looked and saw a light colored horse. The one who sat on it had the name of Death. Hell followed close behind him. They were given the right and the power to kill one-fourth part of everything on the earth. They were to kill with the sword and by people having no food and by sickness and by the wild animals of the earth.
66006009	He broke open the fifth lock. Then I saw under the altar all the souls of those who had been killed for telling the Word of God. They had also been killed for being faithful in telling about Christ.
66006010	All those who had been killed cried out with a loud voice saying, “How long will it be yet before You will punish those on the earth for killing us? Lord, You are holy and true.”
66006011	White clothes were given to each one of them. They were told to rest a little longer. They were to wait until all the other servants owned by God and their Christian brothers would be killed as they had been. Then the group would be complete.
66006012	I looked as the Lamb broke the sixth lock. The earth shook as if it would break apart. The sun became black like dark cloth. The moon became like blood.
66006013	The stars of the sky fell to the earth. They were like figs falling from a tree that is shaken by a strong wind.
66006014	The sky passed away like paper being rolled up. Every mountain and island moved from its place.
66006015	The kings and the leaders of the earth hid themselves in caves and among the rocks of the mountains. All the head soldiers and rich men and strong men and men who were free and those who were owned by someone hid themselves also.
66006016	They called to the mountains and to the rocks, “Fall on us! Hide us from the face of the One Who sits on the throne. Hide us from the anger of the Lamb,
66006017	because the special day of Their anger has come! Who is able to stand against it?”
66007001	After this I saw four angels. They were standing at the four corners of the earth. They were holding back the four winds of the earth so no wind would blow on the earth or the sea or on any tree.
66007002	I saw another angel coming from the east. He was carrying the mark of the living God. He called with a loud voice to the four angels who had been given power to hurt the earth and sea.
66007003	The angel from the east said, “Do not hurt the earth or the sea or the trees until we have put the mark of God on the foreheads of the servants He owns.”
66007004	I heard how many there were who received the mark of God. There were 144,000 people of the twelve family groups of Israel.
66007005	These received the mark of God: 12,000 from the family group of Judah, 12,000 from the family group of Reuben, 12,000 from the family group of Gad,
66007006	12,000 from the family group of Asher, 12,000 from the family group of Naphtali, 12,000 from the family group of Manasseh,
66007007	12,000 from the family group of Simeon, 12,000 from the family group of Levi, 12,000 from the family group of Issachar,
66007008	12,000 from the family group of Zebulun, 12,000 from the family group of Joseph, and 12,000 from the family group of Benjamin.
66007009	After this I saw many people. No one could tell how many there were. They were from every nation and from every family and from every kind of people and from every language. They were standing before the throne and before the Lamb. They were wearing white clothes and they held branches in their hands.
66007010	And they were crying out with a loud voice, “We are saved from the punishment of sin by our God Who sits on the throne and by the Lamb!”
66007011	Then all of the angels standing around the throne and around the leaders and the four living beings got down on their faces before God and worshiped Him.
66007012	They said, “Let it be so! May our God have worship and shining-greatness and wisdom and thanks and honor and power and strength forever. Let it be so!”
66007013	Then one of the twenty-four leaders asked me, “Who are these people dressed in white clothes? Where did they come from?”
66007014	I answered him, “Sir, you know.” Then he said to me, “These are the ones who came out of the time of much trouble. They have washed their clothes and have made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
66007015	For this reason they are before the throne of God. They help Him day and night in the house of God. And He Who sits on the throne will care for them as He is among them.
66007016	They will never be hungry or thirsty again. The sun or any burning heat will not shine down on them.
66007017	For the Lamb Who is in the center of the throne will be their Shepherd. He will lead them to wells of the water of life. God will take away all tears from their eyes.”
66008001	When the Lamb broke the seventh lock, there was not a sound in heaven for about one-half hour.
66008002	Then I saw the seven angels standing before God. They were given seven horns.
66008003	Another angel came and stood at the altar. He held a cup made of gold full of special perfume. He was given much perfume so he could mix it in with the prayers of those who belonged to God. Their prayers were put on the altar made of gold before the throne.
66008004	Smoke from burning the special perfume and the prayers of those who belong to God went up before God out of the angel’s hand.
66008005	Then the angel took the cup of gold. He filled it with fire from the altar and threw it down on the earth. There was thunder and noise and lightning and the earth shook.
66008006	The seven angels that had the seven horns got ready to blow them.
66008007	So the first angel blew his horn. Hail and fire mixed with blood came down on the earth. One-third part of the earth was burned up. One-third part of the trees were burned up. All the green grass was burned up.
66008008	The second angel blew his horn. Something like a large mountain was burning with fire. It was thrown into the sea. One-third part of the sea turned into blood.
66008009	One-third part of all sea life died. One-third part of all the ships were destroyed.
66008010	The third angel blew his horn. A large star fell from heaven. It was burning with a fire that kept burning like a bright light. It fell on one-third part of the rivers and on the places where water comes out of the earth.
66008011	The name of the star is Wormwood. One-third part of the water became poison. Many men died from drinking the water because it had become poison.
66008012	The fourth angel blew his horn. One-third part of the sun and one-third part of the moon and one-third part of the stars were hurt. One-third part of them was made dark so that one-third part of the day and night had no light.
66008013	Then I looked and saw a very large bird flying in the sky. It said with a loud voice, “It is bad! It is bad! It is bad for those who live on the earth when the sound comes from the horns that the other three angels will blow!”
66009001	The fifth angel blew his horn. I saw a star from heaven which had fallen to earth. The key to the hole without a bottom was given to the angel.
66009002	He opened the hole and smoke came out like the smoke from a place where there is much fire. The sun and the air became dark because of the smoke from the hole.
66009003	Locusts came down to the earth out of the smoke. They were given power to hurt like small animals that sting.
66009004	They were told not to hurt the grass or any green plant or any tree. They were to hurt only the men who did not have the mark of God on their foreheads.
66009005	The locusts were not allowed to kill these men. They were to give them much pain for five months like the pain that comes from a small animal that stings.
66009006	Men will look for ways to die during those days, but they will not find any way. They will want to die, but death will be kept from them.
66009007	The locusts looked like horses ready for war. They had on their heads what looked like crowns of gold. Their faces were like men’s faces.
66009008	Their hair was like the hair of women. Their teeth were like the teeth of lions.
66009009	Their chests were covered with what looked like pieces of iron. The sound their wings made was like the sound of many wagons rushing to war.
66009010	They had tails like a small animal that stings. The sting came from their tails. They were given power to hurt men for five months.
66009011	These locusts have a king over them. He is the head angel of the hole that has no bottom. His name in the Hebrew language is Abbadon. In the Greek language it is Apollyon. (It means the one who destroys.)
66009012	The first time of trouble is past. But see, there are two more times of trouble coming after this.
66009013	The sixth angel blew his horn. I heard a voice coming from the four corners of the altar made of gold that is before God.
66009014	The voice said to the sixth angel who had the horn, “Let the four angels loose that have been chained at the big river Euphrates.”
66009015	They had been kept ready for that hour and day and month and year. They were let loose so they could kill one-third part of all men that were living.
66009016	The army had 200 million soldiers on horses. I heard them say how many there were.
66009017	I saw, as God wanted to show me, the horses and the men on them. The men had pieces of iron over their chests. These were red like fire and blue like the sky and yellow like sulphur. The heads of the horses looked like the heads of lions. Fire and smoke and sulphur came out of their mouths.
66009018	One-third part of all men was killed by the fire and smoke and sulphur that came out of their mouths.
66009019	The power of the horses was in their mouths and in their tails. Their tails were like the heads of snakes and with them they could bite and kill.
66009020	The men that were still living after these troubles were past would not turn away from worshiping demons. They would not turn away from false gods made from gold and silver and brass and stone and wood. None of these false gods can see or hear or walk.
66009021	These men were not sorry for their sins and would not turn away from all their killing and their witchcraft. They would not stop their sex sins and their stealing.
66010001	Then I saw another strong angel coming down from heaven covered with a cloud. He had many colors around his head. His face was like the sun. His feet were like long flames of fire.
66010002	He had in his hand a little book that was open. The angel put his right foot on the sea. He put his left foot on the land.
66010003	He cried with a loud voice like the sound of a lion. The seven thunders sounded.
66010004	I was ready to write when the seven thunders had spoken. Then I heard the voice from heaven saying, “Lock up the things which the seven thunders have spoken. Do not write them!”
66010005	Then the strong angel that I saw standing on the sea and on the land lifted his right hand to heaven.
66010006	He made a promise in the name of God Who lives forever, Who made the heaven and the earth and the sea and everything in them. He promised that there will be no more waiting.
66010007	And when the seventh angel blows his horn, God will put His secret plan into action. It will be done just as He told it to the early preachers, His servants.
66010008	Then the voice I heard from heaven spoke to me again. It said, “Go and take the little book that is open. It is in the hand of the angel who is standing on the sea and on the land.”
66010009	I went to the angel and asked him to give me the little book. He said, “Take it and eat it. It will taste like honey in your mouth. But after you have eaten it, it will make your stomach sour.”
66010010	Then I took it from the angel’s hand and ate it. It was sweet as honey in my mouth, but it made my stomach sour after I had eaten it.
66010011	Then they said to me, “You must tell what will happen again in front of many people and nations and families and kings.”
66011001	I was given a stick that is used to see how big things are. Someone said, “Go up to the house of God and find out how big it is. Find out about the altar also. See how many people are worshiping.
66011002	Do not find out about the porch of the house of God. It has been given over to the nations who do not know God. They will walk over all the Holy City to wreck it for forty-two months.
66011003	I will give power to my two men who tell what they know. They will speak for God for 1,260 days (forty-two months). They will be dressed in clothes made from the hair of animals.”
66011004	These two men who tell what they know are the two olive trees and the two lights that stand before the Lord of the earth.
66011005	If anyone hates them and tries to hurt them, fire comes out of the mouths of these two men. The fire kills those who try to hurt them.
66011006	They have power to shut up the sky. During the time they speak for God, there will be no rain. They have power to change all waters into blood. They can send every kind of trouble to the earth whenever they want to.
66011007	When they have finished speaking for God, the wild animal will make war with them. It will come up out of the hole without a bottom. This wild animal will have power over them and kill them.
66011008	Their dead bodies will lie in the street of Jerusalem. It is where their Lord was nailed to a cross. The city is sometimes called Sodom and Egypt.
66011009	For three and one-half days those from every people and from every family and from every language and from every nation will look at their dead bodies. People will not allow the dead bodies of these two men to be put in a grave.
66011010	Those who are living on the earth will be happy because of the death of these two men. They will do things to show they are happy. They will send gifts to each other. They will do this because these two men brought much trouble and suffering to the people of the earth.
66011011	After three and one-half days, life from God came into them again. They stood on their feet. Those who saw them were very much afraid.
66011012	Then the two men who told what they knew heard a loud voice from heaven. It said, “Come up here.” And they went up to heaven in a cloud. All those who hated them watched them go.
66011013	At the same time the earth shook. One-tenth part of the buildings of the city fell down. Seven thousand people were killed. The rest of the people were afraid and gave honor to the God of heaven.
66011014	The second time of trouble is past. But look, the third time of trouble is coming soon.
66011015	The seventh angel blew his horn. There were loud voices in heaven saying, “The nations of the world have become the holy nation of our Lord and of His Christ. He will be the Leader forever.”
66011016	Then the twenty-four leaders who sat on their thrones before God fell on their faces and worshiped God.

It is time for the servants You own who are the early preachers and those who belong to You to get the reward that is coming to them. It is time for the important people and those not important who honor Your name to get the pay that is coming to them. It is time to destroy those who have made every kind of trouble on the earth.”
66011019	God’s house in heaven was opened. The special box which held the Old Way of Worship was seen in the house of God. There was lightning and thunder and noise. The earth shook and large hail stones fell.
66012001	Something very special was seen in heaven. A woman was there dressed with the sun. The moon was under her feet. A crown with twelve stars in it was on her head.
66012002	She was about to become a mother. She cried out with pain waiting for the child to be born.
66012003	Something else special was seen in heaven. A large dragon was there. It was red and had seven heads and ten horns. There was a crown on each head.
66012004	With his tail he pulled one-third part of the stars out of heaven. He threw them down to the earth. This dragon stood in front of the woman as she was about to give birth to her child. He was waiting to eat her child as soon as it was born.
66012005	Then the woman gave birth to a son. He is to be the leader of the world using a piece of iron. But this child was taken away to God and His throne.
66012006	The woman ran away into the desert. God had made the place ready for her. He will care for her there 1,260 days.
66012007	Then there was war in heaven. Michael and his angels fought against this dragon. This animal and his angels fought back.
66012008	But the dragon was not strong enough to win. There was no more room in heaven for them.
66012009	The dragon was thrown down to earth from heaven. This animal is the old snake. He is also called the Devil or Satan. He is the one who has fooled the whole world. He was thrown down to earth and his angels were thrown down with him.
66012010	Then I heard a loud voice in heaven saying, “Now God has saved from the punishment of sin! God’s power as King has come! God’s holy nation has come! God’s Christ is here with power! The one who spoke against our Christian brothers has been thrown down to earth. He stood before God speaking against them day and night.
66012011	They had power over him and won because of the blood of the Lamb and by telling what He had done for them. They did not love their lives but were willing to die.
66012012	For this reason, O heavens and you who are there, be full of joy. It is bad for you, O earth and sea. For the devil has come down to you. He is very angry because he knows he has only a short time.”
66012013	When the dragon which is the devil saw that he had been thrown down to the earth, he began to hunt for the woman who had given birth to the boy baby.
66012014	The woman was given two wings like the wings of a very large bird so she could fly to her place in the desert. She was to be cared for there and kept safe from the snake, which is the devil, for three and one-half years.

66012017	This dragon was very angry with the woman. He went off to fight with the rest of her children. They are the ones who obey the Laws of God and are faithful to the teachings of Jesus.
66013001	I stood on the sand by the sea-shore. There I saw a wild animal coming up out of the sea. It had seven heads and ten horns with a crown on each horn. There were names on each head that spoke bad words against God.
66013002	The wild animal I saw was covered with spots. It had feet like those of a bear. It had a mouth like that of a lion. The dragon gave this wild animal his own power and his own throne as king. The wild animal was given much power.
66013003	One of the heads of the wild animal looked as if it had been killed. But the bad cut given to kill him was healed. The whole world was surprised and wondered about this, and they followed after the wild animal.
66013004	They worshiped the dragon for giving this wild animal such power. And they worshiped this wild animal. They said, “Who is like this wild animal? Who can fight against it?”
66013005	The animal was given a mouth which spoke words full of pride and it spoke very bad things against the Lord. It was given much power for forty-two months.
66013006	And it opened its mouth speaking very bad things against God. It spoke against God’s name and His house and against those living in heaven.
66013007	It was allowed to fight against the people who belong to God, and it had power to win over them. It had power over every family and every group of people and over people of every language and every nation.
66013008	Every person on the earth from the beginning of the world whose name has not been written in the book of life of the Lamb Who was killed will worship this animal.
66013009	You have ears! Then listen.
66013010	Whoever is to be tied and held will be held. Whoever kills with a sword must himself be killed with a sword. Now is when God’s people must have faith and not give up.

66013013	The second wild animal did great powerful works. It spoke and made those who did not worship the first wild animal to be killed.
66013014	He fooled the men of the earth by doing powerful works. He did these things in front of the first wild animal. He told those who live on the earth to make a god that looks like the first wild animal. The first wild animal was the one that was cut by the sword but lived.

66014001	Then I looked and saw the Lamb standing on Mount Zion. There were 144,000 people with Him. These people had His name and His Father’s name written on their foreheads.

66014011	The smoke of those who are being punished will go up forever. They have no rest day or night. It is because they have worshiped the wild animal and his false god and have received the mark of his name.
66014012	This is why God’s people need to keep true to God’s Word and stay faithful to Jesus.
66014013	Then I heard a voice from heaven, saying, “Write these words: ‘From now on those who are dead who died belonging to the Lord will be happy.’” “Yes,” says the Spirit, “they will have rest from all their work. All the good things they have done will follow them.”

66015001	Then I saw something else special in heaven that was great and made me wonder. There were seven angels with the seven last kinds of trouble. With these, God’s anger is finished.

66016001	Then I heard a loud voice coming from the house of God. The voice said to the seven angels, “Go and pour out the seven jars of God’s anger onto the earth!”

66016010	The fifth angel poured out his jar of God’s anger upon the throne of the wild animal. The whole nation of the wild animal was turned into darkness. Those who worshiped him bit their tongues because of the pain.
66016011	They called the God of heaven bad names because of their pain and their sores. They were not sorry for what they had done.
66016012	The sixth angel poured out his jar of God’s anger onto the great Euphrates River. The water dried up. In this way, the kings of the countries of the east could cross over.
66016013	Then I saw three demons that looked like frogs. They came out of the mouths of the dragon and the second wild animal and the false preacher.
66016014	These are demons that do powerful works. These demons go to all the kings of all the earth. They bring them together for the war of the great day of the All-powerful God.
66016015	(See! I will come like a robber. The man is happy who stays awake and keeps his clothes ready. He will not be walking around without clothes and be ashamed.)
66016016	Then the demons brought the kings together in the place called Armageddon in the Hebrew language.
66016017	The seventh angel poured out his jar of God’s anger into the air. A loud voice came from the throne in the house of God, saying, “It is all done!”
66016018	Then there were voices and lightning and thunder and the earth shook. The earth shook much more than it had ever shaken before.
66016019	The big and strong city of Babylon was split in three parts. The cities of other nations fell to the ground. Then God remembered the strong city of Babylon. He made her drink the wine from His cup of much anger.
66016020	Every island went down into the sea. No mountain could be found.
66016021	Large pieces of hail fell from heaven on men. These pieces were about as heavy as an older child. But men called God bad names because of so much trouble from the hail.
66017001	Then one of the seven angels who had the seven jars came to me. He said, “Come! I will show you how the powerful woman who sells the use of her body will be punished. She sits on the many waters of the world.
66017002	The kings of the earth have done sex sins with her. People of the world have been made drunk with the wine of her sex sins.”
66017003	I was carried away in the Spirit by the angel to a desert. I saw a woman sitting on a red wild animal. It had seven heads and ten horns. All over the red wild animal was written bad names which spoke against God.
66017004	The woman was wearing purple and red clothes. She was wearing gold and pearls and stones worth much money. She had in her hand a gold cup full of sinful things from her sex sins.
66017005	There was a name written on her forehead which had a secret meaning. It said, “The big and powerful Babylon, mother of all women who sell the use of their bodies and mother of everything sinful of the earth.”
66017006	I looked at the woman. She was drunk with the blood of God’s people and those who had been killed for telling about Jesus. When I saw her, I wondered very much.
66017007	The angel asked me, “Why do you wonder? I will tell you the secret about this woman and the red wild animal that carries her. It is the red wild animal with seven heads and ten horns.
66017008	The red wild animal you saw was alive but is now dead. He will come up from the hole without a bottom and be destroyed. The people of the earth, whose names have not been written in the book of life from the beginning of the world, will be surprised as they look at the red wild animal. He was alive, but not now, but will yet come.
66017009	“Here is where we need wisdom. The seven heads of the animal are mountains where the woman sits.
66017010	They are seven kings also. Five of them are no longer kings. The sixth one is now king. The seventh one will be king, but only for a little while.
66017011	The red wild animal that died is the eighth king. He belongs to the first seven kings, but he will be destroyed also.
66017012	“The ten horns of the red wild animal which you saw are ten kings. They have not become leaders yet. But they will be given the right and the power to lead their nations for one hour with the red wild animal.
66017013	They agree to give the right and the power to the red wild animal.
66017014	These kings will fight and make war with the Lamb. But the Lamb will win the war because He is Lord of lords and King of kings. His people are the called and chosen and faithful ones.”
66017015	Then the angel said to me, “You saw the waters where the woman who sold the use of her body is sitting. The waters are people and large groups of people and nations and languages.
66017016	The ten horns you saw and the red wild animal will hate the woman who sold the use of her body. They will take everything from her and even her clothes. They will eat her flesh and burn her with fire.
66017017	God put in their minds a plan that would carry out His desire. They will agree to give their nation to the red wild animal until the words of God have been completed.
66017018	The woman you saw is the big and powerful city that has power over the kings of the earth.”
66018001	Then I saw another angel coming down from heaven. He had much power. The earth was made bright with his shining-greatness.
66018002	He cried out with a loud voice, “The big and powerful city of Babylon is destroyed. Demons and every kind of unclean spirit live there. Unclean birds that are hated are there.
66018003	For she gave her wine to the nations of the world. It was the wine of her desire for sex sins. The kings of the earth have done these sex sins with her. The men of the earth who buy and sell have become rich from the riches she received while living in sin.”
66018004	I heard another voice from heaven saying, “Come out from her, my people. Do not be a part of her sins so you will not share her troubles.
66018005	For her sins are as high as heaven. God is ready to punish her for her sins.
66018006	Pay her back for what she has paid you. Give back to her twice as much for what she has done. In her own cup give her twice as much as she gave.
66018007	Give her as much trouble and suffering as the fun and the rich living she chose for herself. In her heart she says, ‘I sit here like a queen. I am not a woman whose husband has died. I will never have sorrow.’
66018008	Because of this, troubles of death and sorrow and no food will come to her in one day. She will be burned with fire. For the Lord God is powerful. He is the One Who says she is guilty.
66018009	“Then the kings of the earth will cry for her and be sorry when they see the smoke of her burning. They are the ones who did sex sins with her and lived as rich people.
66018010	They stand a long way from her because they are afraid of her sufferings. They say, ‘It is bad! It is bad for the big and powerful city of Babylon. For in one hour she is destroyed.’
66018011	The men of the earth who buy and sell are sorry for her and cry. They cry because there is no one to buy their things anymore.
66018012	They sold gold and silver and stones worth much money and pearls. They sold fine linen and purple and red silk cloth. They sold all kinds of perfumed wood. They sold things made from the teeth of animals and things made from wood that cost much money. They sold brass and iron and stone.
66018013	They sold spices and perfumes of all kinds. They sold wine and olive oil and fine flour and wheat. They sold cows and sheep and horses and wagons. They sold men who are not free and they sold the lives of men.
66018014	They say to her, ‘All the good things you wanted so much are gone from you. Your riches are gone. The things you liked so much are gone. You will never have them again.’
66018015	The men of the earth who became rich by buying and selling in that city will stand a long way back because they are afraid of her sufferings. They will cry and have sorrow.
66018016	They will say, ‘It is bad! It is bad for that powerful city. She dressed in fine linen of purple and red. She covered herself with gold and pearls and stones worth much money.
66018017	For in one hour her riches are destroyed.’ The captain of every ship and all who traveled on ships and all who worked on ships stood a long way back.
66018018	They cried out as they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, ‘Has there ever been such a city as powerful as this one?’
66018019	They threw dirt on their heads. They cried out with much sorrow and said, ‘It is bad! It is bad for the powerful city! She is the place where all those who owned ships on the sea became rich from all her riches. For in one hour everything is gone!’
66018020	“Be full of joy because of her, O heaven! Be full of joy, you who belong to God and missionaries and early preachers! For God has punished her for what she did to you.”
66018021	Then a strong angel picked up a large stone like those used for grinding wheat. He threw it into the sea, saying, “The big and strong city of Babylon will be thrown down like this. It will never be found again.
66018022	The sound of those playing on harps and on flutes and on horns will not be heard in you again. No workman doing any kind of work will be found in you again. The sound of the grinding-stone will not be heard in you again.
66018023	No light will ever shine in you again. There will be no more happy voices from a wedding heard in you. Your men who bought and sold were the most powerful on earth. You fooled people over all the world by your witchcraft.
66018024	And in this city was found the blood of the early preachers and of those who belonged to God and of all those who had been killed on the earth.”
66019001	After this I heard what sounded like the voices of many people in heaven, saying, “Thanks to our God, the One Who saves. Honor and power belong to Him.
66019002	For the way He punishes people is right and true. He has punished the powerful woman who sold the use of her body. She was making the earth sinful with her sex sins. She killed those who worked for God. He has punished her for it.”
66019003	Again they said, “Thanks to our God. The smoke from her burning goes up forever.”
66019004	The twenty-four leaders and the four living beings got down and worshiped God Who was sitting on the throne. They said, “Let it be so. Thanks to our God!”
66019005	A voice came from the throne, saying, “Give thanks to our God, you servants who are owned by Him. Give thanks to our God, you who honor Him with love and fear, both small and great.”
66019006	Then I heard what sounded like the voices of many people. It was like the sound of powerful rushing water. And it was like loud thunder. It said, “Thanks to our God. For the Lord our God is King. He is the All-powerful One.
66019007	Let us be full of joy and be glad. Let us honor Him, for the time has come for the wedding supper of the Lamb. His bride has made herself ready.
66019008	She was given clean, white, fine linen clothes to wear. The fine linen is the right living of God’s people.”
66019009	The angel said to me, “Write this: ‘Those who are asked to the wedding supper of the Lamb are happy.’ ” And he said, “These are the true words of God.”
66019010	Then I fell at his feet to worship him. But he said to me, “No! Do not worship me. I am a servant together with you and your Christian brothers who tell of their trust in Christ. Worship God. For those who speak for Jesus are led in what to say as the early preachers were led.”
66019011	Then I saw heaven opened. A white horse was standing there. The One Who was sitting on the horse is called Faithful and True. He is the One Who punishes in the right way. He makes war.
66019012	His eyes are a flame of fire. He has many crowns on His head. His name is written on Him but He is the only One Who knows what it says.
66019013	The coat He wears has been put in blood. His name is The Word of God.
66019014	The armies in heaven were dressed in clean, white, fine linen. They were following Him on white horses.
66019015	Out of His mouth comes a sharp sword to punish the nations. He will be the Leader over them using a piece of iron. He walks on the grapes where wine is made, pressing out the anger of God, the All-powerful One.
66019016	On His coat and on His leg is the name written, “KING OF KINGS AND LORD OF LORDS.”
66019017	Then I saw an angel standing in the sun. He cried out with a loud voice to all the birds flying in the sky, “Come and gather together for the great supper of God!
66019018	Come and eat the flesh of kings and of captains of soldiers and of strong men and of the flesh of horses and of those sitting on them. Come and eat the flesh of all men, small and great. Some are free and some are not free.”
66019019	Then I saw the wild animal and the kings of the earth and their armies gather together. They were ready to fight against the One Who is sitting on the white horse and against His army.
66019020	The wild animal was taken. The false preacher was taken with it. It was the false preacher who had done powerful works in front of the wild animal. In this way, he fooled those who had received the mark of the wild animal and those who worshiped his false god. These two were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulphur.
66019021	The rest were killed with the sword that came out of the mouth of the One Who sat on the horse. All the birds were filled by eating the flesh of these who were killed.
66020001	Then I saw an angel coming down from heaven. He had in his hand a key to the hole without a bottom. He also had a strong chain.
66020002	He took hold of the dragon, that old snake, who is the Devil, or Satan, and chained him for 1,000 years.
66020003	The angel threw the devil into the hole without a bottom. He shut it and locked him in it. He could not fool the nations anymore until the 1,000 years were completed. After this he must be free for awhile.
66020004	Then I saw thrones. Those who were sitting there were given the power to judge. I saw the souls of those who had been killed because they told about Jesus and preached the Word of God. They had not worshiped the wild animal or his false god. They had not received his mark on their foreheads or hands. They lived again and were leaders along with Christ for 1,000 years.
66020005	The rest of the dead did not come to life again until the 1,000 years were finished. This is the first time many people are raised from the dead at the same time.
66020006	Those who are raised from the dead during this first time are happy and holy. The second death has no power over them. They will be religious leaders of God and of Christ. They will be leaders with Him for 1,000 years.
66020007	When the 1,000 years are finished, Satan will be free to leave his prison.
66020008	He will go out and fool the nations who are over all the world. They are Gog and Magog. He will gather them all together for war. There will be as many as the sand along the sea-shore.
66020009	They will spread out over the earth and all around the place where God’s people are and around the city that is loved. Fire will come down from God out of heaven and destroy them.
66020010	Then the devil who fooled them will be thrown into the lake of fire burning with sulphur. The wild animal and the false preacher are already there. They will all be punished day and night forever.
66020011	Then I saw a great white throne. I saw the One Who sat on it. The earth and the heaven left Him in a hurry and they could be found no more.
66020012	I saw all the dead people standing before God. There were great people and small people. The books were opened. Then another book was opened. It was the book of life. The dead people were judged by what they had done as it was written in the books.
66020013	The sea gave up the dead people who were in it. Death and hell gave up the dead people who were in them. Each one was judged by what he had done.
66020014	Then death and hell were thrown into the lake of fire. The lake of fire is the second death.
66020015	If anyone’s name was not written in the book of life, he was thrown into the lake of fire.
66021001	Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth. The first heaven and the first earth had passed away. There was no more sea.
66021002	I saw the Holy City, the new Jerusalem. It was coming down out of heaven from God. It was made ready like a bride is made ready for her husband.
66021003	I heard a loud voice coming from heaven. It said, “See! God’s home is with men. He will live with them. They will be His people. God Himself will be with them. He will be their God.
66021004	God will take away all their tears. There will be no more death or sorrow or crying or pain. All the old things have passed away.”
66021005	Then the One sitting on the throne said, “See! I am making all things new. Write, for these words are true and faithful.”
66021006	Then He said to me, “These things have happened! I am the First and the Last. I am the beginning and the end. To anyone who is thirsty, I will give the water of life. It is a free gift.
66021007	He who has power and wins will receive these things. I will be his God and he will be My son.
66021008	But those who are afraid and those who do not have faith and the sinful-minded people and those who kill other people and those who do sex sins and those who follow witchcraft and those who worship false gods and all those who tell lies will be put into the lake of fire and sulphur. This is the second death.”
66021009	Then one of the seven angels who had the seven jars full of the seven last troubles came to me and said, “Come! I will show you the bride, the wife of the Lamb.”
66021010	I was carried away in the Spirit by the angel to a very high mountain. He showed me the Holy City of Jerusalem. It was coming out of heaven from God.
66021011	It was filled with the shining-greatness of God. It shone like a stone worth much money, like a jasper stone. It was clear like glass.
66021012	It had a very high wall, and there were twelve gates. Twelve angels stood by the gates. The names of the twelve family groups of the Jewish nation were written on the gates.
66021013	There were three gates on each side. There were three on the east side and three on the north side and three on the south side and three on the west side.
66021014	The walls were on twelve stones. The names of the twelve missionaries of the Lamb were written on the stones.
66021015	The angel had a stick in his hand. It was used to find out how big the city and its gates and the walls were.
66021016	He found out that the city was as wide as it was long and it was as high as it was wide. It was as long as a man could walk in fifty days. It was the same each way.
66021017	The angel found out that the walls were the same as a man taking seventy-two long steps. The angel used the same way to find out about the city as a man would have used.
66021018	The wall was made of jasper. The city was made of pure gold. This gold was as clear as glass.
66021019	The city was built on every kind of stone that was worth much money. The first stone was jasper. The second was sapphire. The third was chalcedony. The fourth was emerald.
66021020	The fifth was sardonyx. The sixth was sardius. The seventh was chrysolite. The eighth was beryl. The ninth was topaz. The tenth was chrysoprase. The eleventh was jacinth and the twelfth was amethyst.
66021021	The twelve gates were twelve pearls. Each gate was made from one pearl. The street of the city was pure gold. It was as clear as glass.
66021022	I did not see a house of God in the city. The All-powerful Lord God and the Lamb are the house of God in this city.
66021023	There is no need for the sun and moon to shine in the city. The shining-greatness of God makes it full of light. The Lamb is its light.
66021024	The nations will walk by its light. The kings of the earth will bring their greatness into it.
66021025	The gates are open all day. They will never be shut. There will be no night there.
66021026	The greatness and honor of all the nations will be brought into it.
66021027	Nothing sinful will go into the city. No one who is sinful-minded or tells lies can go in. Only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s book of life can go in.
66022001	Then the angel showed me the river of the water of life. It was as clear as glass and came from the throne of God and of the Lamb.
66022002	It runs down the center of the street in the city. On each side of the river was the tree of life. It gives twelve different kinds of fruit. It gives this fruit twelve times a year, new fruit each month. Its leaves are used to heal the nations.
66022003	There will be nothing in the city that is sinful. The place where God and the Lamb sit will be there. The servants He owns will serve Him.
66022004	They will see His face and His name will be written on their foreheads.
66022005	There will be no night there. There will be no need for a light or for the sun. Because the Lord God will be their light. They will be leaders forever.
66022006	Then the angel said to me, “These words are faithful and true. The Lord God of the early preachers has sent His angel to show the servants He owns what must happen soon.”
66022007	“See! I am coming soon. The one who obeys what is written in this Book is happy!”
66022008	It was I, John, who heard and saw these things. Then I got down at the feet of the angel who showed me these things. I was going to worship him.
66022009	But he said to me, “No! You must not do that. I am a servant together with you and with your Christian brothers and the early preachers and with all those who obey the words in this Book. You must worship God!”
66022010	Then he said to me, “Do not lock up the words of this Book. These things will happen soon.
66022011	And let the sinful people keep on being sinful. Let the dirty-minded people keep on being dirty-minded. And let those right with God keep on being right with God. Let the holy people keep on being holy.
66022012	“See! I am coming soon. I am bringing with Me the reward I will give to everyone for what he has done.
66022013	I am the First and the Last. I am the beginning and the end.
66022014	Those who wash their clothes clean are happy (who are washed by the blood of the Lamb). They will have the right to go into the city through the gates. They will have the right to eat the fruit of the tree of life.
66022015	Outside the city are the dogs. They are people who follow witchcraft and those who do sex sins and those who kill other people and those who worship false gods and those who like lies and tell them.
66022016	“I am Jesus. I have sent My angel to you with these words to the churches. I am the beginning of David and of his family. I am the bright Morning Star.”
66022017	The Holy Spirit and the Bride say, “Come!” Let the one who hears, say, “Come!” Let the one who is thirsty, come. Let the one who wants to drink of the water of life, drink it. It is a free gift.
66022018	I am telling everyone who hears the words that are written in this book: If anyone adds anything to what is written in this book, God will add to him the kinds of trouble that this book tells about.
66022019	If anyone takes away any part of this book that tells what will happen in the future, God will take away his part from the tree of life and from the Holy City, which are told about in this book.
66022020	He Who tells these things says, “Yes, I am coming soon!” Let it be so. Come, Lord Jesus.
66022021	May all of you have the loving-favor of the Lord Jesus Christ. Let it be so.
